name: Chris Todd
text:
Very personable, friendly doctor and staff. Was extremely thorough in evaluation and testing for my illness. Even got friendly  follow up call the next morning to see how I was doing.
Highly recommended.

name: Rebecca Fox
text: Very kind nurses and informative doctor. Doctor was professional but had a great “bedside manor”. Visit was very quick. Highly recommend!

name: Ian Hunter
text: The staff is nice, and the doctor is nice. They’re efficient. However any billing problems you have, are a nightmare. Be aware of if your insurance only covers your visit with a referral, or you’ll be paying out of pocket.

name: Priscillla J
text: Very  efficient.  They even called few days later to check on my child.....

name: Brandon King
text: The staff is very nice— no wait time and the doctor is knowledgeable

name: Jennifier Barger
text: I WAS REFUSED CARE. Today I went to Summit Express Care to have a physical done for a form I needed to fill out. There was a question about the way they bill--I asked them to try to bill through my insurance, and they refused. I decided to go ahead with the process anyway. I was called up and told that because of a previous experience I had, they refused to see me. I was shocked, because while I do remember the receptionist being rude in the past, I did not remember any major altercation. Not to mention, even if I had ever gotten frustrated, I would never have been mean or threatening in any way. I said it was shocking that they would refuse care. based on some past frustration. She said it's a private physician-owned clinic and they can see whomever they want. I asked to speak to the person making the decision and was told it was the physician who owns the clinic. Understand, I have also had good experiences there, so I'm not sure why I didn't get credit for those. Anyway, I was told she refused to see me and was told I could leave my contact information, but with no assurance that I would actually be called. The receptionist told me that it was based on a review I had written before. I cannot find any reviews I have ever written. My husband wrote one based on the same kind of deal with the refusal to even try to work with our insurance process because they think they know what will be covered, 19 months ago. I said, "I'm sorry, but since I can't even remember what the details are that would prompt me to write a bad review, that happened at least 19 months ago, it would seem that you could let by-gones be by-gones." I was told once again they could see whomever they wanted. I was not told what I had written, what the issues were, nor where I had written a negative review.  As I left, I did tell the receptionist that since I was not being given the courtesy of an explanation, that I was left with no choice but to leave a bad review, and she agreed that that would be fine. I would much rather have had a conversation.  As a health care professional myself, I cannot imagine not seeing someone just because they got frustrated one time in the past.  Also, it seems that bad reviews would prompt one to address the issues rather than fire the patients.

name: B L
text: We had a very good experience here. The receptionist was SO KIND. She went above and beyond to help us. The dr was very direct and well spoken. Nurses were kind. Fastest service ever at an urgent care.

name: Johnny Birge
text:
One of the rudest facilities I have EVER been to. The nursing staff was the most UNPROFESSIONAL I have encountered. Their manner of speaking to the patient, their lack of privacy, and their general practice as health care providers left me in utter disbelief!
The doctor did seem much more professional however.

name: Megan McDonald
text: I had the BEST experience here. The staff is awesome and Dr. Pettway was very sweet and made me feel really listened too. I will definitely switch from using American Family Care. Highly recommend this place!

name: rachel mathai
text: This office is very professional and very quick. I felt extremely comfortable in seeking medical care and received by far the best medical care in awhile. If needed I will definitely return and honestly I am very grateful for the care I received while I was there.

name: Brad Dixon
text: Just called today to ask a few questions prior to my visit and the woman who answered the phone was so incredibly rude. Spoke over me and didn't care to listen to my questions. Mighty fine first impression. I'll never go here.

name: bo thuston
text: In the past two years I have been there many times to have my blood pressure checked - always fast and friendly. Not today, there's a witch up front who wants to know " why do you want it checked ? " Duh!  After some more runaround from her I went elsewhere. Hope she was temporary because it's convenient and always been nice before.

resp.text: We see your post and our records confirm that you have never been seen at our clinic. It seems you have mistaken us and have us confused with a different clinic. You are welcome to contact us to see if we can be of service to you.

name: Richann Stage
text: Pleasant place to go when you aren't feeling well. Nice, friendly staff. Doctors are great too. Quick visits, knowledgeable staff and no billing issues. The follow up phone calls are a nice bonus.

name: mike chapman
text: Summit Express was recommended by a coworker after frustratingly long wait times to see a clinician. I have been going to Summit express for a few years now and always have gotten in to see a doctor in less than 5 minutes. Great staff, efficient service!

name: Christina Gammage
text: I have been employed there for about 7 months now. I absolutely love being a Medical Assistant here. Mr. Pettway and Dr. Pettway provide so much growth to new Medical Assistants. The practice is a busy practice and it requires the type of employees that are fast, efficient and have  the ability to multitask  with a smile. Dr. Pettway is an excellent Physician and an awesome boss. I know that I will definitely work here until she decide to retire.

name: Jamey S
text:
Staff was not very friendly or helpful. Called around looking for cash prices for my daughter who lives near there. Dr Petway’s staff was very annoyed with having to answer my questions and would not describe their services offered. (Seems they treat coughs) The cash fee was high I thought at $150. They put me on hold multiple times and finally just hung up on me. I did call back, and it was clear they had hung up on me.

Just really rude, discourteous treatment, and an apparent disconnect from the free market and how hard I have to work for the $150 one would assume they need people to bring in and turn over to them. I just work too hard for my money to spend it with people who treat me like that. So I went to Med Help for $100. Lower price and more dignified treatment of the customer.

name: Carole Murray
text: There was not a long wait.  The receptionist and nurse were professional and thorough. The doctor made sure I understood all of the discharge instructions.  I will come back.

name: Nora Gilchrist
text:
The Dr listened and had a good grasp on the problem. I have allergies which makes it hard to treat with a number of medicines but he quickly found alternatives. The nurses wasted no time...very knowledgeable and kind.

This clinic was clean and well kept. And I am thankful that I found it for future needs for my family.

name: Ashten Dick
text: Love Dr. Pettway and the nurses at Summit Express! Been going to them for years, even more so than my primary physician. They’re hours fit my work schedule, the wait is always short, and it’s very clean! I definitely recommend visiting this urgent care!

name: Kay Wins
text: Nice facility. Good hours. Fast service. The staff was knowledgeable and friendly. They even called to follow up on how I was feeling after my visit!

name: The Larry Russo Trio Russo
text: Labor day weekend! No other patients! Dr. there told me to go to the E.R ! How this ? got in medical school is scary! we all aware that medical malpractice is 3rd leading cause of death in the U.S  I have never been diagnosed without being seen? I would recommend AMERICAN Family Care if you are sick!! Hopefully you won't waste your time with mystical powers of medicine

name: Jeremy Williams
text:
Not worth the time ...... just go to the pharmacy it's more helpful!

Response to summit: I have bcbs of Alabama premier plan so .... next excuse? And your front desk clerk is rude.

resp.text: We are sorry but we are unable to participate with every insurance plan.

name: Robin Battles
text: Dr. Pettway and all her staff are courteous, friendly & caring. While extremely professional  & efficient, no long wait period, they take time to listen. And best is the excellent diagnosing & treatment. I highly recommend!!

name: Andrea Hays
text: It was a very pleasant experience! They were so friendly and got me in and out! I would definitely recommend this urgent care!

name: Sandra Hood
text: Very clean. Very professional. Very courteous. Very kind. We were traveling and developed shingles and I could not have asked for better care.

name: April Simpson
text: My family and I always have the best experience at Summit Express in Vestavia. The doctors and everyone working there are so pleasant and helpful. Dr. Pettway has become our ‘go-to’ doctor for urgent care. I can’t recommend this business enough!

name: Robin Brooks
text: Got me in and out quickly. Staff was down to earth and made me laugh. My nurse felt like i had know her for years. Dr was to the point and thorough. Excellent!.

name: IBK
text: Awesome staff... fast, courteous and knowledgeable. Accurate diagnosis and correct prescriptions assigned based on diagnosis.

name: Johanna Kron
text: Great doctors, perfect bedside manner. Will help treat the symptoms that need the treatment, while also guiding you to long term preventative solutions. Best urgent care in town!

name: Latoya Hood
text: This was my second time visiting Summit Express Urgent Care. Both times were great experiences for me. The care I recieved when I arrived until the time I left was excellent. Very professional! Clean facility! Great Staff! Dr Pettaway was funny polite and made me feel at ease. I highly recommend this Urgent Care to everyone. You want regret it!

name: sara mahaffey
text: Excellent service!  Never a long wait, fabulous staff and doctor.  Always receive a check up call the next day to make sure how I'm feeling and ate meds working.  Recommend Summit to everyone I know.

name: Candace Bivens
text: I give Summit Express Urgent Care 2 thumbs up! I was experiencing foot pain after a fall and drove by the clinic and decided to stop by. First the waiting room was very clean, and I was immediately greeted by the nurse upon entering. She made me feel so welcome. She even walked the paperwork to me since my foot was hurting. Even though I was a walk in and others were there needing medical attention, I was able to go into a room and speak with a nurse within 10 min! X-rays were needed, done and evaluated in a very timely manor! I really loved my experience. There was little to no wait time, and the staff was very professional and courteous. I will not hesitate to go back if I have another urgent need in the future!! Everyone needs to go to Summit Express Urgent Care!

name: Frank Scott
text: The staff at Summit Express is completely unprofessional and lacking in basic healthcare knowledge. According to their published mission statement, "We will apply innovative concepts and techniques to ensure the best possible outcomes for our patients." They stop way short of innovative when they are apparently unaware that a single prescribed antibiotic is not necessarily effective for every patient. A layperson can find this information with a quick Google search. Even when this information was pointed out, there was a point blank refusal to find a antibiotic that would work for the unrelenting symptoms. I strongly recommend that patients find an alternative to this urgent care facility.

name: Holly Johnson
text: Dr. Pettway and her staff are awesome!  So professional and very efficient.  Added bonus: they always make a courtesy call the next day to check on the patient.

name: Tish Tillis
text: Very friendly staff and very efficient. I highly recommend Summit Clinic!

name: Caleb Cole
text: They have an amazing group. Very excellent.

name: Ross U
text: Have visited multiple times over the last 2 to 3 years. Pollen and ragweed allergies bring often cases of strep and/or ear infections and the staff has always been quick, kind and pleasant. Never had to wait long. I never hesitate to return.

name: Scott G
text: Great experience!  They were kind, curious and proficient.  It was my first visit and will definitely go back.  MSG

name: Carli Small
text: Really top notch quality for an urgent care.  I have been twice and have never spent more than an hour, which included thorough testing and a doctor who actually listened.  Hardly any wait. Highly recommend.

name: Sherry Armstrong
text: They were fast and efficient and very friendly.  And I feel much better today.  Will definitely go back when the need arises.

name: Lucy Gilmore
text: I have the most respect for Dr. Pettway, her nurses, and her staff.  Thank you for quickly getting me in and diagnosing me.  It is nice to know that you are in Vestavia Hills.

name: Ryas Esdale
text: If you are trying to decide which Urgent Care to go to, choose this one. All of the staff is incredibly friendly, and they are so attentive to your symptoms. Dr. Pettway gave me exactly what I needed, and I have felt so much better since I left. A big thank you to their staff and if I am ever sick again I know where I will be going!

name: Jan Bradford
text: Great place for urgent care.  Was seen quickly, very caring and super clean facility.

name: Alexis (Lexi) Tackaberry
text: Made an appointment and when I was called back I told my symptoms (I had mono). I said I just wanted to have a mono test done. She said okay we can definitely do one of those. Then the doctor comes in and announces I’m dehydrated and needed to go to the ER. She denied my service. I went and I was not severely dehydrated but I do have a positive test for mono. This places should be monitored. As a med student, that nasty doctor should never see any other patient.

name: J Freeman
text: My family and I have all used these guys multiple times and had great experiences every time fast friendly get you in and out and get you well!!! Thanks so much!!

name: Todd Breckenridge
text: They saw both my boys in back to back days when we were traveling and were great.  Very friendly and accommodating. Would reccomend going if needed.

name: Katie Poole
text: Always easy to get in and out in a timely manner and always well take care of.

name: Jody Thrash
text: I filled out the paperwork online and then was asked almost the same questions by the nurse who then wrote down incorrect answers. When asked about past surgeries, I said I had my tubes tied and she wrote down hysterectomy. On my release paperwork, it said I was in menopause when I was there for strep and it was never discussed and I am most certainly NOT menopausal. Making up things about someone or documenting incorrect information on my medical records is not cool. I was not better by mid-week and was told to call back if that was the case. I do so and all they told me to do was come in and see another doctor. If your rotating staff refuse to treat patients seen by someone else in your practice, I can go see my ACTUAL doctor and  get better comprehensive care. This place was a waste of my time and money. Will not be back and will warn all I know to stay far away.

name: Denise Bivin
text: Had good service there until our last visit. Now I won’t go back. Not only did my child get worse after going but the injection site is still swollen and there’s a knot under her skin. The receptionist is rude and unhelpful. We had to go somewhere else to be correctly diagnosed and treated.

name: S Ireland
text: Today was the Second time I visited Summit express urgent care.  It is very clean, time efficient, and the friendly staff takes time to explain test results and prescriptions. Both times I was there approx 45 minutes, start to finish.

name: Tina Monroe
text: I highly recommend SEUC.  I was in and out in an hour.  The entire staff were pleasant and very helpful.  The Dr is one of the best doctors I've ever seen. I will definitely use them again.

name: Shannan Easter
text: Dr. Pettway and her nurses are friendly, fast and professional. It's a great, clean place to go when you need a doc in a hurry.

name: Phillip adams
text: The doctor and nurses were very friendly and accommodating. We arrived shortly before closing and they saw myself and young daughter.

name: Katrice Gilder
text: I went in on yesterday for the first time because of pain I'd been having most of the week in my right toe, I was quickly checked in and seen. The front clerk noticed that I sounded congested and suggested I get that looked into as well while I was there and I did. Everyone was so nice and friendly and I was thoroughly looked at and out in bout 45mins. Will definitely be coming back for any future needs.

name: Caroline Wright
text: I wish I could give ZERO stars!  I paid $150 cash for my visit only to be referred to someone else.  The doctor would not listen!

name: Calvin Gray
text: My wife and two daughters were just turned away and refused to treat them because we didn't have every penny of the "contracted amount" between them and my insurance provider. REFUSED to bill me like every other doctor or urgent care that we have visited in the past year, and who I've paid like always. We won't be going back there ever.  Not everybody has $500 to spare these days, at least we dont being a one income family, but they sure are gonna make you pay it or send you away sick.  So much for do no harm right?  I wonder how they would feel if they were in the same position? Probably just as appalled and mad as I am.

name: Sonya Wilson
text: Dr. Pettway and her staff and Summit Express have practically become our go to Family Medicine stop! They are so helpful and even take the time to follow up the next day to see how you are feeling. This is so much more than a regular Urgent Care place!

name: Amy Bromberg
text: This place is AMAZING!!! My husband and I have been in separately and saw different doctors, but both of us had a wonderful experience! We were each seen quickly, diagnosed properly, treated and out the door within an hour. Today, I went in with my kids for the first time (ages 1 and 2). Again, we were seen quickly, diagnosed, and treated. The entire staff is fabulous. I cannot say enough good things about the nurses, especially. One of them physically sat on the floor with my child to administer a breathing treatment. Previously with breathing treatments at another facility, I've been left alone with a screaming child and a face mask. That was not the case today! Really, her telling me "It's ok" as he climbed out of my lap and she sat on the floor with him just blew me away. Another nurse administered the breathing treatment to my other child, and he usually hates them! Not a test was shed! So thankful for them!!! I wish they'd be our Primary Care-the overall experience is lightyears better than any I've experienced both as an adult and with my kids!

name: Brian Johnson
text: We were in town visiting and my wife's sinus congestion required immediate attention. Dr. Pettway was outstanding in her promptness, kindness and her sense of humor. Melanie, the young lady who assisted us, had a personality and bedside manner that complimented Dr. Pettway's. I highly recommend this clinic. We were in and out within in 1 hour.

name: Shann Mincey
text: Clean nice people very quick!  Best urgent care that I’ve ever been to.

name: Tiffany Solomon
text: Exceptional and Quick Service Always!! Dr. Pettway and staff are Awesome!

name: Rhonda
text: We took my mother in law in to have her urine checked for a UTI.. We even called ahead to let them know we were coming in to check for UTI.  The doctor had the nurse come in and tell us after we got there that she would not check for a UTI.... and they were closing in 7 minutes. The doctor offered no reason... Luckily we found another medical care place that stayed open until 8pm...We will never return to Summit Express!

name: Jimmy Stout
text: In and out with no issues. Medical Assistant had excellent rapport

name: Kristy Flynn
text: They saw my daughter because the pediatrician's office could not get her in until late in the day.  They were great here!

name: Sam Mary Frances Bowles
text: Clean facility, personable and efficient staff, doctor was so nice and did not rush out of my room. Will recommend them from now on.

name: Casey Pilgrim
text: The wait was next to nothing, the staff was very friendly, and the doctor was very easy to deal with.  I had given up on urgent care facilities, but when my arm started bothering me, I decided to give Dr. Pettway a visit and see what happened.  My experience was very pleasant, and my visit was no longer than it needed to be...no waiting for an hour in the lobby, no waiting in the patient room for another hour, nothing.  I was in and out without any problems.  I would highly recommend to anyone looking to not lose an entire day at the doctor's office for something that shouldn't take more than an hour.  I was in and out, including x-rays, in 45 minutes flat.  No one likes to go to the doctor, but if I have to go again, this is where I'm going.

name: Linda Evans
text: They are always quick in getting you in to see the doctor. You never have to wait very long.

name: S N
text: Avoid this place like the plague. Unprofessional and incompetent. I have had better service at a fast food restaurant.

name: Anna Kate Lucas
text: So kind! I had to get multiple shots and strep and flu tests and they were very gentle

name: C P
text: This was the most pleasant urgent care experience I have ever had.  Thank you SEUC for your skill and exemplary customer service.

name: Tracey Flitcroft
text: Have gone twice within 8 months of each visit and turned away while signing my name because of my symptoms and each time I'm told to go to the emergency room. So lesson to those out there don't go here if you have a stomach virus let alone have a hinkling you are ill.

name: Besther Dubose
text: This is the best urgent care facility I have ever visited. They are always fast, friendly and accurate.

name: Aislynn Thomas
text: My mom works there Chablis King and she is great she makes everybody feel better.

name: Jen McCorkle
text:
I gave one star because it was the ONLY Option.

Do NOT go Here. The MD Dr Pettaway refused to see me because I had a dermatological issue-  due to severe allergies. .... It was humiliating to be refused care. She was unprofessional and unethical in doing so. She didn't even examine me. Her assistant did. Last time I checked MA's do not have Medical Degrees in Medicine.

Complete waste of My Time and my Energy when not feeling well. Being insulted and turned away is a first for me ..... I've spent years in the medical field myself - shocked.

name: Susan Pannell
text: Knowledgeable and super kind staff.  Dr Pettway is an excellent and caring physician.

name: Leslie King
text: Great fast care for my entire family.

name: Laura Ezell
text: Summit Express is very friendly, and effective. Highly recommend!!

name: M M
text:
I have never before been denied basic service (a work-related physical) by a doctor, but it happened here.  After taking time off from work and calling ahead to verify that this office does employment physicals, the nurse informed me that Dr. Pettway was "uncomfortable" with doing my annual physical.  Given that there were signs up in the lobby advertising for pre-employent and school-related physicals, it is clear to me that I was being discriminated against for some reason that was not communicated.

Avoid this doctor if you value your time and self-respect.

name: Chelsea Ryles
text: Refused care due to a pulled muscle in the back ...I’ve literally never heard of an urgent care not seeing someone for a pulled muscle ..I’ve been to several that have ...Dr. Didn’t even come out to explain ...

name: Cella Long (cella)
text: Nice staff, quality care.

name: austin ward
text: These people don't know what the heck they are talking about. I went in having a allergic reaction. For starters the desk clerk starts spouting off what she thinks the diagnosis is before I can even sign in. That should have been red flag number one. The "Doctor" calls me back, looks at my arm for literally 5 seconds and tells me I have cellulitis. She never physically touched me or took my vitals. She refuses to treat me and directs me to an emergency room. Upon arriving at the er I'm immediately put on "fast track". The diagnosis, an allergic reaction. Thank you summit emergency for costing me $2000 to get some antibiotics. Worst walk in clinic in bham, period. I only went to this clinic because of the great reviews they had in comparison to the others in town. Don't be fooled. The medhelp on columbiana and lakeshore or the afc on 280 are much better clinics with much more knowledgeable doctors. I know from experience.

name: Amber Huie
text: I went in because I was having some numbness in my eyebrow. Dr. Pettway stood behind the receptionist desk and told me that they couldn’t do anything for me there and “it sounds kind of like MS”. She never did any kind of physical exam, tests, or even had a long conversation with me before coming to this conclusion. It is very unprofessional to tell someone they might have a serious illness such as multiple sclerosis based on a few physical findings. I will never go back.

name: Carol Walden
text: Very little wait!  The Doctor and nurses were so professional and attentive and got me on the road to recovery from Strep Throat!

name: Josh Brooks
text: Refused to see me. Asked if my chest congestion was severe and I said yes that's why I'm here and she said if it's severe you will have to go to the er. Urgent care it's an inaccurate description

name: Clint Deerman
text: Excellent staff and care!

name: Kristin Avis
text: Very efficient and great care!

name: Steven Allison
text: Worst service I have ever seen. Rude front desk receptionist.

name: Kara Myers
text: Fast, courteous and professional service!

name: L B
text: Great thorough doctor!

name: Amanda Valencia
text: The doctor didn't want to see me because I don't live here. I travel for work and am rarely home. I couldn't get medical attention when I needed it because I don't live in this state. Very disappointing that a doctor would turn away someone in need.

name: Alan Bigbee
text: Professional and quick.

name: Tina G.
text: No care provided; waste of time.

name: A Heintz
text: Only place in town where I could get a PCR for travel on a Sunday. Dr An was very kind as was Daniel, who performed the PCR test. Results took almost 48 hours to receive due to uptick in cases so plan accordingly.

name: Bobbie Jones
text: COVID testing was easy and quick. Staff was helpful as well.

name: Revnow Media
text: GREAT Dr HORRIBLE front office staff. So bad and so unhelpful and so rude that I just left!! Been there before and the Dr is great but chose not to see him because of horrible front office

name: crystal walker
text: Love VUC, Dr An is great. The staff is friendly & seldom a long wait

name: Calyn Harper
text: Horrible. I was the last patient seen before the doctor went on vacation and he was supposed to send my prescription in, he never did. He didn’t even write my prescription in his notes and I’m still sick. I’ll now have to go somewhere else and actually get some help.

name: Queann Williams
text:
I’ve honestly never experienced a doctors visit like this. The front desk staff is very rude especially Kelsey. The service was so terrible that I literally had to get up and leave and go across the street to the urgent care. I’ve never experienced anything like this. Kelsey was very unprofessional and not Patient at all. I will honestly never recommend ANYONE  to this facility,
I went across the street to your family care and got the best service. They also do not place people ahead of me because  u was transferring money from one account to another.

name: VAUGHN BILLING
text: This office is AWESOME especially considering how busy it has been with all the COVID testing.  Every person that works in the medical field is exhausted and more patients should realize that.  When you pull in to the parking lot and see that there are 30+ cars, you know there is going to be a long wait.  They have had to deal with seeing over 100 patients a day some weeks and when they are that busy it can be rough.  I thank EVERY employee that works there during all this COVID caos.

name: Jeremy Swindle
text: This is a bad place...go somewhere else. At one time it was the best place to go when you were sick...not anymore. Dr An is a good Dr but his staff is very rude, not helpful, annoyed by you...just overall not a good place anymore. There are several other places close by that offer better services.

name: Laird Willis
text: They were too lazy to do blood work after I had called the day before to make sure that they would do it.  They wasted my time and time off from work!

name: Guy Fawkes
text: I agree with some of the other posts - this place has gone downhill.  No communication, the staff are terrible.  Rude.  Won't call you back.

name: JTF “Ty”
text: On balance, the medical services performed by the Nurse Practitioner were satisfactory, but the patient relations/customer service was lacking. I was in pain with a bad abscess and felt like I was an inconvenience to their Sunday afternoon. Further, after a few weeks I received a call AT WORK demanding payment for services rendered when they had not even finished the insurance filing or sent me any kind of bill or invoice. I told them to send me something via my personal email and I would pay it that night. Nothing. I called the next day and asked where was the email invoice? After being placed on hold for several minutes, someone came to the phone and said the bills would go out in the next few weeks. I expressed my dissatisfaction of being harassed at work to pay a bill that would not even be sent for another three weeks as it turns out. Extremely unprofessional and unethical business practices. All this over $66 I owed on my deductible.

name: Arnold Benedict
text: I had left a fairly negative review yesterday - although I did say that Dr. An and his nurses were good, and the reviews bashing them are unwarranted.  I had made two telehealth appointments last week, and neither time were they returned (I see a negative review about this below, so obviously I'm not the only person this happened to).  Finally, the front desk told me yesterday that they couldn't do a telehealth appointment for my prescription refills and that's why I wasn't called.  I was, as you can imagine, a little miffed.  I can understand if they need to see me, but you don't just "not call." - Let the person know why the telehealth appointment won't work so they can schedule to get in.  In any event, Dr. An personally called me this morning and was apologetic.  Their office has been overwhelmed, and I can understand that.  No place is perfect (I certainly am not, and I make mistakes too).  So - the personal apology goes a long way and speaks well of him.  As I had even said in my negative review, I've been seeing him for a while, and always liked him.  And, my experience with his nurses has always been fine, and I have found them pleasant.  One or two of the front desk staff can be off-putting, but most of them are fine too - and it's hard to find good help these days.  So, overall, I'm changing this review.  Yes, the situation last week (not calling me for my telehealth appointments and not even calling to tell me why, so I could get in) was not professional.  But, again, no place is perfect, and I appreciate the apology and the fact that they were overwhelmed.  Probably the front desk staff needs to be a little better trained and make sure to get back to people if a telehealth appointment is not met (by the Dr.).  But, again, overall, I have been very pleased with Dr. An over the years.  I had even said in my review that I would probably still give him/them another chance - and the personal call from him apologizing and then taking care of my needs and basically conducting the telehealth call right then - certainly corrected the matter, and speaks well of him/the place.  I always appreciate when someone cares enough about a complaint to call and try to make it right.  I'll be sticking with him, and can still certainly recommend him (and have recommended numerous people to him who have become his patients and have also generally been very pleased with him).

name: James Hall
text: Front Desk great, nursing staff is beyond incompetent, dangerously so. Did not understand basic referral authorization process and had toxic response to being asked to do basic medical referral process. highly encourage looking elsewhere for medical care

name: P JJ
text:
Waited an hour and Dr had to "go to the bank"
Said it would be an hour additional wt

name: Татьяна Бакиева
text: Always happy with Dr.An. So many times was in Physicians to Children with my kuds  and did more get normal treatment and come back to Dr. Ann for help then. He is very professional doctor.

name: okia landrum
text: I have been using Vaughn Urgent Care for years. Each time I go back I am more disappointed with the service. Walked in and no one even bothers to greet you. I walked up to the counter and still not one word. I was sitting there for 45 minutes and no one even called my name. I understand they were busy but no one even speaking to you is ridiculous. I had went to the new Primary Urgent Care across the street from them first. I have heard several great experiences from people who have gone there. I went in and was greeted and with a smile. They didn't take my insurance which is how I ended up at Vaughn Urgent Care. I left Vaughn Urgent Care without being seen after it had reached a hour. I came back to Primary Urgent care and just paid out of pocket. I have no problem with the Dr's at Vaughn Urgent Care. Their staff is just rude and they need to fix it. I will not be going back.

name: Shane Wilkerson
text: I have used Vaughn Urgent Care many times in the past and was always pleased with service provided. So imagine my surprise when I was recently contacted by a collection agency for a bill. I was totally unaware I had any unpaid bill with them. This has hit my credit report in a negative way. Please make sure if you use their services you are paid in full. I always pay my bills on time. This bill was for around $100. I would have gladly paid it had I been aware. Needless to say I will not visit this establishment again because of their accounting practices.

name: Carrie Clark
text: I have to agree with another review on here... I have been going to this office for several years now, and each time I go back, I become more and more disappointed in the staff. Not one person smiled at me or asked me how I was doing- I was treated like I was just another body. I brought my ten month old in to see if she had yet another ear infection, as her pediatrician's office was closed due to it being on a Sunday... I was taken to the back with another patient, and given attitude when they realized my ten month old couldn't STAND for a weight check... finally they got her a pad to sit on, then was immediately told to go to a room, in which a gentleman had JUST walked out of. I questioned whether the room was even clean, and an assistant popped out and very rudely announced- "YES its clean... that is where I just came from... why is there a problem!?". I responded to her that I just watched someone walk out of the room while we were getting a weight check, and that I was simply asking a question. I do not believe that to be out of line. I have been in the medical field for over 12 years and have NEVER talked to a patient in response to their VALID concerns about whether a room was clean or not. I would have been fired on the spot if I had responded that way to a patient. I should note the room looked dirty...both trash can lids were left up and there was debris on the counter. The tech came back in to get vitals, which was un- successful because my daughter wouldn't sit still long enough for the monitor to work... so instead of changing the approach she just decided she would tell the doctor she couldn't get it done. Dr. An has always been wonderful- but did not offer an apology for the way his staff treated me- even though he witnessed it and made eye contact with me from his desk in the middle of the op floor. I truly believe any office is only as good as the staff they have working for them, and I hate to say I probably will not endure his staff to see him any longer. It doesn't take much effort to be kind and compassionate- two things the practice website claims they compensate their employees for being. If I was not totally desperate to get my baby an antibiotic for her ear, I would have asked for my co-payment to be returned and left.

name: Aggie Mae
text: The staff was friendly but I will not come back for a blood draw. There was no arm rest chair and 4 vials of blood were taken from my unsupported arm which made for unnecessary pain, and my arm is still sore today with a bruise. I'm not sure that the tourniquet procedure was done correctly either.  I've had this done twice before at another lab and never had pain or complications. Again, nice ladies but I will have to find another facility for blood draws.

name: Latesha L.
text: The reason you cannot get good service and treatment at this place is most likely because the staff are obviously too busy online giving this place 5 star ratings when it's not deserved! Do NOT go to this place if you are seeking a physician and staff who cares about your well being! Dr. An came into the room, looking like he was all doped up and about to pass out, asked me 2 questions and I never seen nor heard from him again. The medical assistant does not know to draw blood, sticking me 3 different times, blowing one of my veins which had my hand hurting and extremely bruised for over a week. I have filed a complaint. I have never had to hunt down a doctor to obtain my test results (CT scan, blood work and urine). I paid a lucrative amount of money for the services rendered at this office and feel like it was a waste of my time and money going to Vaughn Urgent Care. I could've and should've just gone to the emergency room because I waited just as long at this place, only to have the incompetent Dr. An come in ask me 2 questions and show zero concern or compassion for my health. I wouldn't recommend this place to my worse enemy if I had one. Go elsewhere with your health concerns because the staff at this place is absolutely horrific! If I could give zero stars I would.

name: Britlito Drillacat
text: This place was ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE. The Staff was unbothered completely ready to check out and go home. Not friendly. The Doctor didnt even look at my issue and I'm pretty sure he doesnt even know what my issue was because you could tell he wasnt listening. They didnt provide me with ANY discharge paperwork and didnt even let me know anything about picking up meds in the end. This was TRASH service all around. Never again.

name: Gina Curvin
text: Must be nice when you can decide that you want to go home early and not to honor the posted hours. Arrived at 7:14pm on 9/12/19 and the door was locked. They tried to ignore me but another patient also walked up to the door. They came and said we're closed.  I pointed to the door with your hours which clearly says 8:00pm. She said she would have to check. She came back and told me the nurse practitioner didn't want to see any more patients and needed to leave early. So I asked are you able to change your hours without notice and all she said was sorry, she's not seeing any more patients. My last visit to your office.

name: Ashley Scanlan
text: STAY AWAY!!!!!!!!!! The office staff is terrible, inconsiderate, and do not know how to tell time. I was tuned away at 7:15pm w my boyfriend who was running an almost 104 degree fever (which I made them aware of) bc the nurse practitioner was “really slow”. I was also told they closed in 30 min.... (that’s scary considering a nurse is supposed to be pretty good in math) There was no sign posted on the door or anywhere for that matter about them closing early. Just their normal business hours on the door “8am-8pm Mon-Fri”.

name: Ron Nesbitt
text: Dr An and his staff are competent, quick and courteous.  The wait usually is not too bad. The wait tends to be a bit longer right at opening time (8am).  You get into the treatment room and the doctor sees you in a reasonable time.  I have been here many times over the past two years for myself or for my teenage boys.  I highly recommend this Urgent Care facility.

name: Vikki Faulk
text: From the 1st call to visit ALL STAFF is very Professional!!  Dr An is the Greatest Dr. you can ask for!  He NEVER GAVE UP!!  He saved MY LIFE!! GOD BLESS

name: Gabriel Ramos
text: Very nice place. Nice staff. Were quick and didn't waist time but also were friendly and helpful. They most definitely deserve the 5/5

name: Dawn Whitaker
text: Great experience today. I have a bad ear infection and I came to Vaughn Urgen Care because their reviews online are pretty good. As a new patient I expected a long wait and lots of paperwork, but the paperwork was minimal and I was in and out in under 30 minutes. The doctor did not waste time. I told him my ear was infected, he looked at it and confirmed it is in fact a bad infection. He called in my prescriptions (antibiotics and medicated ear drops) then told me to feel better and sent me on my way. I like a doctor who listens to me and doesn’t waste my time. Very professional and kind staff. I will be coming back to this urgent care next time I need to see a doctor fast.

name: Jeffrey Young
text: If you've experienced the need for medical care while traveling, you know how uncomfortable it can be dealing with pain while in a foreign place. I've been traveling to Montgomery for work and had occasion to visit Vaughn on a recent trip. The staff and doctor were able to see me and provide me with some relief within a day. Everyone was very courteous and professional and also down-to-earth. I hope I don't need to go back but if I do, I trust I will be in good hands! Highly recommended.

name: Will Daniels
text: They are very friendly and efficient. I would highly recommend them over any of the other care centers. I was quite impressed on how fast they got me in and out. Awesome!

name: Laura Hughes
text:
Everyone on the east side of Montgomery LOVES Dr. An and his staff.  Get in --- and get out....That's the way to see the doctor!

Professional, courteous, and knowledgeable.  I always feel like I'm in good hands with Dr. An and his staff.

name: Carol Rueve
text: Very Professional staff. Always have wait time that is very reasonable to deal with. Would encourage it to all.

name: Rebecca
text: I sat waiting for the dr for 2 hours, he came into the room.... talked to me for 2 mins and left. No one popped their head in to check on me or even prep. I know Montgomery is slow, but that insulting! Communication, and my time should be respected. Unfortunately, here its not

name: BRYAN DARLEY
text:
Excellent care from Dr An and staff!
Highly recommend 😎👍

name: Colts Fan
text:
Very professional Dr An is pleasant to see. He really helped me get healthier!
Carey Bieber

name: Mocha Hotte'
text: I had an excellent experience at this facility. Dr. Ahn and staff were friendly and very professional. The wait time was not long at all even though there were a couple of people ahead of me. The office was very neat and clean. Most important of all, Dr. Ahn did an excellent job as a physician. I finally got the medical attention that I needed. I have already been recommending him to family and friends. Keep up the GREAT work everyone!!!😆

text: Quick visit Since i wasn't near my usual physician. Front Staff isnt so perky -but i understand. The LPN that administered my injections was outstanding! Was completely professional and was kind enough to answer my questions. He explained what he saw and what it indicated.  He's just as caring as my primary care physician.

name: Lkshphillips

The staff was great! The facility was clean with a nice atmosphere.

name: Riketa Johnson
text: The EastSide Urgent care This place ruined my entire life how can a person come here and take a drug test for a job that they have had for a year and pass due to no drugs in their system but fail due to a small piece of the line where the temperature line is was not all the way shaded in is ridiculous. They black young lady was very rude to my husband he has a hernia mesh in his stomach close to his private area he passed why would you keep making him strain himself to use the bathroom for you then to watch him take his 2nd and 3rd sample what kinda of training is this. What kind of customer service do you people think that you are providing y’all ruined my life and I would like you to know that you made this man lose his job when he passed clear as day but hmm no proof because you know it’s all about who you get don’t know the lady name but she needs to be fired and lose her job too this place is for Caucasian people I guess because they treat black people here any kind of place here do not go here if your black especially I also want to know why wasn’t his urine sample sent to a lab as she said she would have to do this was never done lies and she needs her job taken away 2

text: Absolutely the rudest person to take vitals I've ever seen... Complete with a door slam... Hoping the Dr is better...

text:
Long story short, Dr. An diagnosed me with a sinus headache. I did not have any sinus or chest congestion, runny nose, ear inflammation, etc. Even after I told him I knew it wasn't a sinus headache based on my symptoms (headache, fever, nausea, pain with eye movement), he was persistent in his diagnosis.

Turns out, I didn't have a sinus headache. I HAD MENINGITIS.

name: All Around Arbiter
text: I love the staff and the office.Everybody was kind,courteous and professional.Dr.An is brilliant!

name: Rebecca Ensley
text:
Great experience. The Doctor Thang An, Do did a great job. They saw me very quickly.  His nurse and the front staff were nice . I would suggest going again. I live about 26 miles away. It was worth the drive prattville urgent  care and pri-med could learn a lot.
Thanks for your service!!!

name: Lee Walker
text: Dr. An is the best.  Staff is excellent.  Love this place.

name: Jason Evans
text: Friendly staff and the doctors are great. Never a long wait.

name: Xris blonk
text: Great experience - everyone was so friendly and helpful.

name: Heather P
text: My experience taking my kids was fine, but I am frustrated by their unorganized and questionable payment process. Months after a visit, I received a letter stating I had 15 days to make a $20 payment before it would be referred to a collections agency and that they had sent 3 previous letters. I never received any of those letters. They told me to call them. I tried multiple times during hours that an urgent care should answer their phone and no one did. The letter had no substantiation as to why I owed the $20 in the first place. When I finally did reach someone, they told me to pay online or come to the office. Why the online payment info wasn't in the original letter is beyond me.

name: Jinsook Baek
text: Doctor is friendly

name: Madison Smith
text: I love them. They really do their best to take care of me! Even when they’re absolutely booked, they give me a time to look forward to and do their best to work me in. Today specifically I feel they went above and beyond, even though we don’t know what’s wrong with me, they’re going to send in test to try and figure it out! They do a great job at follow up, and always give a when you can return to school/work without even being asked. All there staff are very nice and I feel they take me seriously. Plus the facility is brand new and looks amazing. I’m very thankful for their care!

name: Jennifer Neal
text: I have never had a good experience here!!! I have went there 3 or 4 times ? I waa the 2nd one there before they even opened in line .she tells me to wait in car. And text the number to fill out paper work(very rude) so i do that only to have it say there is no record of me checking in ? Aftter several attempts to get them to anwser she does to say im checked in ? I sit in my car 2 hours 20 min sick as a dog waiting? Calling them to never get a anwser again ?so i couldnt take the heat any longer and had ro go hime and they call me to come in not long after i got home ?? Its always the fromt workers and the ones giving instructions that are so rude ? The drs nurses are wonderful !!if u can get too them? Before dying? I was there for covid test !! I just dont understand making someone sick to wait that long when they were 2nd in line !!! 20 people went in and out while i waited

name: Kayla Smith
text:
I went for a suspected ankle injury (at 3:55 this Sunday -noting they are open until 5pm), and did what the sign in the parking lot said: “text ___ to check in”. So I did, it gave me three options, one being Imaging (which is what I presumed I needed). After checking in and waiting in the parking lot for 45 minutes (now being a little after 4:30), I decided to *painfully* hobble to the door and ask if I was going to be seen. The lady informed me that they had stopped seeing patients a few hours before.

Very disappointed, as with all this covid, the last place I want to go is the ER, so I suppose I will wait until tomorrow. I will give the lady that helped me a star, because she was nice enough, and offered me a wheelchair to get back to my car.

name: Carol Denise
text: Three times on seperate occasions I have been turned away because of different reasons and very rude. 1st time I had to go to ER just to have someone check my blood sugar because we had just moved to Cullman and didn't have a family doctor. 2nd time was for my blood pressure and tonight I have a kidney infection and she cut me off rudely and said they closed at 7:30 and had patients. I was going to explain that my doctor had me given me medicine for my kidney infection and had the empty bottle and appointment Thursday . I am not sitting in the ER for a kidney infection. Everytime I am cut off in mid sentence and left crying and just because I am old doesn't mean that I am stupid. I hope they don't treat their grandparents that way.

name: HHLA 53
text: Told us there only three person wait and we'd only wait. Get there and there are 9 people there and we were 5 min. away when I called. They water down the wait to get business in I feel like. Then we waited another hour to be seen. From check in time to being seen was nearly 2HOURS!

resp.text: If you would like for us to follow-up regarding your visit, please contact our Patient Advocate to share your experience and your concerns by calling (256) 737-2591. Thank you!

name: Rita Busbin
text: The staff at Urgent care was remarkable. Love the online check in. Dr. Petit and staff are top notch.

name: Anonymous
text: I am not one to ever share reviews at all, but seeing the others reviews just validates that something needs to be done about how rude these people are. From the moment I got back there, they were rolling their eyes and huffing and puffing about me requesting that my kid be tested. Once my kid was tested, which should have taken 15 minutes.. Nobody came back into our room for over an hour. There was only 2 other people there.. So there was no reason for the wait to be so long. Robin is super friendly, but the girls that take weights/info and swab you, etc are very rude and for no reason. If you can't be friendly with people, don't work with people.

name: Stephen Speciale
text: The cleanest urgent care facility in Cullman. Friendly staff and physicians. Highly recommended.

Erica at the front desk is quite possibly my most favorite human ever! She saved at least seven hours of my life!!!

Level of care is top notch and the compassion cannot be matched!!! The nurse even apologized when I started to gag on my throat swab.

A++

text: Staff was very courteous and kind! You can check in online or call when you get there. They were very busy, but I was still in and out within an hour. The offer on-site testing for COVID-19, with both rapid results and send off choices. I highly recommend this Urgent Care Center to anyone looking for a quick but thorough doctor visit.

name: Bruce Pratt
text: Great people and facility. Thanks

name: Kelley Hamilton
text: Nurse Kelly again was so amazing. She is so awesome with my daughter who has Down syndrome. The lady at the front desk was amazing as well. My daughter threw up as we were leaving and she just jumped up and started cleaning it up. So did Kelly. The nurse practitioner was great too. But Kelly always goes above and beyond and I appreciate that so much. 5 stars and highly recommend!!

name: mark emmert
text: Very happy with how I was treated, with everything going on with COVID and how many people was there, they did a great job at getting to me, nurses was kind and helpful and the doctor was awesome

name: Nathan Brock
text: You don’t need to COVID test everyone that walks through the door. I’m sure it’s a great insurance-grab, but it’s unnecessary.

resp.text: Unfortunately, COVID-19 causes such a variety of symptoms our providers are trying to make sure anyone with any possible COVID symptom is identified in order to stop the spread of COVID in our community.

name: Misty Goodlett
text: Dr. Varquez was so kind. She took her time and made me feel comfortable. Thank you for the quality of care you provided me. The staff is also to be commended; very friendly!

name: Katelyn Wright
text: Only giving them a one star because I HAVE to. What a pitiful excuse for a healthcare facility. Staff is rude and incompetent. NO ONE is on the same page as far as protocol or office policies. I was told by the NP that my send off COVID test would come back on Monday (I was tested on a Friday afternoon). I asked if the weekend would affect the timeliness of receiving results and she said no. My mom was tested on Saturday, the same facility, mind you; and she got her results back on Monday. When I called about my results, I was pretty much told by Kelly that I was a lying about my mom's test. She supposedly "looked up to see if her results were back and they weren't" yet someone called my mom to let her know she tested positive. Kelly was totally hateful about the whole situation. Do not even waste your time at this place.

name: linda thomas
text: I appreciate this facility being available instead of having to go to the ER or waiting for an appointment with my primary doctor! I had a fall and hurt my knee and shoulder on a Sunday afternoon. They had an X-ray tech available and I was in and out in no time.   The doctors I have seen here have been excellent! I would definitely recommend this place.

resp.text: Thanks for sharing! Thank you for choosing Cullman Regional for your health care.

name: Karen Sellers
text: I go and the male doctor that came in to see me did absolutely nothing to help me. I have fluid draining from my leg and his response is I can't help you here in the urgent care. Then charged me 65 dollars and he didn't even touch it. This is a poor excuse for health care

resp.text: Hi Karen - If you would like for us to follow-up regarding your visit, please contact our Patient Advocate to share your experience and your concerns by calling (256) 737-2591. Thank you!

text: I want my money back

text: Allison was amazing at getting me checked in and appointment time scheduled quickly, after I had waited an hour and not checked in by the initial worker who took my info( Samantha). Testing was made easy and results were fast.

name: Shelly
text: They was very quick on the testing but the rudest front desk persons ever. They faxed my husband and children’s test results to their place and employment, when I ask them to fax mine to my doctor’s office, the lady said, “we don’t do that and this facility.  We have never done that” well you did, 7 days ago, even called us to get the fax numbers of where to send it. So I don’t know what y’all did to get into trouble but your facility in fact did fax our paperwork and you stood there and called me a liar. So it is what it is... I pray I never have to come back and have any encounter with a few of these bitter ole bitties... horrible customer service with all these sick people... of you don’t like your job go find one that’s not dealing with the public 😡

name: Tiffany Jones
text: The staff is always wonderful and make you feel like a human being and not just a patient number. I tell everyone about the amazing treatment from here. They got us in a room in under 5 minutes. Got us treated in under 30 minutes. AND answered every question I had. They always warm and friendly. They make you feel like the service they would give their own family, is the services you receive. Love them all.

text: I was very pleased and surprised by the wait, the friendliness and professionalism. To be honest I felt like I was treated as family and I highly value the personable interaction. Thank you very much! I will more than likely make this my home urgent care from now on.

resp.text: Thanks for sharing! Thank you for choosing Cullman Regional for your health care.

name: Tammy Thrasher

name: D Martin
text: It was a very positive experience. I have received care here previously and it was a good experience. We were in and out very quickly. The lady with the needle in her hand did a wonderful job and not painful.

text: Awesome staff, got me in and out quickly.

name: Bipolar Bear
text: Everyone here is so very kind. They do their jobs well, with intelligence and professionalism. It doesn't feel like you're a cow being herded in and out. You can tell they truly care about their patients. I would highly recommend this Urgent Care Center.

text: This was my first time to visit this Urgent care as I don't get sick or need any type of ER or Urgent Care visits but the staff here are amazing, they really do care about their patients unlike some other places I have run into. name: Janet Widner
text: Staff are prompt and courteous, I saw the nurse practitioner and he was very thorough and spent plenty of time. The facility is always clean,  I love the online check in, I signed in last night for a time this morning and didn't wait long at all.

name: mbhurter623
text:
We arrived at 8:45 PM and although they were closing in 15 minutes the entire staff was friendly, accommodating and no one acted as if they were rushing to get us out.

The receptionist was kind and courteous and the nurse we had was a joy to deal with.

The Nurse Practioner was great,  well informed and extremely helpful.

resp.text: We're so glad you had a great experience! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience!

name: Frank George
text: Arrived 10 minutes before my “confirmed” online appointment. Didn’t get called back until 40 minutes after the appointment time. One of the most painstakingly slow places I have been to. This is your warning, the online confirmed appointment time means absolutely nothing and you will be there for 2+ hours. I will never return here.

resp.text: Mr. George - we are sorry to hear that your are disappointed with our service. We do are best to make the times of online appointments accurate & occasionally run later due to unexpected high volumes of walk-in patients. We typically notify patients before they arrive if we are running behind. We’ll do some education with our staff to improve this in the future. We hope you’ll give us another chance in the future.

name: Mary Beth Sellers
text: The staff is great and they were very thorough! I was in and out quickly and had a great experience. I love the Online Check-In feature so that you can wait from home. 5-star service for sure!

name: Honore Glenn
text: Excellent experience from the check-in process thru check-out. Very little wait time. The staff were all very customer service oriented, as well as the x-ray tech. Received great care, in a very friendly environment. Thank you, if I could give 10 stars, I would.

name: Wilma Whateley
text: Great staff. Speedy service. So glad that they are open late and have X-ray services! The online check in really did speed things up too. Immensely pleased that I didn’t have to go to the ER.

resp.text: We're so glad you had a great experience! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience!

name: Gary Wiggins
text: This is just an awesome Urgent Care!  The staff, nurses, and doctors are so friendly and caring.  The online registering is very nice, not having to wait forever in a waiting room.  You just couldn’t ask for more!!

resp.text: We're so glad you had a great experience! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience!

name: Delila Yates
text: This was my first time and will definitely be back.  The staff was very nice and made me feel comfortable. I was in and out.

name: Heather Vest
text: Registered online and was in and out in no time. Everyone was amazing!  Thank you for taking such good care of my niece. She said everyone was very compassionate and empathetic. She was treated appropriately and compassionately.

resp.text: We're so glad you had a great experience! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience!

name: Janet Widner
text: I went because of a injury to my shoulder, I was in and out in about 30 minutes.  The staff were excellent, so courteous. I will definitely be using this place if needed again and will recommend to my family and friends.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience!

name: Mark Bromley
text: Great team, great care, highly recommend them.

name: Erika Mead
text: Everyone was so wonderful and they got us in quickly! The only issue was that they do not take United healthcare. But everything else couldn't have gone better. And the cost was not that bad, even not being able to use our insurance.

resp.text: We now accept United Healthcare insurance, so we hope you’ll be back if you need care in the future.

name: Lauren Robbins
text: Wonderful staff and very clean facility. The CRNP was wonderful!

resp.text: Thanks for sharing! Thank you for choosing Cullman Regional for your health care.

name: Annette Palmer Johnson
text:
With my health issues, and a choice to want an Urgent Care that was not solely attached to a doctor’s “group”. I was so happy to find out that CRMC was opening their own urgent care facility, with diagnostic labs, for the many issues that can arise with MS. Before them, my choice was the ER. I always felt that I would be in the way of someone that needed full attention from the ER staff, along with the long wait.
I was treated professionally but with a relaxed atmosphere. Smiling and caring faces, “team minded”, sincere and a beautiful facility. I tend to get anxious when I have to go. My MS can create many problems and mask symptoms of other problems. The lady that attended to my problem looked at my issue as “a fresh pair of eyes”, made her diagnosis, and it was like all the puzzle pieces just fell into place.
I was upset and frustrated about a problem I had been having for 3 weeks, even after 2 doctor visits, and waiting for an appointment with a specialist that was still several days away. I left smiling and feeling like there a light at the end of the tunnel.
I can’t thank them enough for what they did for me yesterday!  Welcome to the neighborhood!  I am your biggest fan!

resp.text: We're so glad you had a great experience! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience!

name: Chris Vogelpohl
text: LaShae: all the staff were so amazing that what would have normally been a high stress situation with my toddler who hates doctor visits turned in to his most calm and enjoyable visit ever... he didn't even cry when being swabbed for strep. Everyone was so friendly and helpful and the Dr was very thourough.

name: Sissy Mcginnis
text: My daughter Madison went in tonight not feeling good at all. Yal took such good care of her, but her nurse she loved so much, she said she wanted to start seeing her all the time. That says alot from her. Thank you all very much. I highly reccomend. The online checkin and everything was fast, no wait.

resp.text: Thanks for sharing! Thank you for choosing Cullman Regional for your health care.

name: Amanda Stanton
text: Can not say thank you enough for how caring and understanding they were with my screaming toodler who wasn’t feeling well. I was blown away at the kindness and professionalism the entire staff displayed. I have never had an urgent care physician provide such good care and listen to my concerns. The nurse even brought my daughter a popsicle trying to soothe her. I can not recommend them enough after our experience tonight!

resp.text: Thank you for taking time to share your experience!

text: My son went here with body aches, earaches, sore throat, headache and sick to his stomach, they only looked at his throat and sent him home with prescription. They did not test him for the flu strep or anything. I called them and questioned them on it and they lied to me and tried to tell me he told them he didn’t have insurance even though he gave them his card. This place might be good but whoever was in charge of seeing patients that night was not doing her job at all

name: William Porter
text: Everyone was friendly and professional. We checked in online. Our wait was minimal. Nurse was very thorough. We will definitely recommend to others.

resp.text: We're so glad you had a great experience! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience!

name: Rodney Thompson
text: The first visit Wes arrived at 8:45, I was asked to leave because the do not open until 9.  The pharmacy and imaging was open, if you was there for either of those two services you could wait in the lobby, but if you need the urgent care you wait in your car.  Funny how that works considering  that all 3 services share the same waiting room.   I spoke with the office manager, who was a very sweet lady, she gave me the name of the person to talk to at the hospital about my complaint.   Needless to say, after serval attempts to contact them, leaving my name and contact info I still have not  heard from them.

resp.text: UPDATE: Mr. Thompson, you will be happy to know we’ve updated are policy on this, and patients waiting for urgent care can now also wait in our waiting room. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We are sorry you feel you did not receive exceptional care. If you would like for us to follow-up regarding your visit, please contact our Patient Advocate to share your experience and your concerns by calling (256) 737-2591. Thank you!

text: Excellent caring staff. Short wait times. Helps having pharmacy there

text: Very unprofessional and rude receptionist who answered mine and my husbands call. As you adamantly told me I was misinformed and had the details of the wrong urgent care, this is quoted from the Cullman Regional Urgent Care Website:  "For those without insurance, or who have high deductibles, we also offer discounted cash pay prices at the time of service." I'll definitely take my business elsewhere.

text: Four stars are for the employees in the back because they’re so kind and helpful. The women up front are RUDE.. so thankful they’re not a reflection of every employee here!

text: Doctor Lucky and his staff are absolutely amazing. They were all unbelievably kind and made the overall experience perfect. I was really nervous about getting tested for Covid, but the nurse made me feel 100% better about the entire situation. Then, I received blessed news on a negative Covid result from this facility. Very appreciated. I will definitely consider you guys for medical necessities in the future. Keep up the great work. ☺️

text: During this pandemic I have had to take 2 kids to get tested for covid 19 and another child to have a mandatory vaccine. All 3 times I have been there I have had a great experience with every person there from the lady at the front desk , to the doctor and nurse practioner and the other nurse. They are always very kind and welcoming and also great with kids.I would definitely recommend to friends and family who need a local family care facility.

name: Pressley Cherry
text: They are the slowest place on getting anything back. Worst place to go.

text: Great friendly staff.

name: Susan Green
text: Very pleasant visit.  The doctor and staff were very empathetic and seemed to genuinely care that I recovered from the flu quickly.  Btw, I thought I just had a severe cold!!

name: Julie Tompkins
text: Everyone in this office is wonderful.  They truly care about their patients and do everything they can to help.  I highly recommend this office for your medical care!

name: Sharon Jones
text: I loved this place when Dr. Vaughn was my primary doctor. He was wonderful. When he left I was referred to another staff member. My comment and question is their anyone in charge that I kind speak with about my experience with the new person. Their are some issues that would like to express. I someone does respond thank you on advance.

resp.text: Sharon, I'm sorry to hear that you had a negative experience. Please call me and I will help any way I can. Greg Waters 205-547-3901

name: Buckshot (BK)
text:
I’ve had two bad experiences with this health provider main May 2021 and august 2021 I needed blood work results for severe abdominal pain! I left multiple messages for Dr Felgner to get my blood work results. I was unable to get a call back after leaving some 7 messages within a weeks time. I even went into the facility to get the blood work results but I was turned away and told that Dr Felgner world have to give them to me!  What is a patient to do?!!! I even filled out a records request, but I never received my CAT Scan & Blood Work results!!!

Stan as far away from this facility. Dr Felgner seems to be very compretent, but his staff at the Lakeshore location are completely incompetent!!!

They absolutely have not interest in the wellbeing of Dr. Felgner patients!

In 2 separate situations, I left 10 messages in the third week of May 2021 and then in the first week of August 2021 I left 8 messages for inquiries about my blood work. Both times I never get a call back. I had to make an appointment to talk directly with Dr Felgner!!!

The most recent situation, I was having to live with severe abdominal pain. The doctor told me to call him if the pain continued. I did, but no on would return my calls. I ended up having to request my records and go to a doctor to researched on my own. I was told my records world be ready for pick up in two days. It has been 8 days and I have yet to get my records!!!
I had to pay for new blood tests out of my pocket because MedHelp would not release my records!!!

I have retained an attorney and filed complaints with the Alabama Medical  Board. No one should have to fight with a medical facility to get help!!!

Stay as far away from these evil people!!!!!!!!!

name: Kendra Brown
text: I have always  had a wonderful experience from this clinic. Cynthia at the front desk always greet me with a smile. When I ever call with a question all of staff get right on top of it. Dr. Felgner has been one of the most caring and loving doctors I've ever had

resp.text: Thanks, Kendra!

name: Emma sandoval
text: They don’t answer the phone, some of the staff are extremely rude. They don’t call back with results for the labs. Honestly safe yourself the emotional uproar they may cause due to the lack of response, an unwillingness to answer phones to get basic information..

name: Mark Asperger
text: A spreadneck, covidiot anti-masker owns this place.

name: Nathen
text: The nurses say they will submit your preauthorization and never do. They tell you they will call you back and never do. You can't leave a message because the voicemail is full. The doctors are good though.

name: Tanya C
text: My husband needed a bunch of tests done for his work and in a rush turn around.  We called many clinics to get help but the only one who greeted us w kindness and went above and beyond was Med Help.  From Angel P who was very helpful in finding out if they could do the tests we needed done in the time frame we needed to when my husband got to Med Help having Haley making the process as simple as possible and quick. To Dr McFaden being kind and understanding. We cannot thank Med Help enough for helping us. We know it was a  unique situation and very grateful for all their help.

resp.text: Thanks Tanya!

name: Darius Conner
text: I had a wonderful experience with the young lady Ayanna who helped me. She brought me and answered every question that had. I was in and out in less than 15 minutes with everything I needed. Very professional and knowledgeable. Please give this young lady a raise!!👍 great experience

name: Colton Spain
text: Drove 30 minutes to get told they stop testing for Covid at 6 PM and you can’t ever get the front desk for help no matter what phone number you call. Not surprised at all.

resp.text: Please visit our website and complete the online form for COVID testing. Thank you for choosing MedHelp.

name: samantha stephens
text: I came in super sick and no other place was offering me any answers. I came to Med Help and they were so kind and considerate, despite my difficulties regarding needles. Robert and Alyssa specifically were so professional and I would 100% go back.

name: Spencer Wilson
text:
I have to say that my visit today to the Medhelp on Lakeshore was one of the better experiences I have had at any quick care type of doctor's office.
The person on the phone who initially booked my visit, the nurse who administered the test, and the doctor who followed up with me after my test results came back, were all great. I'm sure MedHelp like all other similar doctors offices are overwhelmed right now, but these guys were extremely professional and made the process much easier than several other similar quick care facilities I visited recently.  Great job MedHelp in Vestavia!

name: J A
text: I be could NOT be more disappointed (disgusted) with the POOR quality of treatment my 19-year old daughter (student living away from home) received  at this clinic. Multiple visits, multiple tests, lack of action and follow through. The last issue being a failure to update her medical records which resulted  in delays in receiving prescribed medication. With little to no help from this location in resolving. No way I’d ever refer anyone to this clinic. Awful.

name: Ms. Cyd Bailey Howard
text: I have seen several doctors at this location. Never had any problems. Dr. Thayer Moore joined the staff in 2020 and she is very unprofessional and refused to listen to her patients. She just prescribes meds, meds to wake you up and meds to put you to sleep. I attempted to voice my concerns about all of the meds she prescribes and I received a certified letter saying that Medhelp will no longer service my medical needs. It’s Very important to listen to the patients. When I left the office the very last time. She had sent 12 Prescriptions to Publix for my diabetes and high blood pressure. Completely unreal and very unprofessional. Run away from that office if they schedule you with Dr. Thayer Moore. I have concerns that she may have some agreement with the pharmaceuticals company’s. Everyone else there has been acceptable.

resp.text:
Ms Bailey asked me to put my medical license at risk and I declined.
I am saddened to see that she decided to retaliate by making slanderous and false remarks online. I hope she finds some peace. Dr. Moor

name: David Paden
text: I've gone here several times over the years and have always been impressed with the quality of the care received.  I've also taken or sent family members and they also have been happy with the service.

name: Mell Rose
text: Ok so when I first got here I was disappointed I had some things too do and the process slowed me down . They did however correct the situation . It was okay

resp.text: Mell, we do see that you were the first person seen this morning and that you were seen quickly. We apologize for not having change, but we are glad to have provided you with excellent care.

name: Martha Bath
text: I had an experience that I needed help with the finance department, the person that stood out to me was Kristi McAdory!!!!! She took my need serious & she really helped me, she had the BEST attitude!!!  Very caring, kind & helpful!! The world needs more Kristi’s💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖

name: Casey Gewirtzman
text: Several people have already commented about this, and my experience has been the same. I had a really bad sore throat, and I went in hoping to get an antibiotic or something. I was told I needed a COVID test, even though I already had COVID not long ago. I waited an hour and half. I had to call multiple times to make sure I got tested, because they clearly forgot about me. Plus, I was also supposed to get a strep swab, and they forgot about that, too. I’m never coming back here again.

name: Emily Butler
text: Tried to get tested for Covid. Sent telehealth form as instructed by website around 1:30-2 on a Wednesday. After sending form, instructions said I would be contacted by a nurse to setup curbside test. No one called. Thursday morning I tried to call telehealth line and site I had requested curbside test. I only got voicemail. Left a message explaining situation, and just requested someone verify they received my info and I was in line to be called for an appointment. This was around 9 am. It’s now 4:25 pm and still no response. In the meantime, I went elsewhere to be tested.

name: danielle aaron
text: Jada and Sabrina were AWESOME on 2/25/21. Highly recommend!!!

resp.text: Thanks Danielle!

name: Erica Scaife
text: I went in on 12/26/20 because I was having sinus trouble. I explained to the nurse what was going on with my sinus. He told me they had to do a covid test I said okay. I told him that was fine but I needed to be seen about my sinuses. The nurse told me once they get the results back from my covid test the doctor would call me so to leave and they would contact me. So I never saw the doctor. An hour and half passed and I called them the lady that answered told me I was negative for covid and the flu. I said okay what about the symptoms I came in for. She put me on hold and came back to the phone and said the doctor would be calling me. I never received a call and I get an email saying it was filed on my insurance. But I never saw the doctor and in turn had to make an appointment to see my doctor. I am very disappointed in the service I received or should I say did not receive. While I understand being careful and not wanting to get other people sick this process was not right and I feel like how can you charge me if you don't treat me.
