text: From the check-in to leaving i couldnt have asked for better care.  The receptionist was very friendly.  I was called back and vitals was taken in a very short time after signing in.  The Dr. and Nurse was nice and took care of all my needs.  They addressed all my concerns.  I highly recommend this office.

name: Lisa Pond
text: Very friendly staff and always in and out quickly! I would give 5 stars, but I never receive a call back when I call in to the nurse. My kids love this place!

name: Emily Ford
text: The entire staff at Springville GoNow Doctors has ALWAYS been friendly, efficient and very compassionate. the hours are also so convenient and there is rarely ever a wait more than 5 minutes. I just cannot say enough great things about this group of caregivers, they are the best!!!!

name: M Mishka
text: Absolutely loved the place, Dr was super thorough and quick. Would recommend to anyone and will definitely be coming back for any other medical issues I have.

name: J Denholm
text: Even with a full lobby, the employees are kind and quick. The Dr. & NP quickly, but completely explained our diagnoses and medicines. The services are also affordable.

name: Tanya Hallmark
text: Anytime I go...I never have more than a 10-15 minute wait. The staff (especially Paula) are great as well as the doctors I have seen. Will never go anywhere else....y'all are stuck with me.

name: Bonita Chandler
text: My first time to visit this clinic.  Excellent staff and Dr. Jones was very nice, thorough and took appropriate time to treat my current symptoms and address any other concerns.  Great experience!

name: Nicky Griffith
text: I was in and out within an hour. I feel that is a good visit and it was sort of packed full of people. I thought for sure I would be there all day but not today. Staff is always professional and courteous.

name: Jeff Riddle
text: Very friendly and nice staff doctor and nurse was very explanatory.I will definitely use them again. Don't know who the one that gave me my shots but she knew what she was doing

name: Martha Deweese
text: I was very pleased with my appointment and the care I received. The staff was kind and efficient and the Dr. Was very good.

name: Fishing Frenzy
text: Everyone is so nice. I didn't have to wait long. The Doctor was very friendly as was the staff.

name: Adam Bischoff
text: They are too dumb to code visits properly even when you give them the paperwork to turn in for your wellness check. The lab turned me over to collections even though my insurance and gonow show that it was paid once I had to tell them how to code it. Either their “Office Manager” doesn’t exist or never bothers to go to work. My wife and I have been down their five times to talk to the “Office Manager” but have never heard back! Having a hard time finding a number for corporate office but I will! Go anywhere else if you don’t want to be put into collections when your insurance pays  for the visit and the morons have the money but still put you into collections!

name: Jeanie Lewis
text: Friendly staff. Clean waiting area with very comfortable seating. Cute children's waiting area. Quick visit with very little wait time.

name: Janet Hall
text: Super friendly staff, easy check in and speedy service. Very clean office and patient rooms. Will definitely be back.

name: Elliott Clifton
text: Quick. Helpful. Friendly. Whenever I need a doc in a box these are the folks I use. Knowledgeable & understanding staff. So happy I used their services.

name: Jessica Brewer
text: Typical doc in a box. Staff was nice. Wait time was decent. One disturbing thing though. They had TV's for the patients in all the exam rooms but no sinks in them for doctor to wash hands etc.

name: Dean Franklin
text: Quick, professional, friendly. I have used them several times and have recommended them to other people. If the the need arises I will use them again!

name: Jamie Brannon
text: I have found that the staff is very kind ,and CRNP is very good. He caught something going on with me that many would have just said "I'm not sure".  They take the time to talk to you ,and run any tests that are necessary . I highly recommend them.

name: Amy Yopp
text: We were in and out, the doctor was very personable and great with my little girl! We will be back next time we need a urgent care visit.

name: Diane Adams
text: Close to home.  Friendly doctors and staff. I usually don't have to wait very long.  They always make a call back to make sure everything is ok.  Recommend GoNow Doctors

name: Tina Dalina
text: Clean environment friendly staff. doctor had a huge smile and did not make me feel rushed. In and out quickly even on a day when they were having computer issues!

name: BeBeEyEz Fife- Baker
text: Great and friendly staff! Very informative about my insurance coverage prior to service and did a thorough checkup.

name: Kristi Dutton
text: Great experience! Sprained my ankle and thought it was possibly broken. They took me right back and did an X-ray. Thankfully there was no break. They fixed me up with an air cast and crutches. The staff was all very friendly!

name: Tracy Farley
text: I've been there a few times. Always great service, friendly people and most of all there fast. A lot of times I'm in and out within ten minutes.

name: Shelley Moore
text: Love being able to go early on the weekends, without calling and trying to get an appoitnment.  My kids always seem to wake up sick on the weekend!  Dr Hackett is so nice and always listens to my concerns.  In and out today in about 30 minutes.  That never happens at the pediatrician's office!

name: gina vines
text: In and out quickly. Courteous and caring staff. Feeling up to 85% one day after visit! I will continue to use GONow!

name: Kurt Smith
text: Great care and so efficient.  Hate it that insurance co's are requiring referrals.  We love the docs there.

name: Wade Tinley
text: As always, a most wonderful experience, fast service, medicine on the spot and Rx sent in and waiting. Every staff member phenomenal to deal with.

name: C M (CMBama)
text: Always quick and efficient. The staff are friendly and the docs are caring and listen and give great options.

name: Mark Kuester
text: Experience at office was good. Very disappointed in follow-up.  I was promised results of blood test by Friday, but I’m still waiting (it is now Sunday).

name: Kimberly Jackson
text: Dr. Hackett & Nurse Robin Tipton are awesome. I was evacuated promptly. Very professional ♥️

name: BOB Olczak
text: This particular location is special.  Very caring.  My first experience w GO NOW and j have a follow up.  Pricing very competative.

name: Tara Tarvin
text: Love this place. They had me in and out in 30 mind today ! Everyone that works there is so sweet!!!

name: JAY HASKEW
text: Gracious and friendly staff. Also quick to get in when I visited.

name: Haley Capps
text: Everyone is so friendly, and I was in and out in less than 30 minutes! I will definitely use them again!

name: Jason Byars
text: The staff was very welcoming, warm and friendly. The visit itself was quick and efficient.  Doctor Brobst was awesome!

name: Eric
text: The Dr.’s and nurses here are great, we received excellent care.

name: Donna Hare
text: Very courteous staff. Fast visit. Thanks for everything!

name: jeff corbin
text: Friendly and fast. I recommend them to get you feeling better fast without having to spend all day in their office.

name: Donna Holt
text: I use GoNow whenever I get sick. With my regular dr if you have to go in without an appointment it is always 2 or more hours. I can go to GoNow and be treated in usually less than 30-45 minutes. I love using them. They are kind, and effecient.

name: Rosa Noles
text: Always polite; a quick visit; very little waiting and very thorough.

name: Big Sqwat
text: This place is great.  Quick wait time, knowledgeable staff, awesome patient care.

name: Todd Schaffner
text: Great staff  they go the extra mile to take care of you. The nurses are great

name: Misty Zavala
text: My sister tried to take my niece this morning as she was severely broke out. They refused to see my niece saying she needed a referral because she had Medicaid. She offered to pay cash in desperate need to get my niece some help. They still refused. I've NEVER heard of having a referral for urgent care  my kids used to have Medicaid and we have been to urgent cares with no problem. She took her to the urge t care in Oneonta with NO issues.

name: Tommy Sullivan
text: Down to earth folks. They're not there to gouge you, especially if you're between jobs or insurances.

name: Mary Moore
text: Always friendly and quick turn around to get you better and out the door to go home and rest.

name: Jeanna Thompson
text: Great experience as always! Tonia, R. Gramling, Paula and Kim always do a wonderful job! :)

name: Gary Simmons
text:
Very friendly staff. Ive beenthere several times and staff have been
just as friendly 1st visit as was the 3rd and 4th visit. Would recommend them highly. Thank you for your professional
and friendly staff

name: Allison Cambre
text: They are always so good to us when we come in. Never need to wait!

name: Dana Creel
text: They are always so nice and very quick. I always have a great experience here.

name: Rodney Stevens
text: Extremely nice and professional. Speedy and clear diagnosis.

name: Victoria Stanford
text: A great experience from start to finish. Competent, friendly staff!

name: scott hunter
text: In and out in like 20 minutes! Great experience.

name: Amber Wilson
text: I was told by another Dr office to go here because they could see emergencies. I waited hour and 15 mins in the lobby to be told that they wouldn't even look at me. If they knew they wouldn't treat me, then I should have been told that to begin with and not made to wait in the lobby forever!! If I could leave no stars I would

name: deandrea hayes
text: I really like GoNow Doctors its always so convienent and everyone there is super friendly.

name: Deidra Smith
text: I love the great customer service and care that I always receive at Go Now Doctors in Springville.

name: Heather Matthews
text: Friendliness and cleanliness from when you walk in all the way through leaving.

name: Lily Rachel Bice
text: Helpful staff. Fast and efficient visit.

name: Amber Huffstutler
text: Everyone was nice, was seen quickly, and gave very thorough details about my care

name: Hoobidibah Entertainment
text: Nice building and polite staff. Would recommend to anyone

name: Patricia Everett
text: Quick in and out, very caring staff in my time of need. Thank you!

name: Zane Allsup
text: Very nice staff!  Not too long of a wait and very prophishent!

name: greg etheredge
text: Quality service and very  professional  an fast service  seeing the doctors

name: C N
text: Very friendly and very quick! Clean environment also.

name: S Rutledge
text: Friendly and professional staff, in and out quickly, clean comfortable environment

name: Jeremy Nelson
text: Hardly any wait time and thorough visit

name: peggy rigli
text: I found every one in the office to be friendly,kind and helpful. I would recomend them to any of my friends and family.

name: Brandon Easterwood
text: Got in quickly and they met my needs

name: Frank Johnson
text: Very nice staff and quick in and out!

name: scott dase
text:
Staff was nice and professional.
Time there was less than an hour.

name: Sharon Walls
text: Quick and helpful!   Great people!

name: Jeremy Dunn
text: Told my wife she didn't have the flu without doing a flu test, yet exhibited flu like symptoms. We have a 2 month old and two 15 month olds at home. For their sake, you would think they would do a flu test. Their reasoning was because they haven't had any flu cases this year. Then they tell her she has a virus still without doing any tests. Hello!!! The flu is a virus. Wife is now home with a 102 degree fever. Gonna take her somewhere else.

name: John McWaters
text:
Checked in,
Seen by nurses and Doctor very quickly. Thank you.

name: Tim Shirley
text: User friendly and fast good hearted!

name: Johnathan Black
text: Friendly and prompt service. Was in and out in 45 minutes.

name: Ana Pinon
text: Great service, nurses, PAs & Doctors. Only doctors office I use.

name: Amy Leigh
text: Nice staff and was properly diagnosed and treated

name: chris stjohn
text: Short wait times & good staff

name: Grace Goodman
text: Great staff, doctors and nurse practitioners!

name: Ashley Talley
text: Quick visit, sweet staff.

name: Synthia Mayfield
text: Great hours, great  people.

name: Renee Hawkins
text: I'm extremely pleased with my care there

name: Alice Lamont
text: Excellent care, kind caring people

name: Shree Miller
text: Everyone was friendly and helpful.

name: Kevin Green
text: Great caring staff...

name: Scott Felice
text: Friendly!!! Fast!!!! What more can you ask!! Highly recommend!

name: Jolie Wildinger
text: Professional, speedy service.

name: Kim Wilson
text: We were in and out within an hour and the staff is very friendly.

name: Kevin McMillan
text: Fast quick and nice

name: Randy Robinson
text: Awesome fast service

name: Melissa Vann
text: A great experience

name: Jamie Jones
text: Very friendly staff. Wait time was very short.

name: Lauren Wilson
text: Fast and friendly!

name: James Hardin
text: Great place

name: Debbie Skellett
text: Great experience at GoNow Doctors!!!

name: John Duncan
text: Super service and care!!

name: Olivia Thornhill
text: Fabulous!!

name: XwingSports
text: Never answer the phone

resp.text: Would you like us to call you?

name: Jonas B.
text: I really appreciate the time Dr. Falola spent with me.  I will be back.

name: lois hays
text: I've been coming here for 4 yrs. I wouldn't go anywhere else. The staff is so sweet and caring. They are really fast here and no hassle. Dr. Hale is one of the best doctors I've ever seen. I love this place and don't mind driving across town to get the love and kindness they show here.

name: Shelly Baker
text: Had a good experience. The staff was great and helpful. Dr. Hale listens and takes the necessary step to find the right diagnosis and it didn't take all day. They work as team to make the visit better.

name: Samantha Langenkamp
text: I'm not sure why people have had such a bad experience here. I have used this AFC location since 2011. I have never been disappointed. I have never waited longer than 10 minutes which is a normal wait time for small health clinics. I am always greeted and treated with respect.

name: Lori Baker
text: Very Friendly staff love that they go out of their way to help and get you in and out. Best one in town

name: Stephanie Lee
text: I went to pick up xrays. I waited over 30 minutes and the lady at the desk kept saying that they'll be ready in a minute. 10 minutes later I had to leave and told her I would be back. Came back after 30 minutes and still had to wait. No apologies for having me wait over an hour for xray copies. Might I add there was only 2 patients and they were discussing what they were going to eat. Not very professional.

name: Tarah Hoobler
text: I don't even give this place a one star, took my child there today. And it was an awful experience. He needed a sports physical, the Dr didn't even do a physical. All he said was, you have 2 ears, 2 arms, 2 legs, and 2 testicles. You're good to go. Well he isn't good to go, he has scoliosis, and he needs to see the orthopedic surgeon. In order to be cleared to play football. And without a referral he can't go. Was told I needed to come back for a referral. My child also needed an xray for a hurt swelled ankle, and as they were cping back from doing the xray the Dr was half asleep in a chair.

name: Sharnice Bascomb
text: You might as well wait a whole month for a new patient visit at an actual doctor's office or find another urgent care... If its an actual "urgent" matter just suck it up and go to the hospital.. Don't be fooled by the short wait time. There aren't any people in the lobby waiting to be seen for a real reason... They suck!

name: Gregory Sneed
text: Amber did a great job with my dot physical and was very helpful.

name: Amy Westmoreland
text: Dr. Morr and her staff have been so helpful to my friend who was here on a business trip from France.  I appreciate that they were professional and reassuring to him. They went the extra mile to help us get him home for Christmas!  When he arrived back on a second trip, they saw him again, and he is already feeling better.  Thanks for everything.

name: Ivan Westmoreland
text: I tried to explain to the lady at the counter that I could not read the paperwork she replied sorry I can't help you

name: Christie Lambert
text: This place has horrible customer service.They could have walked outside and seen me sitting there, but they wanted to make excuses! I waited for 2 hours and they said they tried to call me, but they had listed my phone number wrong and I was just in there last week and they had my right number on their chart!

name: Ellen Mannon
text: My husband and I both had a wonderful experience with Dr. Morr and the staff at Scottsboro’s Urgent Care. Everyone was kind, helpful, and professional. We won’t hesitate to go back next time we’re under the weather!

name: jannell townsend
text: The staff and doctors are great very caring and had so much compassion i passed out in office and they took great care of me and made sure i was ok before they released me

name: KING GRAHAM
text: Mrs. Nora the nurse is the best!!! Great service and great people 🙏🏼

name: Lindsey Michelle
text: Best customer service! I’m not from Scottsboro but visit often and was attacked by a dog and bitten pretty badly. I googled the closest clinic and ended up at a FAMILY clinic who TURNED ME AWAY 35 minutes before closing because they “didn’t have time to see me”. She showed no concern for the severity of the bite and told me to go across the road to the Urgent Care Clinic.... best thing they could have done. It was 25 minutes until close and the Urgent Care got me right in and treated the bite marks. Me and my boyfriend felt horribly for showing up so late and apologized multiple times. The response I got from Urgent Care was “don’t apologize, and we are thankful that you chose us.”  The staff there is extremely professional and super sweet! They were very aggressive with the treatment to make sure it didn’t get infected and explained in detail what signs I needed to look for if it worsened. I HIGHLY recommend Scottsboro Urgent Care and will definitely go back if there is ever a need.

name: Cathy Kaufman
text: Very helpful and caring staff and doctors, I don't have a family doctor here yet or insurance, they treated me with respect and dignity.

name: Sherry Dulaney
text: Very nice & professional. In & out fast

name: Denise Munza
text: Didn't have a long wait to see the drs! They & the nurses were very compassionate!

name: Lynn Rae Clemens
text: Would be better  IF the Doctor was a Doctor..he is not..

name: Nathon Roden
text: Polite and knowledgeable staff

name: brundi bowden
text: I would definitely recommend Stopwatch Urgent Care. I made an appointment online and uploaded my insurance card online as well. I arrived early for my appointment as requested and was seen within about 15 minutes of my actual appointment time. The staff was pleasant and about the business of getting patients in and out with care. I was done in less than an hour of my appointment time, probably done in about 40 minutes. Online they recommend arriving 20 minutes early but if you fill everything out online and upload your Id and insurance card you can probably just go with 10 minutes early. Definitely received 5 star + service.

resp.text: Hi Brundi, thank you for sharing your experience! I'm so glad your visit with us went well and we appreciate your business.

name: Jawknee 21 (Jawknee21)
text: They don't answer the phone when they're busy so you're better off going there if you have questions. They will skip you if you step outside to use the phone to avoid being rude. You're better off staying inside with the rest of the sick people even if you aren't. And apparently their appointment system isn't for an appointment. Even though it says it is and that's what is supposed be to save your place in line.

resp.text: I'm so sorry this happened. Unfortunately, with COVID numbers increasing, we are constantly on the phone and seeing patients. I encourage you to continue calling if needed and we will try to get to you as soon as we can. I will look into this for you.

name: Bob Long
text:
Went in 2 weeks ago for covid test..
They said ins wasn't  accepting any claims on covid. Charged me 100$ co_pay?????why. My ins said they never filed a claim or even ran my ins card. So how did they come up with that total. When I called to question it I was referred to a # that takes messages. 3 times I've tried to get a answer thier false claim about the 100$ needs to be resolved heck all I want is to talk to a person but a refu d would be nice

resp.text: Hi Bob, I'm so sorry your visit was unpleasant. If you contact me awhite@stopwatchurgentcare.com I can put you in contact with our billing department about this.

name: leah cameron
text: Made appt at 10am on thier website for their 'get in line" feature and got appt for 5:04. Got text confirming and even got text telling me to head to my appt. I show up 20 mins early as requested. The location is closed! A sign on the door says to go the other location across town. So I do and hardly get in the door before she states they aren't accepting anymore patients!  They don't close for 2 more hours, there is no one waiting in the lobby, and 3 cars in the parking lot. Mad, I go home and book appt for there the next day same results get and appt for 4:42. Show up and once again they have decided not to take any more patients. I give up!

resp.text: Hi Leah, after speaking with our Ladonia location they said they were able to see everyone who scheduled an appointment that day. We only turn people away if the lobby is full or if we don't have anymore availability. I will look into our booking system and see if I can resolve this issue, and I appreciate you informing us!

name: Lachelle Lee
text:
The NP Mrs Woo and her medical assistant were both thorough and compassionate. I didn't have to wait long to be seen and my prescription was sent right away. The experience was fast and smooth!

Thanks

resp.text: Hi, Lachelle! Thank you for the awesome review.  We are happy to hear of your great experience and are always happy to help!!

name: Kay Jackson
text: I stepped on a rusty roofing nail in my backyard, where the roofing company failed to clean up nails after replacing my roof. Melissa checked me in, and she was very pleasant. I saw Dr. Perry. He examined my foot and said I needed a tetanus shot. A young lady named Ashley gave me my tetanus shot. She did a great job. I probably was not there more than 20-30 minutes total. Everyone was very nice. It looked to be a very clean facility. I have only been there once before, and that was for my Covid test in July of 2020. I was treated very good on that visit as well. I would highly recommend Stopwatch Urgent Care of Ladonia.

resp.text: Hi Kay! Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us an awesome review! We hope you are feeling much better!

name: Meaghan Tucker
text: I got there and the receptionist said it'd be an hour wait or longer. She said I could wait in my car and they'd call me. So I checked in and went out to my car with my 9 month old. Stood outside of my car letting my 9 month old play in the open trunk while I waited for over an hour. I went inside to ask how much longer and they tried saying they came looking for me and asked if I left.  She said she even asked around to other people and tried calling me. They absolutely did not. I was parked 3 or 4 spaces to the right of the two handicap parking spots right in front of the door. Standing outside of my vehicle clearly visisble.  Unless you want to wait to not be seen I wouldnt recommend going here.

name: Sherita Cherry
text: I love how Ashley engage with her patients, made me feel comfortable and safe. Don’t remember the NP name but she showed that she really was concerned. Fast and friendly.

resp.text: Hi Sherita! Thank you for an awesome review! We are glad to hear you had such an awesome experience with us!

name: Blue
text: Our nurse was very sweet made sure and made sure we were comfortable. Clean and well put together very understanding and quick but very nice

resp.text: Hi! Thank you for the awesome review! Please, come back and see us anytime you need us!

name: Mary Hall
text:
My husband and I checked in online to make appointments. It was a simple and quick process.
Safe social distancing was practiced with all employees and patients requiring masks. Only 4 patients are allowed in the waiting area.
Our appointments were handled promptly and efficiently.  I was highly impressed by the friendly professional service we received.

name: shaniqua bailey
text: I visited urgent care in ladonia al and Mrs. Colleen was the nurse that assisted me and she was absolutely amazing. Dr. Chris was also very friendly and pleasant

name: Shane Fulford
text:
Third time I have been to this stop watch in the last 8 months. They have always been very good at getting me back and seen in a faster than expected or +- 10 minutes range, yet I never feel rushed with the nurses or doctors. I just this morning made that 3rd visit for a busted chin.  ( long story) forty five minutes later and 3 stitches richer out the door I went, good as new!  Thanks guys and gals for taking good care of me always.

Be safe and keep up the good work. 👍🏼

name: Amanda Rippy
text: I stood in the waiting room while I heard 3 different ladies talking and giggling in the back room. I was at the front for about 10 minutes, so I peep around the corner and ask if someone can come help up front. Two ladies just immediately stopped talking and went back to work and didn’t even acknowledge I said anything. Then I said “did anyone hear me!?” Then the third lady came up and said she was eating. She assisted me, but didn’t apologize to me or anything. They definitely lack on customer service. When this location first opened they were amazing, the longer they are open the worse they get. I will definitely not come back here. I’d rather wait in the ER forever before returning.

name: Harley Hartzog
text: They were so kind to me and got me in and out as quickly as they could!

resp.text: Hi Harley! Thank you so much for the awesome review!

name: Jose Ruiz
text: Quick and painless. Staff are friendly and very informative when answering questions. Would definitely recommend again.

name: Larry Magana
text: Outstanding service and professionalism. PA Noah is extremely knowledgeable and should be an  full fledged MD. I’d trust her over most Doctors I have seen in the past fifteen years.

name: j hadaway
text: Once again Stopwatch in Ladonia was awesome! I got my Covid test and results in under 30 minutes.

name: Chemere Hinton
text: Very kind and my wait was less than 5 mins to be called back. I was in and out in under 30 mins, if it was even that long. They treated my complaints and got me feeling better. Everyone was courteous and professional. I'd recommend and return.

name: Ashley
text: Colleen was awesome with my 10 year old. She was very comforting and helpful.

name: Michelle renn
text: Covid testing is a farce. It’s not exactly safe, as you have people ignoring the safe distancing and bottle necking at the door getting in or out. Nobody returns your call. The receptionist is rude. The staff in the back were great so that’s the two stars, otherwise I would have given them zero stars if possible. I guess I’m going to have to go and expose myself to sick people to get the results since nobody answers the phone or calls you back. I live around the corner but bet I NEVER go back to this urgent care for anything after this. It’s worth a drive anywhere else.

name: Trevor Crisco
text: I’ve been treated here before and it was fine, but lately the whole stopwatch urgent care chain has been terrible. I have called multiple times being informed that I can come in, and when I get there they tell me I need and appointment or the doctor is not in so they can’t treat me that day. They are terrible communicators and if there’s anywhere else you can go, go somewhere else.

name: Amiyah Broaders
text: I came in to get tested for COVID. It was quick and easy I highly recommend coming to this one if you’re gonna get tested

name: Debbie Goins
text: I would recommend another location if you want your test results, or for someone to call you back.  I've left 3 message for the "receptionist" and have yet to get a call back. Very poor customer service. Also, received a bill for the "free" COVID testing. Do not recommend.

name: Avory Chatham
text: Fast and safe covid testing, friendly staff. The 15 minute covid test was very convenient.

name: Brenda Hooton
text: I was able to make my appointment on line and filled out paperwork online before my visit.  Once I arrived I was in and out in 10 minutes. Wonderful staff.

name: Kristie Robb
text: I have called for several days to try to get an appointment for an ear infection. I hold on the line forever & then when it rings for a person I’m told the voicemail box is full. Then it’s just disconnects. Terrible service. Don’t waste your time.

name: america carswell
text: I couldn’t have asked them to be more caring or professional. From the time I walked in the door until leaving, I felt very well cared for. I highly recommend!

name: Linda Massey
text: Very clean.  Quick response time!  Physician was very thorough and provided me with the tools to combat my illness!

name: Samantha Jackson
text:
I’m editing my comment because they have definitely made some improvements over the last few months. i made my appointment online the same day and was seen promptly. My MA/Nurse was Ashley and she is incredibly kind. The NP I saw was Sabrina and she in knowledgeable. The only recommendation I have is for the gal up front to wear her mask correctly and be a tad friendly. She’s a little robotic in her voice with every patient (“ name? ID and insurance card. Sign here...” with no change in tone). Overall, I now recommend as they have a much better method to the madness still plaguing the world ☺️

I made an appointment online, and when I arrived there was a line of people out the door. I tried to call the office number several times to check if there was a protocol for those who made an appointment. Reluctantly, I just went in to ask if there was another waiting area or if should go back to my care for those who have appointments, I was essentially shoo’d away. I was told to go wait back in line. The receptionist is not very personable. When another person came up and asked why we were all standing outside, we said it was the waiting line and proceeded to ask if we had an appointment - literally all 5 people said no exempt me. It wasn’t until it was my turn to come up, in the line that I was given paperwork. All the people in front of me who I heard say they didn’t have an appointment were seen before me and I didn’t get in the door until 30 minutes after my appointment - online does say it’s only a tentative appointment but I still don’t understand why those with no appointment were seen before me. It was a waste for me to even make an appointment if I was just going to be treated as if I was a walk-in. I’m on day 6 of waiting for results and I’ve called several times  over the last two days (I was told between 3-7 days for results) and left two messages and no one has answered or returned my call. The only two stars I’m giving are because the assistant who did my swap  was super gentle and the nurse practitioner, is kind.
I’m really not sure what the rave was about this place but I honestly would not recommend.

resp.text: Hi Samantha! Thank you for leaving us an awesome review on your experience with us!

name: Mary Bramble
text: They were very thorough and very nice. I will be going back if I need to. I would also let anyone who needs medical attention to go there if it's not an emergency.

name: Susan Young
text:
Made my appt online for COVID testing today.  Was seen within 3 hours.  No waiting.  Very prompt appointment. The nurses swabbing etc were very friendly and professional.  Hopefully I will receive results promptly also.
Great experience.

name: valentina mora
text: Staff was extremely friendly and helpful! I enjoyed my first experience at Stopwatch! Thank you all for being so sweet!

name: Joy Anthony
text: In the past we have had wonderful experiences with Stopwatch. However, even though we had an appt time for a COVID test we were not seen until 3 hours later. A receptionist doesn’t answer your call during office hours so you have to leave a message. We have left 5 messages without a return call. We are on calendar day 17 without any tests results from them. We have stopped by a few times during office hours and they have been closed, not just doors locked, but closed as in no one working.

name: Brad Lakin
text: Always very fast. All staff are efficient and effective.

name: Nichole Lee
text: DO NOT go here! They are so disorganized & no one EVER answered the phone there. We went here since my fiance needed immediate attention & his family doctor was out of town at the time. He needed a referral to a urologist for a severe issue he was having since he is a paraplegic. Never heard back from the office. This was also during the COVID-19 & they advertise testing at this facility, but people kept coming in & asking how they can find their results. No one answered their questions & they kept saying that the office would send them an email & NoOne did! Worst urgent care experience ever!!!

name: david hare
text: This is not the place to go to for a Covid test. I’m on the 8Th day and still haven’t received my results. I’ve tried calling multiple times and left messages but no one answered or returned my calls. When I went in initially the receptionist was very unfriendly and acted like she had better things to do. I had symptoms and was told to quarantine so it would be nice to have my results.

name: Enoch Tucker
text: Great service and very professional

resp.text: Thank you for the great rating and review, Enoch!

name: Kiyana Mack
text: I wouldn’t recommend going to this urgent care. The staff members aren’t friendly nor helpful at all!! Their customer service sucks!!!

name: Kris Stephens
text: 2nd time visiting Stopwatch. Fixed me right up. I am dissapointed in the online check in. I changed all my information online and uploaded my insurance card and drivers license pictures. Had to do it again when i arrived.

name: Angela Albertson
text: Very professional and great friendly staff. Best group of medical providers around.

name: Julieo Johnson
text:
Have always used the place as Walk In..never any problems for Severe UTI.
Today was refused treatment..BECAUSE  I did not have an appointment.
WILL NEVER USE THEM AGAIN!!!!!!

name: AUDRYANA PERKINS
text: Not the place to go for a Covid test. I was told my results would be available in 48 hours so that I could return to school a week later. 7 days later I have no results and can’t return to school and the receptionist do not answer or return phone calls.

name: Deam Mitchell
text:
I am a service connected paralized war veteran and have used this facility many times in the past with no complaints.  I went there this morning for covid testing and found that they have no respect for the American with Disabilities Act basedon the location of their testing tent.  I have a side load van and have to having at least 6 feet on the side to exit and enter the vehicle.  Many times I have used a regular parking spot only to find that I had to wait outside  in the parking lot on another drive to move their car so I could load my power chair.
The placement of this tent is in direct violation of the law and should be removed. To think this is a medical facility,  tbey should know better.

name: Crystal Hendrix Zabala
text: It was my first time here they were quick and caring definitely will use again .

name: Whit L
text: Went in at 8:25 this morning, waited for all the people in front of me to get seen, after the three patients have been seen, and a female walked in after everyone and got called back before me and the time was 9:45,so I politely asked for my ID and left. I’m not sure if it’s bc I’m a self pay client, but my time is just as important as the next patient, “Technical difficultly” isn’t the same as incompetence!

name: Lori Bellerue
text: They are absolutely the worst. Noone will answer the phone, and they are sitting  at the desk doing nothing.  They are the slowest at call you back giving test results.

name: Carlita Lopez
text: My mother got the COVID-19 test done here last week and we still have no results I’ve called and called and called and then someone finally answer and hung the damn phone up AGAIN!!! This is the worst experience this damn place has given us.

name: Stephanie Aguilar
text: I have been calling and emailing for over a week. no response.  I tried stopping by there. no one was waiting. They wouldn't let me in or see about an appointment.  I think they are very unprofessional.

name: Rina “RiRi” M
text: They are very unprofessional with all this testing going on. Went up there today to get a work excuse  & low an behold they are closed until tomorrow (on a day they should be open). They have not answered any calls. When you go inside they shoo you away without getting your name/number or even typing in your name just to check on things. I don’t advise anyone to get testing done there.

name: Niqua Niquee
text: Very organized, I was in and out.

name: Susan Ketchum
text: Easy in and out  and they take good care of you

name: Samantha Fuqua
text: Was told a 45 minute wait at 3:50 stiil here at 6:00 they need more help this is supposed to be faster than going to the ER. Will not come back here.

name: Sheila Garrett
text:
Went in for a strep swab on 1/19/2020. It was negative, and I had to *ask* for a culture. The doctor told me she was very sorry, but I didn’t have strep, and since I am a breastfeeding mom, she couldn’t do anything for me.

I got a phone call on 1/24/2020, where they told me a urine culture came back normal, but they didn’t know about the strep culture. That night I got an email from Walgreens, stating my cefdinir prescription was ready.

I called StopWatch on 1/25/2020 to inquire about my culture. I was told it was positive, and that I should “continue” taking my antibiotics. When I asked when they were called in, the woman on the phone told me SUNDAY. The very day the doctor told me she couldn’t do anything for me!

I will never return.

name: Tonia Dunn
text: Brought my daughter in at 11:30 am we were out with in 15 mins. The staff was so nice and the NP was great. I'd definitely recommend this place

name: Buster & Marcie
text: Nice place!  Very clean. Friendly, helpful service at front desk and exam room. Will definitely use this one again!

name: Kayla Creech
text: Excellent service as always.  Dr. Almedia is the best, always taking the best care of my girls and our family. Fast service and clean rooms.

name: Katrina Tate
text: Very friendly staff and took care of my issue quickly and efficiently.

name: Joe Hayes
text: Had a good experience at the highway 80 stopwatch today. The staff and Nurse Practitioner were very professional and provided good care, resolving my issue.

name: Emily Spear
text: The entire staff is rude and they’re liars.

name: Stephanie Frazer
text: Staff was very friendly even though it was very busy and almost time to close. They had my son tested for the flu and out the door in less than an hour. Have had this same experience every time I have gone there.

name: Zee C
text: Friendly staff and fast service

name: Chris Cox
text: Not very nice there only a few smiles

name: Mrs Cricket
text: No one ever answers the phones!

name: Aby Music
text: Wouldnt go back, staff was nice but the actual doctor seemed impatient and scared to even go through the routine of checking me. Unprofessional 💯 and waste of my time and money . Shouldve went somewhere else

name: Darryl Copeland
text: Firstly, the staff here is phenomenal! They go above and beyond to ensure that you are getting the very best care. I recently received my COVID vaccine and Barbara Lynn was so knowledgeable concerning what to expect once I receive the injection. She made sure I had contact number and told me to call any time of the day. When you find a place where strangers care about you then you adopt them as a provider! I am so thankful.

name: Tabitha Mathis
text: My daughter busted her knee open falling on a rock, I took her southern immediate care in Anniston, every one of their staff members were amazing, so friendly and polite and so sweet to my baby. She was terrified of getting stitches for the 1st time, they explained everything to her and were compassionate about treating her. Thank you guys for all that you do! I will refer anyone to you! I will definitely go back for further needs.

name: Renee Mondragon
text: My doctor is great and all but her staff can never send my prescription to the right pharmacy.

name: shayla millwood
text: I absolutely love Southern Immediate Care. Everyone is super friendly, cares about their patients, and are very well educated. I always have a good experience and I will always go here when I can!

name: Matt Britton
text: 3 out of 10 patients confronted the nurses about the terrible wait time. Some poor baby crying for over an hour since we went back We were about to leave ourselves. Its hot & no usable cell signal

name: Beth Ferguson
text: Every time I go to this urgent care center the staff is so friendly and quick. It can take a minute to get back, but once they get you back they are already prepared to give you whatever tests you need.

name: Heather Woodard
text: Do not waste your time. Just go to your primary care Dr. Or the ER.

name: Tiffany Haynes
text: The staff is wonderful except for one dr, she is very rude and has no bedside manner at all! Worst experience ever. And I have been going to them for years. Looks like the lost a loyal patient....

name: Carrie Wilson
text: The communication between the doctor, nurses and front desk staff is very poor here. I was very frustrated after my visit having not had my questions answered.

name: Andrew Robinson
text: Let me start this review by saying that there is only one reason that I’m giving 5 stars, and that is because of Tara. My wife and I were traveling to another country and had to have detailed information on a Covid test. We were very specific with what we needed when we were being tested and assured that we would receive this. When we went to pick up our results on Friday, 9/18, we were handed a document that I could have created on Microsoft Word with a faded letter head. When we asked about what we were told being included, the office staff acted incredibly put out and irritated about our request. They hand wrote all of the information on the incredibly unprofessional document and said that was the best they could do. I went back to the office the next day where I found Tara at the front desk. After explaining our situation, Tara empathetically addresses the situation and provided me with the exact document that we had to provide to customs for our trip. I was in the office for less than 5 minutes and got exactly what I needed. Why this required two trips is confusing, but if not for Tara, we would have missed our deadline for travel approval, all because of the laziness and lack of customer service we received from the staff present on 9/18, including the assistant manager. Tara was by far the most professional employee we dealt with from multiple phone calls, to 3 visits at Southern Immediate Care in Anniston. My 5 stars are for Tara.

name: Sheria Perkins
text: My daughter is sick and has to get a COVID test and has been waiting nearly or at least 3 hrs. to be seen.  Ridiculous.  They need to have more people working. This place is so so so slow!!!

name: Allie Taylor
text: They had the worst communication ever. I went for a simple COVID test and had gotten one at this same location before. I was in and out the first time. This time I got the test within 30 minutes then was told to wait for the doctor whatever reason because they do NOT do rapid testing at this location. Therefore I waited 3 HOURS for her to walk in and tell me that she would call me. No communication between front desk, nurses, and doctor. WORST experience I’ve had at an “immediate” care place in a my entire life. Wasted my entire day and plans because lack of communication. I highly do NOT recommend coming here for COVID testing or if you have a serious illness or emergency.

name: Boney Mahoney
text: Dont waste your time or money with this place, there very slow, they dont  communicate well between nurses, dr., front desk. Ive had 3 different bad experiences with this location, last time they didnt call the  prescription in, huge ordeal!  And this time they didn't spell my daughter's name correct when they sent it in, an the pharmacy wouldnt give the medication to us.Just frustrating! Won't be back

name: Rachel Lâm
text: Staff was extremely helpful and nice. Especially Ms. Monica (front desk), Ms. Kayla (nurse practitioner) and Ms. Deaundra. They were all so sweet and did a great job!

name: Erica Williams
text: As always I'm leaving happy. Was scared from all the recent reviews I've seen, but I'm pleased. Walked in at 8am was called back by 8:10. Was given my test at 8:30, Dr. came in at 8:40 and I'm now in the car at 8:55. Great staff!

name: Bradley Wagner
text: Wait 2hrs to get in for a covid test, it is not even a rapid test as exclaimed online, not very busy either and good luck getting someone to answer the phone for your covid results when they even told you to call at said time to hear it. Do not waste your time nor money going here. Better off driving 20+ min elsewhere.

name: Laura Lee Bowman
text: They have the sweetest staff of any doctor’s office I have been to! I highly recommend them!!

name: Devan Patel
text: This place is a ripoff cause they told me that I have to have a referral so I sent one and they didn’t say I need a referral per person and now I have to pay out of me pocket and they said it was miscommunication that’s how this place make money is not telling you that you need a referral per a person and I had went with my wife to get a COVID test.

name: Heather Arnold
text: They never answer their phones.  If they do they stick you on hold so long you get the answering service. Very unprofessional front office staff.

name: charlotte fulton
text: I don’t know why it’s called “Immediate” care...that is a joke.  Called to get a Covid test and was told “walk in” only,,,couldn’t make an appt. We were told be there by 630pm as they close at 8pm.  We drove 45 min to get here.   We’ve been here 3 hours  in the car the entire time. No wonder Covid is everywhere!  We would not have come here had we known!  There is no update...no idea when we will be seen.  The only reason I gave this place 1 star is because  a 0 was not an option.  Will NEVER make this mistake again.  Abysmal service!

name: Joseph Conder
text: Went for a covid test. Got a quick test and everything went smooth, then I found out they billed my insurance almost $3000 and now they're sending me a $60 bill in the mail after I paid my copay already....

name: Myra Wilborn
text: Dr and Staff were so courteous and thorough...I use them when my Dr is closed and I've always been treated very good...I will always go here when I need after hours care...

name: Mary T
text:
I went there on a Saturday around 11am. I had had a fever of 102, vomiting, extreme diarrhea, and severe headache for more than 2 days. All I wanted was a COVID test to make sure that wasn't what it was.

Nope. Was told I had to see the dr and to go sit in my car. 2 hours later, we called the desk because we STILL had not been called back. I guess they had forgotten about me because 10 minutes later I was in a room.

Then I waited in the room over an hour. Was told only 1 doctor acheduled for ALL the patients for the day. I finally asked them if I could go lay in my car, as I was feeling so sick. Lo and behold, they said I was the next patient the dr was going to see.

The entire staff is really nice and caring there ... they are just horribly overworked and understaffed.

Today is day 8 since I went and I am FINALLY feeling better. But had I needed a return visit, I would have gone somewhere else. That is just too long of a wait for sick people!

name: Juliana Renfroe
text: Friendly staff and super quick services (before covid 19), they tested my husband for covid and though there was a long wait they did keep us updated and continued to keep us comfortable and safe.

name: Jessica H
text: Went for a COVID test that had to be done by a certain time. Let the front desk know what we were there for 3 times. The test took all of 30 seconds after waiting for almost 2 hours. The nurse said had she "known what we were there for" we wouldn't have been stuck as long. Obvious communication issues in the office, the name is extremely misleading when the average wait time is 4 hours. Do yourself a favor and find anywhere else.

name: tena clay
text: Very friendly staff. The doctor was very patient and knowledgeable.  He explained everything I needed to know in great detail.

name: Tybias Eubanks
text: Waited for FOUR HOURS for a COVID test, parking lot was half full, but mostly staff. I know they were staff because we also watched half the staff leave during this time, went in and asked how long it would be, they weren’t sure. we kept waiting, turns out a few of the nurses that had left didn’t say anything so nobody else in the staff knew. we had been there since 2pm but it wasn’t until 4:30pm they called to say “we’re just getting you into the system we need your insurance card.” around 6:30 we were tired of waiting (still couldn’t give us a timeframe) and told Them just to take us off of the list we’d come back another day, we got 10 minutes down the road before they called to tell us our room was ready. we said we had already left so they said they were giving our room to the next person then and that was the end of it. I wouldn’t recommend doing anything there unless you’ve got 4-6 hours to spare just to get your nose swabbed.

name: Tiga Heath
text: What’s the point in listing the phone number; when they never answer phone. Service very very slow..

name: Pam K
text: Giving a negative review is not something I take lightly, however, when a person goes to Urgent Care the assumption of being seen in a timely fashion is inherent. I waited for over 2 hours. This is not an exaggeration, but an indisputable fact. I was never seen by the doctor. I asked for my copay to be refunded, and left after being placed in a room for two hours. A person who is very ill and needing immediate care would be well advised to seek treatment elsewhere.

name: justin lober
text: Kinda messed up it's called immediate care. It always takes 4 hours even when they're not busy. Only reason I come here is they take medicare

name: The Luncefords
text: Very fast and efficient, the parking lot was full and I never saw another patient except from the safety of my car so pre planned distancing was flawlessly demonstrated! In and out within 30 minutes!

name: Darlene Hill (DeeDee)
text: I took my daughter to have her tested for covid and was never called back with any results and apparently our insurance was supposed to cover 100% but we were charged a copay and it took way too long for the appointment.

name: Mary Brooke Sims
text: I dont normally leave bad reviews. The staff was very friendly, although the wait time was absolutely ridiculous. Me and my boyfriend waited for 3 hours to be seen by the nurse and weve been waiting now for atleast 30 minutes for the doctor to come in. I understand they are really busy, but we were not told it would take this long.

name: Fred Luhn
text: Don't know what happened here. Used to be a great place to go to get treated. Here almost 5 hours already with 4 kids and STILL no doctor has seen us. They put you in a room and forget you there. Ridiculous.

name: Wanda Capps
text: We got here for Covid 19 testing. Were told they would bring paperwork out to us. Waited half an hour. No one else in the parking lot. They finally brought out paperwork an hour later they call me with questions. I get them answers and still wait and wait. They say they are really busy there are 2 cars in the parking lot and 1 is mine. Been here more than 2 hours and still waiting. People could die from Covid 19 before they can get the test done

name: Muffin the wolf
text: My husband was in Anniston for business and wasn’t feeling well and decided to go to this urgent care. I give a 2 because he said overall the service was fine and in a timely manner but the receptionist was rude. He had to leave abruptly from Anniston and called  to inform them that he needed to have his medicine sent to a pharmacy. She acted like she didn’t understand what he was trying to get her to do then told him it will take 24 hours to get his medicine to our pharmacy.  Called the pharmacy the next day still nothing. Called them back and she was like it  he didn’t say what pharmacy. It would have took a simple phone call to ask him what pharmacy again if that was the case. 3 days later still no medicine. Good thing it wasn’t anything he needed such as a inhaler or something or he would have been in big trouble.

name: Marcus Pettus
text: I could not have had a better experience at an urgent care. Will use from now on! I would like to thank the entire staff for being so kind and courteous to me!

name: Kelly Roberts
text: Extremely nice people

name: Michele Pointer
text: 10 I want to thank y'all so much for your help. From the ladies at the front desk to the Nurse practitioner I was very pleased with your service. I am feeling so much better today and it couldn't have been accomplished without you all there. Once again I thank you. And if I need such service again I will definitely come to you. Sincerely, Renee Pledger I don't want to leave out the lady that took my vitals and administered my injections. She was great too.

name: Caitlin Butler
text: They were really rude and really slow. I waited for 3 hours until I was the last one in the waiting room when I had been there the longest. They called everyone before me even though I was in front. Every person was in and out within the hour while i was just expected to sit and wait

name: David Streip
text:
They won't take checks. I won't be going back.
American Family clinic in Oxford was more than happy to help. They even called me today to see how I am doing.

name: Christopher Ramsey
text: Extremely rude and very unprofessional.  Not at all where you want to go for any type of medical treatment

name: Alabama Trappper
text: Worst place in the county. 3 hours in now and still haven’t seen the doc.

name: Nicole Parry
text: In a world where  quality customer service is hard to find,  these ladies work in one of the most challenging environments, when it comes to dealing with the public,  and they do it with class. They go above and beyond what is required and you do it with smiles. I know the job can't be easy,  but you all are definitely appreciated.

name: Tracy Edwards Brown
text: I went loved the staff and Dr was there 30 mins tops! Best urgent care I have ever been to

name: Jeanie Creswell
text: I prefer Southern Immediate Care over my regular MD.  It's quick, takes care of my family's problems, and seems to always be open.  The Nurse Practitioner there, Connie, is so kind and always seems to know the best treatment options for whatever is ailing us.  I always recommend Southern Immediate Care to my friends and family, and I will continue to use them for my family's needs.

name: Alycen_wonderland
text: Dr Price is a great doctor! He listens to you, and doesn’t try to rush out to see other patients! I will continue to use him!

name: James McCary
text: Was our primary care physician. My fiance went because she felt she was having trouble breathing and thought she might have an uper resperatory infection. Note the entire time we've been going we have never seen a doctor only a nurse practitioner. So without doing any blood work chest x-ray or even proper examination prescribed some antibiotics and steroids. Two weeks later after finishing her prescription started feeling worse. Changed her primary care to another physicians office and went there and was diagnosed with pneumoniae after a chest x-ray. Months later we're sent a bill charging us the full amount for the visit when as her primary care its a 15 co-pay.

name: Krystal Goble
text: Great time and care! The next day my son had an allergic reaction to the medicine that he has had numerous times with no reaction. They were very quick to my call and sent more medicine and steroids to help with no hesitation! Highly recommend!

name: Joanna Gray
text: I gave fast and friendly services at each visit.  My family all go to place.  Recommend to all.

name: Melissa Knee
text: Amazing care. The people were so kind and helpful and did whatever they could to work with me even though my new jobs insurance didnt kick in for another couple of days. Above and beyond care.

name: mike brown
text: Been there a few times and I have taken my daughter there and they have always been quick to get it and very nice and professional staff I would recommend this urgent care to anyone in the area.

name: Nicole Clayton
text: Please do not visit this place! I went and was there for three hours and left with the wrong diagnosis. I waited an hour in the waiting room (which I figured it’d be that way). I was placed in a room at 6:34 PM. Around 6:45, the nurse practitioner came in and asked me a few questions as to why I was there. She told me the nurse would be right in to run a few tests. Thirty minutes later, the practitioner came back to do the tests herself. She said it would only be a few minutes and then we’d go on to do the X-ray. I could hear them in the hallway just chatting.  An HOUR later, I was taken back for the X-ray. I was told I had a gas bubble trapped and she didn’t think it was my gallbladder. She said they would call me the next day for a referral to do an ultrasound to check to be sure it wasn’t gallbladder issues. It’s been two days and still no call. I still was experiencing pain, and I knew it was more than gas pain. Sure enough, I have gallstones which will require surgery to remove my gallbladder. I spent three hours there just to receive the wrong diagnosis. Don’t get me wrong! The staff was friendly, but it’s not worth it!

name: MeMe stricklin
text: The staff is always friendly and very caring. It's never a long wait!!! Continue the great service to the community. We drive approximately 30 mins to be serviced by this facility.

name: Nicole Brown
text: Waited in the waiting room for 3 and a half hours and the entire time I was there 2 people were called back. The place was so full there was nowhere for any new people to sit! I left before lunch time because I wasn't going to sit there for an hour and a half for them to eat.  Don't waste your time here go somewhere else.

name: Waverly Polak
text: I came here to get a physical and had to wait an hour and a half until I finally saw the nurse practitioner, just for her to sign a piece of paper to say I am physically capable of working there. They're very slow.

name: Jacob Burrell
text: Friendly staff. Knowledgeable doctors. In and out as quickly as possible

name: Gretajill Prickett
text: Been here for over 3 hours with my son which feels awful with flu symtoms. I didn't want to click even 1 star but "a less than zero" option isn't available. Place is a joke.

name: Rodger Brothers
text: Got in and out fast. Like the Doctor's practitioner. She was very knowledgeable.

name: Jake Reaper
text: If I could give no stars I would I went up there just to get tested for Covid and I sat there for three hours I ran out of time I had to get a refund and go somewhere else because they were taking too long I saw people come up there before I showed up and they went in the back before me and I was there before them the women there don’t care  will never ever go there again I’d rather die of sickness than going back there again

name: L Y
text: I just moved to the area and randomly picked an urgent care. An additional test was ordered and they said the hospital would be calling me. When a week had past with not one phone call I called to see what was going on. They said oh well the procedure is closed out but we can re open it. What?! So now I have to start all over and go to a new Doctor. I’m giving them two stars because they’re friendly. I don’t recommend.

name: Christina Brown
text: This place is awesome!! The staff is so so nice and the wait is short...been there many times and never had an issue..glad to have them in the community

name: Blah Blahb
text: 4 hours at the time of me writing this, no nurse.

name: Stormie Key
text: Just now leaving and one of the ladies at the front desk rolled her eyes at me and they have a new system so without all of my insurance information I can’t be seen which I don’t bring with me bc it should be on file. I also have had worse experiences before at this place.

name: wendy montoya
text: 10!  Love your friendly staff. Always a pleaent environment! Keep up good work!

name: Marsha Beard
text: I went in the Anniston office about the 2nd week of December with chest pains and breathing problems.  They did ekg and xray and said all was fine but still wanted me to see a cardiologist which Im fine with 2nd opinion, they also did blood work and called me on the 29th od Dec to tell me I was diabetic, which I knew that and it was not only on my paper work but was told in triage, and that my liver enzymes were high and they wanted me to get a sonogram of my liver,  I just got the referral lady to call me with a cardiologist apt a week ago and I have called 3 times about sonogram and she said that she would call me back with an apt by Monday and well today is Friday and still no apt. They may not be worried about my liver but as a diabetic it has had me worried for over a month now. I know Dr Junkins is a good Dr but his staff is giving his office a bad rep. They were all nice but someone isnt doing their job.

name: Tamara Reaves
text: Took real good of my husband and staff n doc was had great experience and they are really caring about there patients

name: Amanda Ball
text: Drove down last night 40 mins away because I developed a high fever and felt awful. I have met my out of pocket expense with my BCBS which means all of my medical expenses are covered at 100%. But they would not listen to me and I even I tried to show them but they wouldn't look at my phone. I have had my insurance for 6 years and know exactly how it works. So waited til morning to come to Doctor's Medcare and get called to the desk and told your out of pocket expense has been met so we will just bill the insurance. I knew what I was talking about! Teach them to learn abouy insurance or to listen to the patient sometimes. And I have no care for anyone to reach out to me.

name: Tiffany Beason
text: Every time we go the staff and drs are great! Highly recommend them!

name: Lorraine Watson
text: This is my second visit and as with the first I receive fast professional in excellent service

name: Jason Hauk
text: My son ,My wife and me was all really sick, We waited an hour in the waiting room just to get told they couldn't see us on a weekend when my dr is closed. But I could pay $100 to see there dr sounds like insurance fraud to me. I wouldn't take my dog to this place.

name: Jason Barnes
text: Great service. A great addition to the community.

name: Katrina Renforth
text: Sat for over 2 hrs while other people came in after my daughter and I got here and were taken back before my daughter was. The staff at front desk are extremely rude, and unprofessional. I wouldn't recommend coming here. Ridiculous how they make you wait, plus had to pay $135 to sit in lobby...

name: Toby Maag
text: Best care. Great staff. Very attentave.

name: Anthony Coley
text: Staff and facility was excellent. Was in and out in an hour with my 5 year.

name: Kathryn Kelley
text: Great staff! Fast, friendly and caring!

name: lacey truett
text: Excellent experience, everyone was friendly and fast service

name: AnDrea Gladden
text: Very friendly staff!!! Great price without insurance, gets you back quick and the doctor is awesome!!!!

name: Brayan Esquivel
text: Great personal I recommend this to anyone

name: Aariel Roberson
text: Good care fast lovable environment

name: Amanda Riker
text: These folks are wonderful!

name: Whitney Ray
text: Matthew Irvin was wonderful!

name: Easy E
text: Currently waiting, been waiting since 9:50am, and it's currently 12:43pm. The worse experience ever. As I was writing this, the doctor finally came in for exactly 2 minutes. Waited another 43 minutes. HORRIBLE !!!!!!.

name: kristy mcdowell
text: Super fast

name: Syeda Ruksana
text: I were feeling a Heart problem so at urgent basis i visited to MedHealth & Oh my dear Lord they provided the best possible urgent care to me. great staff .plus they are fully following all the sops related to covid these days.

name: Adreana jhons
text: Great reliable care. Very supportive staff take good care of you.

name: Alexander Jhon
text: I searched about Covid testing nearby and found Medhealth. They are just great (Environment,Staff) everything is spot on. I will Suggest all of you living nearby Montgomery to Visit MedHealth specially for Covid Testing.

name: Leader Raza
text: Medhealth urgent care is best urgent care in Montgomery Albama. If you need any urgent care, then visit medhealth urgent care.

resp.text: Thanks for the feedback & glad we help you in any sort

name: Syeda Amal
text: Great place and very cooperative staff.Provides reliable urgent care.

name: Laiba Khan
text: Great doctors and friendly staff ..loved it❤️

name: Collective Conscious
text: Best Urgent Care in the city, from the staff, to the wait and to the office decor. I LOVE THE DOCTOR AND THEY TAKE GREAT CARE OF THEIR PATIENTS! Highly recommended facility.

name: C DeLoach
text:
Closed on Fridays, not sure why it says it's open but the current office hours are:
Monday: CLOSED
Tuesday: 9-5
Wednesday: 9-5
Thursday: 9-5
Friday :CLOSED
Saturday :CLOSED
Sunday:CLOSED

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to review MedHealth Urgent Care. We are very sorry for the inconvenience regarding our temporary hours. We hope to return to our normal 5 day a week business structure however at this time both of our physicians have battled personal illness and have had to dedicate full-time hours on the front lines taking care of COVID patients at the local hospital. MedHealth wanted to provide some type of availability to our community. We thank you for your patience during this difficult time.

name: Tanner Vandertuig
text: On my visit the Dr wasn't sure about the problem so she left the room to call someone else, was gone for 20 minutes, then came back and basically sounded like she flipped a coin. She had no confidence. She then didn't sign the prescription before she sent it and was unable to resend it before the pharmacy closed so now I'm without my medication and not confident that it is the right diagnosis anyways. Not impressed

name: Jodie Wilson
text: I'm not a big review giver, but I do read reviews and use them to make my decisions. I was totally fooled by the positive reviews given for this place. Hopefully I'm just here on a bad day, since I want to be able to still trust google reviews. That being said, I have been waiting for almost 2 hours and there isn't even a doctor at this facility. Most definitely did not see the pleasant atmosphere and friendly staff others spoke of. Based on what I've seen as a first time patient with plenty of other options for urgent care choices, I wont be coming back.

name: zee clemons
text: CUSTOMER SERVICE  could not have been better, from ENTERING to EXITING.  GREAT ATMOSPHERE to assist u in feeling better. STAFF was was very nice.  If you want to feel better-when you are feeling your worst-visit “MED-HEALTH-URGENT CARE” - McGhee Road. 🙌🏽

name: EmJay Elle
text: Prompt and friendly service. My husband was seen very quickly and the doctor was super helpful in making sure he was cared for properly. For anyone coming in on a referral would be happy to know it's' just a hop and a skip away from Maxwell AFB and easy to find.

resp.text: Moriah, thank you! We appreciate you being willing to leave a review and we thank you for choosing MedHealth Urgent Care.

name: Kiahna Vernon
text: This place is great! They have an awesome staff and a nice environment.

resp.text: Thanks Kiahna

name: Aunt Tee Ronda
text: Mehealth on Mcghee road is a great clinic they are very nice and thorough. Every time i have called they have been patient and helpful

resp.text: Thank you

name: Step J
text: My visit to this Urgent Care was the worst experience at a doctor that I have ever experienced. I also learned that this office is not associated with the other Urgent Care facilities. This office is private owned according to the front desk. The front desk was a turn off with the greeting that I received which is a clear indication that I should have walked back out of the door. Once I escorted to the back with the doctor she wanted to diagnose me by looking at me instead of running tests because she was ready to leave for the day. No bedside manners at all. I will not be going back or recommending this facility to anyone else. Totally Unprofessional service

name: Bettye Hodrick
text: Medhealth, Urgent care  was a nice place to go, The staff  in the BACK WHERE THE WORK IS DONE WAS VERY NICE,  BUT THE STAFF AT THE FRONT DESK , TREATED ME LIKE THEY WAS DOING ME A FAVOR BY TALKING TO ME. WAS NOT VERY FRIENDLY AT ALL. IS ONE OF THE REASONS I DONT WANT TO EVER GO BACK,  BUT MAYBE I WILL GO BACK ONE DAY,

resp.text: Thank you Bettye we appreciate the business

name: Twin Homes
text: Dr. Lumpkin is so good and they are fast which beats the long wait time at the ER.

name: Kim Ogletree
text: Very pleased with the care I received for my 7yo daughter.

resp.text: Thank You Kim

name: Emily Robbs
text: Today, July 4th, I had a health issue. I called my insurance Nurse line, who suggested I see an urgent care facility. My insurance's appointment center called MedHealth at 5:45pm, and they told her they were open normal business hours today, until 7pm. So, I drove across town, arrived at 6:20pm, only to find the doors locked and ignored by desk personnel. They would also not answer the phone. I usually don't care about things like this, but I will make sure to let anyone I know to not ever visit this facility.

name: Lametrice Brown
text: I LOVE THIS PLACE!  Friendly, caring, and courteous staff!! Prompt service!! In and out!

name: TJ Ripp
text: The staff was extremely friendly and courteous. They got me in and out under an hour.

resp.text: TJ, thank you! We love hearing that our patients are happy with their visit. We appreciate you being willing to leave a review and we thank you for choosing MedHealth Urgent Care.

name: Tiffany Smith
text: Wonderful staff just great environment. Only place i will visit in the future

name: Dewey Whatley (UnrealMajor)
text: If you have Medicaid don't waste your time going there they do not accept it

name: James Warner
text: Highly recommend Dr. Harris

resp.text: Thanks James

name: Jace Vernon
text: Awesome. I brought my son in because he had come down with a sinus infection and Dr. Lumpkin was so kind to him. No he loves going to the doctor.

name: M Elharbi
text: You will set and wait till your body changes his mind to be sick! Staff need to get smiling course

resp.text: Sorry on the long delay. We do get busy at times and do the best we can to speed things up.

name: Tiffany Williams
text: Awesome place always professional.

name: Kole Steve
text: Don’t go here!! Doctor is very rude!

resp.text: Sorry Kole we may have been having a bad day. This can happen at times in the Health Care industry. We are allowed 2 bad days a year, and it looks like you came in on one of them. We would be happy to see you again and make up for our rudeness.

name: MedHealth Urgent Care
text: Med Health Urgent care is dedicated to you and your time. Our goals is to get you in and get you out before most doctors get you in. We are here to help any way we can.

name: Cheryl Brown
text:
Service was good but tried to contact them about my prescription, by leaving a message and the next day spoke to one of the doctors . I understood that I’d get an additional  medication. He said that he’d check on it and call right back. I’ve had no response to my requests. Very disappointing.
It’s very difficult to get a person through the automated service. I have yet to get through easily.
The menu is very time consuming and frustrating.
The positive is that the doctors were friendly and seemed knowledgeable.

name: Taylor Teel
text: Incredible staff that was very helpful.  They saw us right away, knew that it would require some extra care and attended to our patient very well, making sure that he was well beyond OK before they left.  5 stars.

name: Luanne Heslin
text:
I just returned from MainStreet Family care
! Fantastic care. All of the staff were tops!
Allison,Mariah,Keanna and Teresa went way above
Making a very upsetting visit ok! So professional
And courteous. I will return.
Thank you for everything! 10 stars in my book!

name: Delaine Gibson
text: The staff were extremely nice and helpful. The were pleasant, even at the end of a long 12 or 13 hour day spent helping others. I'm very thankful they were there and treated me with care and respect.

name: Noah Chizanskos
text: Staff did not help elderly couple, who stated that they did not know how to use the tablet for their visitation. My wife helped the couple, as I pictured. Staff at front desk has not batted an eye in their direction. This should be concerning for anyone worried about covid, as the staff handed the tablet over without gloves, the couple used it, and now my wife is using it for the couple. This is a lack of standards.

name: Deb Haze
text: This clinic is like a well oiled machine!  Such a breath of fresh air.  Everyone is extremely kind and professional.  Pam is exceptional at her job and I will continue to come here for care solely because of her.  Well done!

name: Kevin Kennedy
text: Awful! The lady at the front desk was not friendly at all. You have to check in online There is no other alternative for people that may Not be comfortable with using online services. While I was there an older lady came in and said she didn’t know how to use the services and they tried to give her a tablet instead of helping her and said they couldn’t help her. I told the lady that I would help her and then asked for a number to complain and the front Desk host went to the back and got two other employees who came out to me and told me that she wasn’t rude, when she was being rude to me , and then they threaten to call the cops on me when I committed no crime. I would never recommend them to anyone! You go in there not feeling well they are supposed to make you feel good about yourself and treat you. Not put you through more torment!

name: Casey Fuller
text: The online check in and texting process really made my visit enjoyable. I didn’t have to sit and miserably wait in my car or in the lobby for hours. Instead I was able to wait at home and they simply text me when it was close to my time. Lobby was clean and staff was very friendly and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing, Casey! We appreciate you choosing MainStreet Family Care!

name: Mike Parrish
text: I’m pretty sure I have a kidney stone. I registered, paid and waited. And waited. 3 hours later and I noticed several people had been called that arrived after I did. I’d rather be in pain at home. Or if I want to wait 3 hours, I can go to my regular doctor. DO NOT go here unless you have a day to waste.

name: Tannic Blu
text: The Staff Is Very, Very Friendly. My Visit Went Very Well, and Without Any Hassle. I Would Strongly Recommend This Urgent Care Clinic.

name: SarahAnn Southerland
text: Very nice waiting area with refreshments available, however, every time I have gone (3 times), the wait has been hours long. Would not recommend going here if you just want to get it in and get out.

name: Carly Byrd
text: I have been a patient at too many clinics to count. I have never felt more comforted while feeling ill than I did at MainStreet. The extra mile they go to here is unmatched. Free waters, juices, Keurig coffee, even play books and toys for the children! In/Out less than one hour. Highly recommend.

resp.text: We are so happy you had a wonderful experience. Thank you for taking the time to write this review!

name: Shontae McCants
text: I was in a car accident the day before and this Urgent Care gave me the hardest time about seeing me saying I had to go to the ER first. Even though I was told by the paramedics and police officers to go to the Urgent Care. In this day and time who want to go to the ER for a headache! The girl at the front desk left and wouldn’t come back to assist me I end up walking out and going to another urgent care facility. Very unprofessional!

name: Ashley Watson
text: Amazing customer service and care!

name: Belinda Reed
text: Will never go back . 3.5 hour wait. Staff was arrogant wouldn't listen to anything I tried to tell them. BP was elevated tried to explain I have had a lot of stress NP answer was I have a lot of stress but my BP not up.

name: Abigail White
text: The lady at the front desk was nice but I waited 6 minutes at the desk before she was there, I asked for a corona test, stated that I was showing symptoms yesterday and was still told to take a seat in the general waiting area. I proceeded to wait and sit near all of these people for an hour and 45 minutes before having to leave for another appointment, never got the test, i’m really hoping they find a more efficient way to test than using entire rooms for a nose swab when they could just quickly do it so that the other people there don’t potentially get exposed.

name: Kameko McLemore
text: Fast,  friendly service, with VERY minimum wait time! I've been before and I will certainly go back!

name: Bill Dorminy
text: Went early to get a "rapid" test for covid. There were already 30 people in line. 3 hours of standing in the sun with at least another hour before I would get through the door was enough. I knew I would have to wait, but there are numerous ways to offer good customer service and not have people standing in the sun for that long. Obviously customer service is not a concern of this facility.

name: Qiana McMillon
text: I am here this morning and there was a white woman with short blonde hair that was so RUDE to me and my husband. She made us move because we were in “employee parking” with no sign to show that and then she wouldn’t even answer my questions about testing!
