I would never come back here seeing that I had to drive over an hour to get here and be treated like this!! Management needs to be looking into who they are hiring.

name: Tim Ooten
text: Care by the Medical Staff was good. But I sat in the Lobby for more than 2 hours. Thank God I was not there for nothing urgent. There is no Urgent in the Valley Urgent Care.

name: Jessica Tomas
text: Went in and had a great experience. I was told that we would not get billed for my service after asking multiple times. A few weeks later was greeting with a bill so called the urgent care back and the receptionist/nurse who answered the phone was super rude. Would not recommend.

name: James Pridgen
text: The ladies at the front desk were rude and dismissive. and States that they were too busy to answer the phone. I had driven over an hour to that clinic because they were doing the rapid Covid testing with no appointment needed and when I got there they had signs on the door. I was told that there website had the correct information and when I showed them the information from their website I was told that there is nothing they would do about this. I told them that I had called numerous times and never was able to speak with someone and had I known that this would the case I would have not wasted my time. Then I was told that they were just too busy and didnt have any to answer the phone. I have attempted to contact a Manager with no success. I would not recommend Using this place as in their word are "Just too busy" and they dont even give you a bit of common courtesy.  --

name: Jonathan Hall
text: 6 HOUR WAIT..Showed up first thing in the morning 14th per person and still waited 2 and a half hours in the sun then 3 hours in the waiting room. Employee didn't like someone referring them as0 the DMV and told him to leave and not come back.  She can refuse service. Stating dont go to six flags then. I had to find out my results just so I could go back to work. If I can help it I will never go back again.

name: Anthony Murphy
text: Very nice people and was quick and very professional and made me feel at ease

resp.text: Thank you, Anthony!

name: Ravyn Walton
text: I went In on Monday night 10 minutes before closing with my daughter and the RECEPTIONIST had a very bad attitude kept checking her watch and told me I would have to hurry and get my paperwork done because they are closing in 7 minutes.  So the doctor finally calls us back and she got us in and out very promptly and was accurate and very polite. Told us wait at the front desk for the school excuse. Still checking her time the receptionist finally finished the excuse and calls my baby last name. Sits our excuse on the counter  without saying have Z nice night or anything.  I stated if you dont like your job you should find a new one because people come here sick you know you will have stay until the last patient leaves.

resp.text:
Hi Ravyn,

We really appreciate you reaching out about your experience. That's certainly not the kind of visit we want our patients to have. We will follow up with our staff accordingly. Thank you again for brining this to our attention!

name: corwin heard
text: At Main Street Family Care they are so nice to you and take good care of you. I feel so much better. Thanks to them

resp.text: Thank you for sharing Corwin! We appreciate you choosing MainStreet Family Care!

name: Tara Bryan
text: Went in this morning feeling terrible! The staff were great and I felt like Doctor Allison Strickland genuinely cared for me and how I felt. Offered me treatments no other doctor has before..... definitely recommend them!!!!! Keep up the great work Mainstreet Urgent Care!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Tara! We are so happy that you received everything you needed!

name: Tabitha Truitt
text: I took my son on New Year's Eve and as expected it was busy.  The reception area was clean and the exam room was clean. The Nurse Practitioner we saw was very nice. However, the receptionist that spoke with us as we came in greeted us by telling us how long the wait would be and what she would need to check us in. No hello or welcome. This was in a tone that was clipped and fast. Now it may have been her idea of an efficient greeting, not mine.  Every question asked was met with this same snappy tone. I also was not impressed with the nurse assisting either. No one wants to work on a holiday, so don't. But, if you have to, accept it and do a good job.

resp.text: Hi Tabitha! We appreciate you sharing your thoughts. This is not the typical MainStreet experience we strive for and your concerns will be addressed. Thank you for the compliments and we hope your son is feeling better fast!

name: Mary Willaims
text: From out of town and my friend has COPD. We called to find out what time they closed and was told 8. So we load up, arrive only to be told and I quote....."it's a minute til 8 we're closed".........my friend explained and was told "you can go to the hospital" with NO concern NO CARE in her voice at all. There was no one in the lobby, parking lot empty....so beware they do NOT CLOSE AT 8 THEY CLOSE BEFORE 8

name: Tyronica Marshall
text: Took my daughter in running a fever. Receptionist is rude and clearly prejudiced. We walked in first and she sent couple of different race back first. Btw...I'm African American. Never again will I take my child back. Lady came to front apologizing after I heard their conversation from the back. Apology was not sincere. Beware of the RACISM!!! Only gave 2 stars bc they took her back after the lies...

resp.text:
Hi Tyronica,

We appreciate you reaching out with your concerns! We'd love to be able to follow up, and if you have a minute, would you mind emailing us at info@mainstreetfamilycare.com with your daughter's name and DOB so we can review her chart? Please be sure to include any other specifics about your visit and interactions with the staff. The way our system works is that we pull patients back in order of when we get their completed intake form, not necessarily who walks in the door first. Regardless, our leadership team will look into this. Thank you again for contacting us and providing us with your feedback!

name: Craig Waters
text: Love this place

name: Michelle T
text: I came to this place to see about an issue I was having at 8:38am on a Saturday morning.  The receptionist was rude and ignorant. If you can get past Becky at the front desk then you will be fine. The rest of my experience was fine. Rated a 3 because of the receptionists stupidity.

name: Debra Wilson
text: Nice place,  clean. Staff very helpful and kind. I would go back or recommend them to others. They are all very young and have some things to learn abt patients but to me they were very efficient.  The only real problem is getting someone on the phone. Maybe they are very busy. But I think they do a very good job.

name: Ambriah Howard
text: Great experience and the Staff was very caring. Did not have to wait long either which is always a plus!

name: Lindsey O'Steen Doughman
text: It all depends on who’s working. I have had a five star experience here and I’ve also had a negative star experience here.

resp.text: Lindsey, we're sorry that we missed the mark with your experience this time. We strive to provide consistency. We'll be sure to meet with our team so we can provide you the experience you deserve--each and every visit!

name: Sherrad Hayes
text:
This office does a great job!!!
I've had some real bad experiences with places like this in the past but the professionals in this office are super. I have no complaints and highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you so much Sherrad! We try to help every patient heal and feel better, FAST! We appreciate you choosing MainStreet Family Care!

name: Jenna Brown
text: We also had a very positive experience at Main Street!  The facility is new, spacious, and clean with extra touches like free coffee, water and juice in the waiting area.  Staff was kind and service was quick.  They were so good with my son!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to share these kind words! We hope your son is healing better and feeling better FAST!

name: Alana Stewart
text: I went to Main Street Urgent Care for a severe cough. I did not have any other symptoms except for the cough but went because I didn't want to be constantly coughing at work and Dayquil wasn't helping anymore. I left with out any real diagnosis and a prescription for an antibiotic and a cough medicine. The cough medicine had absolutely no effect and after finishing to round of antibiotics there was no change in my cough and it has only gotten worse. I called up there to see if they could potentially reexamine me. Unlike every other urgent care that I have ever been to they told me I would be charged a copay to be reexamined. If I had known this was their policy I would have gone to an urgent care in Auburn like I usually do as they care more about me getting better than me paying a copay and don't charge one for reexaminations. They did call in a new cough medicine prescription however it is a decongestant even though I have absolutely no congestion symptoms. It was also not covered by my insurance so I was forced to pay out of pocket. I will not be returning to this urgent care in the future. In my opinion it is worthwhile to drive to the Auburn area to see a doctor that can actually diagnose me and make sure I leave happy and healthy.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear that you didn't have a positive experience, that is certainly not our goal or intention. We always strive to treat everyone like family and our patient's health is always the first priority.

name: Angie Higgins
text: omgggg what an amazing experience my daughter and I had. I actually felt important and not just "another patient". We received great service from the moment we entered the door by the receptionist to the very back. The young lady who assisted us (Tikerah) was very kind, gentle and patient with my baby. I would definitely recommend!

resp.text: Thanks so much Angie! ❤️❤️

name: Jen Evans
text: T.Brock was extremely sweet and nice! I went in on a Sunday and got out within no time would definitely recommend this place.

name: Zane Everitt
text: Great service. In and out in less than an hour. Everyone was very nice. The rooms were clean and complimentary coffee and water were a bonus. Definitely recommend this facility!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to share these kind words! We hope your son is healing better and feeling better FAST!

name: Felisha Mccullough
text: Paid $30.00 on a test was told to come back an get the results went back for the result I was told It was to late because a miss understanding of the time and date( Ididn't get my results of the test and they refuse to give me my money back and said I have to pay another $ 30.00 for another test really I don't think so)

resp.text: Hi, Felisha. We'd like to learn more about your experience and see if we can help clear this up. Would you mind emailing us at info@mainstreetfamilycare.com with your contact information? We look forward to speaking with you.

name: Megan Coggins
text: 2 months ago, I would have given 5 stars; However, 2 days ago, one of the nurses in the clinic refused to treat me. He said that they would see me, but wouldn’t send in any medications because of me being pregnant. I was very disappointed because I was also pregnant 2 months ago when I had the flu and was given a prescription by the same providers. Thankfully, the Urgent Care in Opelika doesn’t discriminate against pregnant people. Will definitely tell everyone not to go here.

resp.text: Hi Megan, we appreciate you taking the time to reach out to us. Pregnancy can certainly make getting the right treatment/prescription difficult, and we certainly attempt to do all that we can for every patient. I would love to get more feedback from your visit. If you could, give me a call at 205-739-4876 or you can reach me by email at AJames@Mainstreetfamilycare.com.

name: Chancy Rudd
text: This place is awesome!!! I took my wife in for stitches. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. We were in and out very quickly and we received exceptional care. I definitely recommend MainStreet Family Urgent Care.

resp.text: Thanks, Chancy! We're glad you had a great experience, and we appreciate you choosing MainStreet Family Urgent Care!

name: Nicole T Tansmore
text: No one never answers the phone or calls you back.😔

name: Elizabeth Abner
text: I am feeling so much better. This is my second visit. Everyone was nice and kind.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review! We're glad you're feeling better!

name: Calan Ray
text: I received great from Tikerah and the entire staff. Tikerah was so nice and helpful.

resp.text: Thanks Calan!

name: jeff carter
text: Very positive experience, short wait time. Katherine Gamper was physician that saw me and she was very professional and diagnosed my situation. Again very pleased with the service.

resp.text: We are so happy you had a wonderful experience. Thank you for taking the time to write this review! We agree that Katherine is one of the best!

name: Kimberly Rose
text: The staff here is amazing! They were willing to help any way possible and the wait time was not long at all!

resp.text: We are so happy you had a wonderful experience. Thank you for taking the time to write this review!

name: outshined72 (kimmyshimmy72)
text: I wasted my time going there. I was having a bad time after a flu shot. There was a tech who felt the need the need to diagnose me in the waiting room and the NP came to the door and basically made me feel like an idiot. Good job folks.

name: Ashley H
text: By far the best doctor place I have been to. I've been sick alot, and I went to the hospital twice and they did nothing & didn't prescribe me any antibiotics or anything. Even the regular doctors that I have been to down here, they just tried to get me in and out and didn't listen to the ssymptoms that I told them that I was having. I love all of the doctors and it is the best place to go if your sick

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to share these kind words! We hope you are healing better and feeling better FAST!

name: Alicia slaughter
text: I really appreciate the fast and friendly staff

resp.text: Thanks so much Alicia!

name: Mike James
text: great clinic. In and out in no time. courteous staff

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to review our clinic! We're glad to had a great experience :)

name: Jody Walker
text: Exactly what Urgent Care was designed to be. Friendly and helpful staff with a genuine concern for my well-being.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words Jody! This is exactly the experience we hope to deliver to every patient!

name: Anne Smith
text: They were very nice and kind, l went there for severe pain from sciatic nerve flare up, l could barely walk because of the pain that was on the 18th, today lm walking, thank you Dr. Nicole Groover for knowing how to help me!!!!

resp.text: Thank you for sharing Anne! So glad we could help you feel better, FAST!

name: Sherika Scott
text: This is the best thing to happen to Valley, Al as far as doctors go! Their building is nice and clean. They have complimentary water/juices/coffee. They even have other snack items that you can purchase. The wait time is short. The receptionist is very caring and understanding. The nurses are nice and friendly. The doctor seemed to be good. And they even have a treasure chest for the kids after their appointment is over. They accept medicaid unlike most urgent care centers which is caring in itself! But best of all these wonderful people actually do a follow up call to check on you 2 to 3 days after your visit and even if everything is going well they ask you to call back if anything changes. I can honestly say i love them!!! Laneir Hospital sucks (negligent and life threatning misdiagnosis', rude, long wait) -please avoid them and make mainstreet your place for emergency health issues! I now know they are indefinitely mine 😊

resp.text: Thank you so much Sherika! We're glad you had a great experience! We appreciate you choosing MainStreet Family Urgent Care!

name: Bob Gay
text: Great staff, Great service. Recommend to anyone in need of fast and friendly service.

resp.text: We are so happy you had a wonderful experience! Thank you for taking the time to write this review!

name: Mandy Cain
text: The establishment was very clean. The receptionist was very rude going in and leaving. The nurse or tech (not sure what she was) was extremely rude. They put me in a room, she came in and talked to me then told me the provider would be on the screen shortly and I could explain my condition to the provider. I was completely confused - she wouldn't explain anything to me. I had to finally get firm and say please explain to me what a provider will be!!! She said the Dr will be on the screen and you will see the dr by internet. I said NO I will not agree to that. I came here to see a Dr not a screen!!! She was so expressionless and had zero personality. No bedside manner at all!!!!! Very Rude!!! She was shocked I wanted to see a live provider -i said NO I want to see a DR. in person!!! Then she said a live provider would be in soon. I felt like I was in a science fiction movie!!! IT was very awkward and confusing. If I had not waited forever to get back there I would have walked out!!! The DR finally came in and I expressed my concerns. She apologized and told me she was very sorry and she understood my confusion and my concerns. She was very very nice!!! Then the nurse or tech (what ever she was other than very rude) came back in and gave me a shot and told me to walk out front to the lobby and wait on my meds. That is all she said and walked out!!! I went back to the lobby and sat down. I was in there going on another 30 minutes and asked the receptionist if my meds would be ready soon. She was very rude!!! IT was the holidays BUT you it is your job!!! I could have drove to Stop Watch in Opelika and been out for the time it took me at this establishment and received much better care!!! I do not suggest anyone to take time out of their day to see this establishment!!!!

resp.text:
Hi Mandy,

Thank you for reaching out and providing feedback about your visit. We apologize that your experience was not satisfactory, and we will be following up with our staff. Can you tell me the date of your visit? We are always striving to improve, and I hope we’ll have another opportunity to help you feel better FAST!

name: Debbie Wood
text: Great facility.  Katie is professional and  diagnosed my problem in a timely manner.  I received a follow up call to see how I was feeling.

resp.text: We are so happy you had a wonderful experience! Thank you so much for taking the time to write this review!

name: Taylor Harper
text: Cna that took my vitals was very rude . Asked her if I could bring my sister back and she said no it’s a hippa violation . I’ve never heard that in my life and working as a nurse I know that doesn’t break the hippa code . Once I insisted that I want my sister in the back with me no if ands or buts , she calls the girl at the front desk and starts to gossip about me and my sister wanting to be together in the room . I don’t see the big deal . Someone really needs to retrain the whole place cause nobody seems to know wth they are doing .

resp.text:
Hi Taylor
We are so sorry to hear about your unsatisfactory experience.  We are looking into it and someone will be contacting you to further discuss your visit. We appreciate your feedback and I hope we can win you back sometime in the future.

name: E'Lexis Edmonson
text: Tikerah was very kind and made my experience better than any other time I have visited.

name: Regina Moore
text: Today I was treated for a sore on my mouth and was prescribed a medicine that i have already tried that was over the counter. I will go to my physician next time. I am not please at all.

resp.text: Hi Regina! I'm sorry your experience at MainStreet was less than a 5 star experience. I'd love to speak with you more about it if you could give me a call at 205-739-4876.

name: Keyal Loveland
text: Clean, friendly, with organic coffees/teas/juice in the lobby. They even have blankets in case you get cold. It's the little things!

resp.text:
We are so happy you had a wonderful experience. We agree about the “little things” meaning so much!
Thank you for taking the time to write this review!

name: Joy Robinson
text: I was very sick went in the young lady up front was very kind get to the back the and one of the Techs that came in to give me a shot was very rude I reported her right then only she knew I was about to report her actions so she spoke to the person in charge ahead of me trying to justify her actions this is not a free clinic and people come because they are sick and need help Quickly my blood pressure was up and I had a sinus infection / cold and I was treated very rude and when I addressed it it wasn't taken serious this happened Sep 25 ,2017  after waiting almost 2hrs to be seen because of them being full

resp.text: We are sorry to hear that you didn't have a positive experience, that is certainly not our goal or intention. We always strive to treat everyone like family and our patient's health is always the first priority.

name: Roniegus Lyons
text: I had insurance but they still wouldn't see me because I didn't have 60$ Co pay. I could have died

resp.text: Hi Roniegus, I apologize you had a less than excellent experience. Unfortunately we don't determine how much your co-pay is, but just go by what your insurance company requires for an Urgent Care visit. Though in any emergency situation, you would want to seek out the closest Emergency Room as Urgent Care isn't intended for most emergency situations. If you would like to discuss this further you can reach me by phone at 205-739-4876.

name: Danny w
text: Most screwed up place I've ever seen.

resp.text: Hi Danny, I apologize that you had a bad experience at our clinic. I would love to hear more about your visit. If you would, please give me a call at 205-739-4876.

name: Jackie White
text: Nice and friendly staff

resp.text: Thanks, Jackie! We hope you feel better fast! Thank you for choosing MainStreet Family Urgent Care!

name: Bridget Elder
text:
Rich the NP has just demonstrated to me and my family what healthcare is all about! My daughter was seen by him on Monday and today he called her to follow up! We are from Oklahoma and have been to several ER's and Urgent Care Centers and have never had a provider call us back to follow up!!!!
Thank you for caring and going above and beyond Rich!
We appreciate your kindness!

name: Tyler L
text:
This place sent fictitious charges to a collection agency. I had full medical coverage at the time in 2017. They sent the charges to collections as if I didn’t have insurance, even though I was covered.

I called to get this resolved and Ashley was not helpful. There wasn’t a clinic manager, she gave me a bad number to the billing dept, and she was flat out useless.

After hours of phone calls, I finally got on the phone with billing, collections, and blue cross, Blue Cross determined that Riverchase Urgent Care filed the claim under the wrong insurance contract.

I called back to speak with a manager and Ashley didn’t know anything. I find it hard to believe that you don’t know where your superior is and that there is nothing that she could do.

This place is trash and a primary example of what is wrong with the medical system.

name: Carmen Pangman
text: Awful experience from start to finish. Everyone was friendly but couldn't seem to do their jobs very well.

name: George Corey
text: Great place to come when you need a Dr..family has been treated from the flu..fractured foot...physicals..and everything else...usually very short wait times...they have become our primary care for our entire family...

name: Joel McCarn
text: Not good for serious or life threatening issues

name: Camella Hollaway
text: I was charged $65 for a Covid test. After receiving my results, I shared with the doctor, my symptoms. He stated, “It’s pollen.  You have sinus problems.”  He never examined me.  He then stated, “I will call in a prescription. Which pharmacy do you use?”  The prescription was never called in.  I am so disappointed.  Please be advised this is the third incident I’ve encountered with this doctor and this facility. I’ve documented each incident and will act accordingly.

name: Melvin Morton
text: Outstanding! correct diagnosis felt better one hour after getting two shots and my prescription.

name: Wesley Griffin
text: Took my mom there today and we were the first people there but ended up being the last to be almost seen had to leave without being seen but all the white people were seen. Very disappointing and will never return. And i will make sure nobody i know will go there.

name: Curtis Watts
text: Helped save my life

name: Tanika Wagner
text: I have made 2 visits at Urgent Care Selma within the last 6 months and the service was AWESOME. I was very please on my last visit which was for a stomach virus and I was beyond satisfied with the service provided besides just giving me prescriptions. I was treated with IV fluids and felt so much better after leaving. Kudos to the Urgent Care Doctor & staff...

name: Quita Mack
text: If your business states you close at 6, why close 40 minutes early just because it’s slow. I had just spoken with the office receptionist and was told they stop seeing their last patient at 5:45, just to arrive at the office to be told they closed early.

name: Russell Pardue
text: 2 hour and 35 minutes is a little much to sit and a urgent care. Btw I’m still here

name: Kathy Alexander
text: Fast, professional and the staff along with doctor were  wonderful. Glad that they are convenient.

name: Vanessa Brown
text: Dr. Nam and the staff at Urgent Care are all amazing. You are in and out in no time.

name: Barbara Gilmore
text: good and friendly  fast service

name: Suwanda Lewis
text: Amazing care and treatment

name: Tarnisha Thomas
text: Awesome staff

name: cory adams
text: waiting times are very long. even when not busy. covid-19 tests require medical insurance and $125 fees not negotiable. I highly recommend anywhere else for covid tests.

name: John Blair
text: My son fell yesterday and messed his chin up pretty bad and upon entering main street urgent care we were told since they closed in 6 minutes they couldnt help. The doctor was rude about it. I thought that if it was an emergency no matter what time they closed they were supposed to help. But evidently hes just in it for money instead of actually helping people. Sorriest service ever.

name: Brian Tilton
text: Awesome people! I had to travel a long way to get their services and they were very busy, but pleasant and WELL ORGANIZED. Each staff person I met with was very nice, relaxed and thorough. I got to wait in my car for my own space and peace of mind. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND them and will not hesitate to use them again. Thank you for the great experience, it's very hard to find that in the health care industry today.

name: Tammie Dortch
text: My Husband tested Positive for Covid and the next day my daughter and I became sick.  We drove 40 minutes to this walk-in clinic to get the rapid test only to find out they’ve “reached their limit for testing today.”  So does this mean the PANDEMIC is over??  Or is it not as bad as we’ve been told?  I guess I can just go about my daily routine.  If there’s a limit for how many people can be tested, it must not be such a big deal after all.  Thanks for clearing it up!

name: William Covan
text: Been up here waiting for 4 hours now and there is only 2 other people in the parking lot so why is it taking so long to get seen...id be better off going to the ER at least id get seen faster and get out

name: Jamison Ingram
text: This place refused to test me for covid-19 because I don't have a Credit Card or a bank account. Regardless of insurance paying for everything. The next clinic that offer's testing is over 60 miles away. How can "health clinics" be aloud to be so discriminating?

name: chicken lady
text:
My husband and I recently visited Mainstreet urgent care on December 22 for the Covid 19 testing. We had the best experiance possible. The CRNP Troy Wilcoxson was awesome! We told our friends about what a great experiance we had, and recommended the establishment to others.
So today, December 23 I took my daughter back to get tested for Covid 19, since our test were positive.
In my 48 years I have only experienced two other so called CRNP's as bad as the Donna Conway treated me today.
She bad mouthed Mr. Wilcoxson in how he practices and the decisions he makes. I pleaded to her to change my daughters prescription over to what my husband and I were taking which is not against the law nothing illegal and she could have totally made me feel better as mother and understand ultimately I know my daughter best, she is not just a math equation.
Everything I said to her she used words like "debunked", when I am the paying customer.
I was shocked.
Just because what I was requesting did not fall into her agenda and I pleaded with her, she chose not to make me assured as a parent my daughter is getting  the right treatment. Not to mention she wrote my daughter for an inhailer and no one even listened to her lungs. Using an inhailer when you don't need it can cause more damage than good.
After I stated that fact, she then listened to my daughters lungs and said she sounded clear.
I am so appalled by her lack of bedside manner and inability to connect with the concerns and needs of the patients.
On our previous visit we were invited to sign the kiosk about our experience. Today Donna Conway made sure to skip that option. When I asked the front desk receptionist to please load the kiosk for me it only allowed me to enter 1 as my satisfaction, when I went type the reason why, someone conveniently shut it off and the receptionist could not reload it.
So there's that.
If this Donna Conway continues to be employed at your establishment, I will make it my daily mission to make sure through ALL of my media connections that people call first and only visit the Care Center when Troy is working.

name: Theresa Cahoon
text: I was very sick on October 30th. They were not seeing patients because their internet was down!  Today, I gave them another chance and the receptionist shoved a paper at me to go register on-line.  My phone doesn't work well. I wish another company would buy this place out so we could receive care! It's ashame. This used to be an efficient place with good staff.

name: Rodney Butts
text: Came in on Saturday 7/11/2020 , with sciatica so bad I couldn't sit down . I had been holding myself up on crutches for hours . I got there 20 minutes before they opened at 9. When the guy opened the door he went to the line of people wanting covid testing and began calling names. I told him that I was hurting real bad and needed a shot. He said that I should come back after lunch.  I replied that I am in a lot of pain and need a shot. He told me that these people need a swab . No compassion for pain. It was obvious that he hasn't had any real pain before.  I made it to the emergency room at DWM and they got me in right away.  I have used mainstreet before but I will not in the future.  When you put test before pain you have lost your mind in my opinion.  Testing won't last forever.

name: Tammy Gibson
text: My husband and I both have been ,and are very pleased with their service ,very friendly and professional

name: Lisa Driggers
text: Wait is terrible with hardly no one even in the waiting room. They over charge on everything. They don’t properly bill insurance companies so you’re left having to deal with getting it properly taken care of, in the mean time their billing people threaten to send you to collections for non payment ALL BECAUSE THEY COULDN’T BILL INSURANCE PROPERLY THE FIRST TIME. Will not go back.

resp.text:
Hi Lisa,

Thank you for reaching out about your experience. We'd like the opportunity to follow up on your account, but I'm having a tough time finding you in our system. Would you please email us at info@mainstreetfamilycare.com with your name and DOB? Also, our billing team would be more than happy to review your claim and fix any issues! The billing phone number is 256-854-9989. Please don't hesitate to let us know what we can do to help make this right for you, and again we want to thank you for bringing this to our attention.

name: Sandatmyfeet
text: Hospitality at its greatest. Front desk clerk super nice and helpful. Very clean place. In and out in no time. Nurse Practitioner/MD was very personable and knowledgeable. The Nurse or aide that done the vitals could be a little more talkative and explanatory. Overall good experience.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words! So glad we could help you heal and feel better, FAST!

name: Leah Blalock
text: This place is amazing!!! They were fast, extremely friendly, and even have medications on sight! Will definitely be recommending everyone I know to them!

name: Castle Clan Gunn Castle Clan Gunn
text: From a medical professiona new to town, this place won't ever be getting a second visit from this nurse. They are "smoke steaming off a hot terd" slow and unprofessional. I was second in line when the door opened and still had to sit for an hour and a half while seven other patients were called ahead of me because the staff didn't know how to enter my information into the computer system. I was sick as dog and couldn't even get a Dr excuse for one day!! I guess they know how we are all feeling on the inside!! I'll NEVER go here again and I'll tell everyone I know what a bad experience I had!! They didn't even call my prescription in to the pharmacy in in a timely manner!! Y'all truly suck!!

resp.text:
Hi Mr. Gunn,

We appreciate you reaching out and providing us with your feedback. We'll have someone review your chart so that we can follow up accordingly.

name: glennie kirby
text: Awful experience staff doesn’t give out correct information In several different areas from appointment to waiting to when results are back didn’t even post them to the portal so what was the point!

name: Vaniesa Cain
text: They provide Great, caring services, Thankful I Chose to visit them today for medical issues. I would recommend & use their services again if & when required. Thank you!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for choosing MainStreet Family Care! We appreciate you sharing your experience Vaniesa!

name: Trevor Farris
text: waited in the lobby for 2 1/2 hours while others that showed up after me got tested.

name: ANGELA WATSON
text:
I was very pleased with the service I received today. The place is so clean and inviting. Troy was super amazing with everyone, but there was a little boy there and we all know kids can be a little terrified about going to the Dr. Troy made  this little guy feel like the star of the show. Troy complimented his super cool shoes and wanted to play basketball with him. This was probably the first smile on my face all day.
Then I got to meet Super Troy and super he was. Bedside manners were SINCERE and AMAZING! Then I met Maegan who was a charm. Very professional and personal, which made me feel relaxed about being there. She was so sweet and got my second smile of the day!!!
Last but not least was Tory. She was super busy when I arrived, but friendly. She administered my three shots and breathing treatment. Best shot giver EVER!!!! She was so sweet and caring.
I only have rave reviews for the staff and the cleanliness of the facility.
I honestly NEVER thought I would visit here. A very good friend of mine is the Dr.
at the urgent care at D W McMillan, but I knew I couldn’t wait a week to see her. I was in tears when I saw Dr. Garrett was out until next year. She’s the absolute BEST in my book.
Much to my surprise, I was very PLEASED with my service today.
THANK YOU SO VERY MUCH!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing this Angela! That is the SUPER experience we hope to deliver every time! Thank you for choosing MainStreet!

name: Pamela Ivey
text: Our service at the Urgent care was great ,Troy and Megan did an excellent job they were efficient in taking care of my husbands very bad cut and were happy to do follow ups. Thank you Urgent Care I’m glad your there.

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us, Pamela! We're glad we could help your husband heal and feel better!

name: Brian Barrow
text: Call first if you can. Here's a secret even if your not needing them but you know in a emergency  this is going to be we're you have to go. Stop in and give them your information that way your paper work is on file. You will be surprised how much easier things go for you.

resp.text: Thank you for your review.  Our goal is to have you in and out in less than an hour.  The registration process is much easier if you have the intake form completed upon arrival.

name: Busy Bee
text: SHOUTOUT TO DEBBIE IN BILLING FOR BEING AWESOME!

resp.text: Thank you for your review!

name: Bill Bettilyon
text: Very kind and friendly staff. The place was really clean and bright.

resp.text: We are glad that you were pleased with our staff and facilities!  Thank you so much for the positive feedback!

name: Box Kidd
text: Unsanitary.

resp.text:
Hi Caspian,

Thank you for reaching out. We certainly try to keep our clinics as clean and sanitary as possible. We would love to get additional feedback on what you observed so that we can follow up accordingly. Please email any details to info@mainstreetfamilycare.com.

Thank you!

name: leslie sherban
text: I had a great experience here. I went on the weekend for a cat bite that became infected. There was hardly a wait which was huge for me and they even called back a few days later to see how I was.   But the thing that impressed me the most was when they told me I could call anytime I had a question or that I could even pop in for them to do a quick visual to make sure it's healing. Not only would I return but I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Ms. Sherban, thank you for your positive feedback! We hope you are feeling better!

name: Monali Chaudhari
text:
WOW. This urgent care used to be my family's favorite urgent care but not after the experience I had with the lady on the phone around 3pm today. Called today to see my brothers covid test and yes I did call twice before today just for some clarifications  and medicine questions about the diagnosis they gave him but nothing about covid because we know covid test can take awhile. Well when I called today for the results the lady on the phone was so rude and kept saying how they've already talked to 2 people and that she doesn't know how many sisters my brother has but she's already talked to 2 people. Ok??? If we knew his results we wouldn't have called to ask for it and wasted your and mine time. She did not want to just say negative or positive for some reason and was being incredibly rude like I was bothering her and like that isn't her job.
Unfriendly and definitely wont be back since we are so much of a bother to this clinic

resp.text: Good morning. We had documentation that the patient/family was notified of all results. We typically receive those type of test results all together. It is highly unlikely that you would have only been notified about one or part of the results. Due to HIPPA and protecting patient confidentiality, we limit information provided over the phone. We apologize for the misunderstanding.

name: Rachel Hooker
text: I had a wonderful experience at Parkway Urgent Care! Only had 2 short pages of paperwork, and I was in and out within 30 minutes on a week day during lunch time + already had my prescription called in to my pharmacy. Originally I had gone to another walk-in clinic where I was told the wait to just be seen was going to be 90 minutes. The staff are very friendly and seem to actually care about your problems. Elena, the nurse practitioner, is super nice and explains everything very well. I will never go to another walk-in clinic after this amazing experience I had at Parkway Urgent Care!

resp.text: Ms. Hooker, thank you for your positive feedback! We are so glad you were pleased with your visit. Come back and see us anytime. :)

name: Megan Lewallen
text: I have visited Parkway Urgent Care twice now. The first time I came in on a Sunday right as they opened with a horrendous ear infection. Elena, the Nurse Practitioner on staff, was quick to get me in the clinic and I was out the door within 35 minutes with my medication called into the pharmacy of my choice. I had such a positive experience that I chose to come back today when I accidentally shut my middle finger in my car door. It was bleeding from incisions on both sides and hurt terribly. A friend of mine who was an Air Force medic came to take a look and determined it would likely just need to be glued and helped me bandage and drove me to the clinic. I arrived at 3:50pm and was seen and treated again by the wonderful Elena and out by 4:21pm. I am so impressed with the kindness of the staff and the attentiveness of everyone I have met here. I feel truly cared for and will definitely choose to come here for my future urgent care needs as well as recommend this clinic to my friends and family. My mother has also been here at my recommendation and was seen and treated quickly as well. Highly recommend checking this clinic out!

resp.text: Ms. Lewallen,  thank you for your positive feedback. We are so glad that you have been pleased with your visits. Come back and see us anytime!

name: Florence Taylor
text: I taught urgent care was to have onsite lab. What is the need of urgent care when your lab takes 48hrs. I was disappointed because I taught they will diagnosed and start the treatment immediately.

name: Chris Bispham
text: Due to the pandemic finding availability with my primary care doctor was hard. The staff here was always very welcoming and helpful. I would recommend these ladies to anyone looking for medical help. They are professional and patient. I have always left feeling as if I've gotten the best care possible. Dr. Kruse is especially amazing and a great doctor. Her bed side manner and tact are top tier.

resp.text: Thank you for your positive feedback. We greatly appreciate it!

name: Bailey Bentley
text: I will definitely be coming back here! All of the staff was very nice and my whole visit only took 45 minutes. The nurse practitioner was awesome. It was an overall great experience!

resp.text: Ms. Bentley we are so glad you had a great experience. Come back and see us anytime! :)

name: Mary McCormack
text: I arrived at PUC at 10:45 on a weekend, and was on my way home by 11:45. I was only asked to fill out a one page medical history and current medication sheet. All staff were friendly and professional. Elena, the Nurse Practitioner, was thorough in her questioning of my symptoms, and even checked my vital signs. She prescribed an antibiotic,  and suggested a tetanus shot if it was 5 years since my last. She answered other medical questions and was very helpful. I highly recommend Parkway Urgent Care for any medical treatment needed. It was an all round pleasant experience,  and I will definitely be back!

resp.text: Ms. McCormack, thank you for your positive feedback! We are so glad you were pleased with your visit. Come back and see us anytime! :)

name: Jennifer Wilson
text: Have been extremely happy with this clinic, as someone who rarely goes to the doctor when I do I am looking for someone that will listen and “believe” the issues I’m having! This place has been amazing at doing that and taking the time and effort to figure out the problem. It’s always clean and inviting, staff is friendly and wait times are low! 10/10 recommend.

resp.text: Ms. Wilson, thank you for your positive feedback! Come back and see us anytime! :)

name: Haley Koch
text: The staff at Parkway Urgent Care was so amazing. I don't have a primary physician and needed to see a doc asap to take care of an infection. I was seen right away after filling out 3 pieces of paper for being a new patient. NP Elena was attentive and made me feel so much better about coming in! She diagnosed me within 10 mins. She called in a prescription that was ready for me as soon as my pharmacy was open. I highly recommend Parkway Urgent Care!

resp.text: Hi Ms. Koch. Thank you for your positive feedback. We are so glad that you were pleased with your visit and that you are feeling better! Come back and see us anytime! :)

name: Julia Blackburn
text: Elena the NP and Courtney at the front desk went above and beyond to help me with a last minute employee health screening that I needed. I called all over town and they were the first and only ones to go above and beyond to help me get seen and get my forms filled out. They were both extremely friendly, fast, and knowledgeable. It was quite literally the best appointment I've ever had and I will definitely be back for future care. I'm so glad that I found this place.

resp.text: We greatly appreciate your positive feedback. We are so glad we could assist you and that you were pleased with your experience. Come back anytime!

name: Cheneka Hayes
text: I was in and out in 45 mins. The staff was so kind to me and the CRNP answered all of my questions and showed that she cared about my health and well being. She didn’t just give me meds and send me on. I would recommend this urgent care to anyone!

resp.text: Ms. Hayes, thank you for your positive feedback. We greatly appreciate it!

name: Brittany Flemmings
text: Moving to a new town can be hard and being sick doesn’t make it any easier. I’m so glad that I was about to find a place that took great care of me. The Nurse practitioner Alayna was very knowledgeable and helpful and kind. I definitely would be back in the future.

resp.text: Ms. Flemmings, thank you for your positive feedback! We hope you feel better soon. Come back and see us anytime. :)

name: Lori Batey
text: I was seen a couple of days ago. The wait time was not long at all. The staff /NP was very friendly! I was seen for my visit from the car. But with covid that’s the new norm.  I highly recommend Parkway Urgent Care. I will definitely be back in the near future!

resp.text: Ms. Batey, thank you for your positive feedback! Come back and see us anytime! :)

name: Kelley McPhail
text: I called and emailed the Urgent Care Clinic a couple of times and was given clear and concise information that I needed before my visit. Came in and they filled out paperwork for needed labs. Next day I came back, lab results were in, met with the CRNP reviewed my bloodwork.  Staff were very knowledgeable, it was a thorough office visit, short wait time, the clinic was very clean and neat. I will come back when in need for urgent care.  Would highly recommend!

resp.text: Ms. McPhail, thank you for your positive feedback. We are glad that you were pleased with your visit. Come back and see us anytime! :)

name: Gretcha Perry
text: This place is wonderful! Low wait times and very kind and knowledgeable staff. Also providing COVID vaccinations and scheduling them faster than anywhere else I've looked into.

resp.text: Thank you Ms. Perry. We appreciate your positive feedback!

name: Jeremy Self
text: Just saw Elena at Parkway urgent care and it was a great experience. I come in with a sprained ankle and she was very thorough in describing the best way to heal my foot. Would highly recommend.

resp.text: We greatly appreciate your positive feedback. We hope you feel better soon! :)

name: Wynter Gates
text: I was sent home with Covid symptoms and happened to pass by this clinic on my way home—-I decided to stop in and get tested. The staff that answered the phones were prompt and friendly. I really appreciated the fact that I did not have to get out of my vehicle for any portion of examination. Elena was friendly and efficient and even called to check in with me a few days after leaving the clinic. They were all kind and very patient with me as I fumbled to find my insurance card and ended up having to call BCBS. I felt important and heard and cared for by this facility and it’s staff! They also have a quick turn around in calling back with results!  When my son became sick a few weeks later I drove from our house in Madison to this location simply because I wanted him to receive the same level of compassion and care that I had received. Elena was patient and gentle while testing him—-she was very personable and made for a good experience even during a difficult time. We will continue to return and I always recommend this facility to anyone searching for a welcoming medical environment!

resp.text: Ms. Gates, we greatly appreciate your positive feedback! Come back and see us anytime. :)

name: Nancy Wheeler
text: Everyone was very nice and My dr was attentive and listened and explained what I needed her name was Kendra and I am starting to feel better I went in for UTI and I didn’t wait long in waiting rm

resp.text: Ms. Wheeler, thank you for your positive feedback. We are so glad you are feeling better! Come back and see us anytime. :)

name: Daveda Chatman
text: I am so grateful for the ladies at the urgent care. They took care of in a timely manner and so professionally!

resp.text: Ms. Chatman, we are so glad that you were pleased with your visit. Thank you for your positive feedback. Come back and see us anytime! :)

name: robin jewellson
text: Highly recommend! Ilove this place!  I would recommend for anyone to go here. The front desk both ladies were very nice. I waited about 5min after filling out 3pages of new patient paperwork. They took me to a room and a NP came in within maybe 3min. She was very nice and asked lots of questions. They did an x-ray and tested me for COVID-19. I dont like going to the dr at all but this place was very professional and they didnt make me feel nervous at all. Thanks for making this a great experience.  Will definitely be returning.

resp.text: Ms. Jewellson, we are so glad that you were pleased with your experience. Thank you for the positive feedback. Come back and see us anytime! :)

name: Beau Blanding
text: The experience was very professional, and I still felt cared for and attended to, even from the car where I had to do my checkup cause COVID symptoms. Excellent place.

resp.text: Hi Mr. Blanding! We are so happy that we could give you a great experience. Thank you for your positive feedback. Come back and see us anytime. :)

name: Dave Adams
text:
Amazing visit!  No real wait time, not much paperwork for a first time visit, and the services provided was great!
Went in with bad back pain, and I was feeling better after the treatment.  Will be coming back as needed, and highly recommend them to all.

name: April Henley
text: Wonderful experience. Very sweet and professional. Also very quick.

name: Drew Yarbrough
text: Fast, professional, and super helpful!

name: Nesha Pruitt
text: Staff Was Friendly, Nurse and Nurse Practitioner Were Nice . Although My Initial Wait Time was WAY TOO LONG for it to be Just Myself and One Other Person in the Office, Once i Got in an Exam Room, I Was Seen and Given a Diagnosis/Prescription in No Time ‼️‼️

name: JASON J
text:
This has to be the best urgent care around. I walked right in, and did not have to wait.  I could not ask for a better Dr or staff.
My husband just recently went there, and they have been calling to check on him. How many Dr do this anymore?
I would recommend this place to anyone!!!!!

name: Tully Kesler
text: Was able to get in quickly. Staff was friendly and efficient. Was in town working from out of state and they accepted my insurance. Will use them again.

name: Frank Coseglia
text: My wife visited Parkway Urgent Care and received prompt care for her injured wrist.   The staff was friendly and professional. They even followed up with a phone call to check on her to make sure everything was OK and she was not experiencing any issues.   Highly recommended!

name: Chris Baker
text: No wait today. Quick , professional, friendly.  Will visit in future if needed. 2 thumbs up !

name: Jaenelle G
text: Nurse Practitioner was friendly and thorough.

name: ROCKET CITY RECORDS
text: They have a very friendly staff that will have you in and out in no time

name: KATHY ZENTNER
text: It's 1100 on a Sunday.  Website says they're open, sign on door says they're open. Building locked, no lights, and no answer on the phone - not even an answering service- after 30 rings.

resp.text: We apologize for the inconvenience yesterday. Due to circumstances beyond our control came up. No provider was available. Please come see us today. In the future we will certainly try to put a sign on the door.

name: Mary Ellen Millbranth
text: We are long time patients of Dr Zaheer Khan so when I fell at home and had an obviously fractured wrist, I knew to go to the Parkway Urgent Care in the same building,  I was thrilled to enter a beautiful waiting room where there was NO waiting. The staff was very friendly and I was immediately x-rayed with state of the art equipment. The atmosphere was warm and informal. On my visit, I was seen by Sydney Carriger, a certified registered Nurse Practitioner, who impressed me with both her clinical expertise and her caring manner. I didn’t even have to wait there but returned home to be called in less than an hour by Sydney with the radiologist’s interpretation of my films. As it turns out, I also had a non-displaced fracture of my left fibula. They subsequently made me a CD of the films so I could take them to my orthopedist. In addition to radiology, they offer lab services and can, if necessary, rely on Dr Khan’s expertise. I highly recommend this facility.  They are located on the Parkway access road between super Walmart and iHop.

name: Matt Moon
text: These people are fantastic, I highly recommend them!

name: MIKE KIRKWOOD
text: Staff was very professional and almost no wait time! The care that was provided was very professional as well!

name: Mary Lawerence
text: Thank you, Immediate Care of Foley.  especially the ladies at the front desk. They are definitely on the front line and much appreciated. Even though my wait was 3+ hours,  they kept their smiles and I honestly don't think they ever took a lunch break!  The patient line was a long one, but the office staff, nurses, PA and Drs were all very caring and professional.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your great review! Due to the rise in Covid cases, we are very busy! Our staff tries their BEST to give all patients the best care!

name: David Lee
text: Immediate Care is terrific facility for your healthcare needs.  They are very experienced, informative, and precise.  I instantly felt comfortable and confident in receiving expert care.  The entire staff is unbelievable! Highly recommend this location!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your great review!

name: Alexis Crain
text: Came here for a covid test. No one greeted me at the window. I signed in on clip board. Sat in my car in the parking lot. Called the office maybe 10x in 20 minute increments and no answer. I dont even know if they looked at my name. No one ever called me. Im wondering if I need to take hint and leave the lot and go else where. Currently still waiting to hear from amyone

resp.text: So sorry! We will check on this for you!

name: Lisa Hammett
text: My Niece carried her 2 year old Daughter there this morning, she told the receptionist she was there because her 2 year old had a fever and asked for an appointment. My Niece asked if she needed to fill out paperwork and the Lady said later.  My Niece  gave her their phone number and went to the car to wait. After 45 min my Niece went inside and was told we just tried to call you, but they hadn’t ( no missed call) and that they can’t take children under 4 😳 was of an hour 😔

resp.text: So sorry for your Niece experience!. We see children age 3 yr and older.

name: James Wiley
text: I went in this morning with a swollen knee and was seen relatively quickly considering they're a walk-in clinic.  They had me sign in, I did have to wait to be called for filling out paperwork, but there were people in front of me so I wasn't surprised.  They saw me pretty quickly, all the staff were very friendly.  I got a steroid shot, prescription and my knee is already feeling better.  Oh and NP made sure I had a drs appointment at home for my high blood pressure before she left too.  Good service and nice people. Will totally recommend/return(hopefully it won't be needed) in the future!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review! We really appreciate it!

name: Charlcey Knighten
text: This facility has the best staff! They were so accommodating and more than willing to help my current illness. I would definitely recommend this urgent care to my family and friends. They got me in and out, but were very thorough as well. Thank you Immediate Care for your kindness, understanding, and thoroughness!

name: chrisntina0420
text: Terrible Service. Tales 3 hours just to get signed in and then you wait two more. No compassion...Go somewhere else for good service

resp.text: We are so sorry for your experience! We are in a pandemic and the only Urgent Care in the area doing Rapid Covid Testing. So, we are very busy and our staff is working many hours of overtime to help take care of all the patients in our community. We should all thank and appreciate ALL our  medical staff for working during this pandemic. They are truly HERO'S !

name: Kaylyn Williams
text: I’ve gone here a couple of times when I’ve had my annual sinus infection(yay), and they are always SO NICE. Today, I was having trouble with my new insurance and the lady at the front desk was so patient and helped me figure everything out. Then going in a room, the nurse was the sweetest to me and she ended up giving me the most gentle shot I’ve ever had. I used to be terrified of shots, but they must go to school on how to be sweet and give gentle shots because I didn’t even feel it. And then there was DONNA. The doctor who I want to be my new BFF, yall. She was so sweet and personable and made the whole experience a breeze. This is absolutely the place to go if you need anything!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review! We all really appreciate it!

name: Walter Riggs
text:
Staff had not either the equipment or training to scan the barcode on my wife’s insurance card to verify coverage. Not sure which.  Still unsure why they couldn’t call BCBS and get someone in the phone to verify coverage.

Many places (such as the global consulting firm Accenture) do not provide physical cards any more as keeping these things in the iPhone/Android wallet is far more secure.

resp.text: Sorry for your experience. Our office is not aware of insurance cards with a bar code. It is always best to carry your insurance card with you, so clinics can get the information off the front and back of the card. Blue Cross is always closed on the week end. We always try our best to help patients with their insurance.

name: Sherry Hedrick
text: This place is absolutely amazing me and my husband larry Hedrick went to this office to get a covid test thinking he may have covid because he was having trouble breathing, he had no oxygen, couldnt even walk from the car to the house without using oxygen, he was going to get a covid vaccine but the pharmacy said go get tested so we went to this office thinking he was just going to get tested and be done, so i was waiting outside in our car with our dog, when all of a sudden the nurse practitioner came out and said that he had to be rushed to the er by ambulance because his h&h levels where 3.5 and not 14 and she didnt know how he was even walking or even made it this far and she wouldnt even let me drive him because she was worried he would pass out on me so i want to give a tremendous thank you thank you thank you to this office for saving my husbands life for i dont know what i would do if i would have lost him, so from us this office takes great care of the people that come into this office and would recommend this office to anyone who asks where to go.

name: Christian Brubaker (ChristBru)
text: Decent service, mainly giving 1 star for being lied to unnecessarily. "Because of your allergy to codeine the doctor had trouble writing a prescription for the pain." I didn't really care about that, went there for a stinging infection and got the script for antibiotics like I needed. Only thing no pain meds mean is I live with the pain until it heals, oh well. Just don't like the bs lie when they could have just said he didn't want to write a pain script.

name: Deborah Rutherford
text: Me and my kids use Immediate Care for all of our healthcare needs.  I can't say enough about how wonderful the female doctor is.  She has a wonderful bedside manner and truly cares about her patients.  The girls up front are  very nice and friendly.  I would recommend this clinic.

resp.text: Thank you so much for a great review ! We really appreciate it!

name: Tera Whigham
text: I sat shivering with a fever in the lobby for 1 hour before filling out paperwork. I arrived at 9:30 and left at 12:40.  There was only 3 people waiting to be seen.  The nurse was precious, but they are sooooo slow! Then my meds never got called in they had to resend it.  I didn’t get a very professional vibe here.  Will drive to robertsdale next time!

name: phyllis stout
text: Would have gave less stars if I could. Had about  7 seats but could have socially distanced with more fairly easily yet waited approximately an hour and still  could not fill out paperwork so could go back to car.  Was told could fill out when reached my name on list. Two different people said took 3 hours to be seen and one still waiting. Front desk personnel did not convey or offer assistance. Very rude.  We left and went to South Baldwin Urgent Care. Had a wait but very nice and told you what was going on.  Do not go here.

resp.text: Sorry for you experience! We comply with the CDC and keep our clinic safe. Patients are waiting in their car and called on the phone when they are ready for them to come in and get paper work and insurance card. We are seeing a lot of patients during this pandemic. It has worked out very well and organized, the way the front desk is checking in patients. Each patient, after taken to the back, is given adequate time to be evaluated and treated. We are seeing some very sick patients, at this time, and require more time. It’s very hard to tell patients how long the wait time is. We are very thankful to have employees willing to work during the pandemic, and appreciate everyone’s patients.

name: Michael Terrell
text: Absolutely the worst service in Baldwin co,did not ever touch me,take blood ect,would not follow up,only wanted to push me of to next money leaches ,didnt even come close to helping me heal

resp.text: I am very sorry for the experience you had. Our Providers give the care that they think is best for the situation. There’s times patients will be referred to a specialist. All the staff do their best to take care of all patients and help them meet their needs.

name: Rachel Sinclair
text:
I was at this facility. It’s closes at 8:00PM. A Spanish speaking gentleman came in- in a lot of pain. Didn’t speak much English. He came in @ 8:06pm.

The front desk told him they were closed. He didn’t understand. So, I used my phone to communicate with him as I do not speak Spanish. I called another urgent care in Orange Beach for him to see if they were open. I asked the front desk at this location if they could see him. The gentleman showed us his back and he had some major wound. They refused to see him bc he came in 6 minutes after closing. Doctors were still here— how do I know ? Because my husband was still waiting to be seen. Disgraceful.  What happened to humanity?

resp.text: We are open 12 hours, and we do close our doors at 8p. After 8p, people will need to go to the ER, that is within a mile from our clinic. Our employees work VERY HARD those 12 hours to take care of patients ! We care about our patients and our community!

name: Christina Phillips
text: I should have went somewhere else you should too. They have a 2 star review for a reason

resp.text: We are so sorry for your experience! We are in a pandemic and the only Urgent Care in the area doing Rapid Covid Testing. So, we are very busy and our staff is working many hours overtime to help take care of all the patients in our community. We should all thank and appreciate ALL our medical staff for working during this pandemic. They are truly HERO'S !

name: Cheryl Stenstrom
text: Went there 11/8. Brand new resident in Alabama. First experience with your health care system.  Its poor to say the least. I'm just as sick as that day. They said someone would call before they closed today.  That didn't happen.   Moved here from Peoria  Illinois where health care was superior.  Didn't expect this down here but I guess l should have done more research.

resp.text: We always try our best to give great care. We care about our patients and our community. Anytime your not better, call us ASAP. A nurse called you today and was happy to help you.

name: Tatum Presser
text: I was a little apprehensive when I saw the reviews but honestly the staff was absolutely amazing super friendly, I am really glad that I did go, thank you all for you help!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review. We really appreciate it!

name: Jordan Eliz
text: A few months ago I had a “doctor” at this urgent care tell me that my discoid lupus rash was ringworm. I also waited in a waiting room with people waiting for covid tests. Needless to say this place is a joke. The rooms are disgusting and this place needs renovations. You are better off going to the South Baldwin urgent care in Gulf Shores or American Family care in Orange Beach.

resp.text: Sorry you had a bad experience. Our waiting room complies with the CDC guidelines.Our waiting room is very large with only 8 chairs.  Every patient has the option to wait in their car. We care about every patient that we take care of. Our. Clinic is VERY clean and updated. We have a coastal decor. This does not sound like our clinic. Our Urgent Care is located in Foley at  the corner of 59 and Michigan Ave.

name: Mark Braun
text: Very short in explanation......reception was Frustrated as she mentioned she was the only one here amd would t take the time to help me with the insurance card info as it was a hardship for her and finally got frustrated and paid the 270.00 Covid test fee.  Hopefully I can submit it for reimbursement.  She held up my place in line amd have been here 3 hours and waiting while others after are being seen.  This is the worst health provider service I had encountered in my 52 years and just need a Covid Test as I can I. Shirt contact with someone and show no symptoms..

resp.text: Sorry for your experience! We always have 2 people working the front desk, unless they are on break. It really helps to have your insurance card and drivers license. Without your card, there is no way to verify your insurance.  It’s self pay, and when insurance is verified, your reimbursed. Our staff goes above and beyond to help patients regarding insurance to make sure their visit will be paid for, but without a card, this makes it harder and more time consuming. We always try our best to help our patients and make their visit as pleasant as possible.

name: Debbie McGlaughlin
text: Went in today and signed in. In the 45 minutes I was there waiting 1 person came in after me but was called to fill out their paperwork first. When I asked if there was paperwork I needed to fill out I was rudely told that I would fill it out once they called my name. Only one person working in office. I walked out. Won't be back.

resp.text: I am very sorry for your experience! Due to the pandemic, many patients are waiting in the car, and others don't really know when they signed in. We also have many patients seeing the nurse and not the Provider. Our front desk employees work very hard to make sure everyone is seen as they are signed in. The wait times will vary, depending on the type of problems each patient has. Our Providers want to give the best of care and time needed, to each patient.

name: Brenda Meadows Wallace
text: My husband and I have received excellent care!  They have been extremely helpful and caring.  Donna, their CRNP is incredibly knowledgeable and caring!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review!

name: Tim Hadaway
text: I've used this facility several times and most recently for COVID testing.  Wait time was minimal, staff were all friendly and professional.  COVID test results were back in 48 hours.  Definitely will use again when needed.

name: Brandon Sells
text: This business is clearly meant to get people in and out without helping them. I went in with symptoms and no tests were performed I was given a shot that didn’t help me what so ever and proceeded to be move to e.r. The following day.  And a week later I was hit with a follow up bill after having charged me for co pay and charging my insurance.   I can’t say I’m entirely sure why one would go here unless you wanted a $100 work absence note.

resp.text: We care about our patients. Patients can always call back if they don't get better , and see if the Provider would like to change their medicines. We want all our patients to get well .

name: Bao Anh Dinh
text: Staff, nurses and doctor are very friendly. They give me clear and detail advices. Except the delays of sending prescriptions to pharmacy, all is good.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review!

name: Jeannie Taylorbodie
text: Fast checkin, clean, everyone was helpful. I had to have covid test before my dr would see me for flu.  Well, I'm gonna get a new dr. Tested me for flu, covid,  and strep. Negative but treated my bronchitis...i had to wait but no longer than most drs..breathing easier....thank you 😊

resp.text: Thank you so much for your great review!

name: Bronson Parker
text: Young doctors or maybe inexperienced didn’t really invest into my condition went to 24/7 urgent care in gulf shores I would recommend them before this urgent care

resp.text: Our Providers are very experienced. We are located in Foley across from the Dairy Queen, Winn Dixie is behind us. Sometimes patients get us mixed up with other Urgent Cares.  We would love to take care of your health care needs!

name: james singleton
text: Been here since 9 am it is now 12 pm and have had 2 individuals who came in after me go back before and all i need is a Covid-19 test is place don't  care about patients

resp.text: Patients are there for all different reasons. They are triaged according to their problems. We are working very hard during this Pandemic and have a LOT of patients to see. Every patient is important to us!

name: David & Amy Beckner
text: It wouldn’t let me leave zero stars ! My husband is a Veteran and we were told by the VA to go to our local Urgent care he was having trouble breathing so we calmly walked in stated our reason for being there.  We were told we would need to make an APPOINTMENT.  I politely said “an appointment for trouble breathing “ she said yes due to the paperwork and the lady that handles that is in a meeting right now !!!! I am so livid and my husband motioned for us to go ! We does a Veteran have to do to get the attention they need ??????

name: Christian Ice
text: been here almost 4 hours. 3 hours in lobby. 1 hour in waiting room. still haven't seen a doctor. place wasn't even that busy. never coming back here again.

resp.text: We are the only clinic in the area with plenty of Covid swabs. We are in a Pandemic, trying to accommodate many patients. We are doing the best we can. We care about our patients and want to take the best care , but it will take patience on everyone.

name: kitty cahoon
text:
I have been using ICF for over 3years. They have always shown excellent care and services.
Dr.Weipert and Nurse Practitioner Donna Beck are not only well qualified but are also easy to confide in.  I believe Dr.Weipert served in the Navy and retired to this area. We are blessed to have him. The girls at the desk are great 👍.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your positive feed back!

name: Laci Fields
text: I called to see if they did stitches and give a heads up that my 10 year old was on his way there at 5:10pm due to a bicycle accident. After being put on hold to ask if we could still come because they didn't know if they were taking any more patients I was told my husband could not bring him.... 40 minutes before they closed! I asked if it was because they were busy and they said not it was just to close to closing time. If you are so worried about staying late then you need to choose a different profession or change your time to 5 instead of 6 to give yourself a buffer, but instead now I have to expose my 10 year old child to the ER waiting who knows how long!? Very unprofessional!!

name: Matt Terry
text: People here are literally trying to do as little as humanly possible.

resp.text: I am sorry your feeling this way! We are an Urgent Care and see most illnesses and injuries. There are some patients that need to be seen in the ER. Our most concern is what is BEST  for the patient.

name: Elizabeth Alvarez
text: 5 HOURS!!!! IT TOOK THEM 5 HOURS TO SEE ME FOR A 1 MIN SWAB. Do not go here if it can be avoided. Take the extra drive to robertsdale or gulf shores. It will be worth it.

resp.text: We are in a Pandemic and we are seeing a lot of patients at this time. Our staff is doing the very best they can. There are not a lot of clinics doing Covid-19 testing, so we are very busy taking care of our community and patients.

name: Laura Beers
text:
My son had a terrible sunburn on his legs and it threatened to ruin our vacation. We decided to seek out a medical professional, and I am so glad that we did. Dr. Weipert was attentive, and he prescribed a burn cream that helped my son’s burn nearly overnight.

I haven’t always had a positive experience at urgent cares, but this one was different. Dr. Weipert listened to our concerns and I felt my voice was truly heard.

I do not hesitate to recommend this urgent care to others. If you are lucky, you will get Dr. Weipert to treat you!

resp.text: Thank you for your positive review. Enjoy your vacation and we are here if you need us!

name: Richard Roberts
text:
Was recently exposed to somebody with Coronavirus. Called Foley immediate care at 1:30 to see if they fit us in today so we could get tested before the weekend. The lady was extremely rude and sounded upset we were even asking, she sounded upset when we ask about the cost since we had been exposed. We were told if we get there by 3 then we would be okay. Called back at 2 just to double check like their sign says and the lady told us the lab picked up early today and we needed to quarantine until Sunday and get tested then.
What I found most disturbing was the lack of empathy and how they showed do not care about something that is very serious. Cutting off testing a hour early before a major holiday?....
We were mostly trying to get tested to let anybody we know that we’ve been in contact with if they were okay. Also we would like to know if we’re dealing with a serious illness or not. The sooner the better.

resp.text:
I am very sorry for your experience. We are the Immediate Care in front of Winn Dixie in Foley. We don't have a sign out and our currier
has not picked up yet. I'm not sure we are the Urgent Care you were calling. We are very concerned about all our patients and would be more than happy to take care of you.

name: Jenna Brutananadalewski
text: They were kind. They seem like the genuinely cared and listended. I appreciate their patience with my grandmother, they listened to her and let her ask a ton of questions.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! Our staff tries very hard to give excellent customer service!

name: Samantha Alms
text: The physician's biases get in the way of providing adequate care. Very rude and brief. The staff at the desk are much nicer, but the doctors themselves should be replaced.

name: Autumn Buettner
text: you’re not going to find another clinic like this! Doctors and Nurses always go above and beyond, they’re so caring and very helpful with explaining everything. They take the extra time to make you feel comfortable. The front desk staff is friendly. They give the best care! Even when you’re not feeling well, they make the visit very pleasant!

name: Goddbod. Junya “iceberg” Winston
text: social distancing practice hers is superb...

resp.text: Thank you for your positive comment!

name: Kenna Goude
text: My whole family comes here! Everyone has always been very kind and compassionate! Never have to wait very long at all! Staff is very professional and efficient! We will always come here!

name: Bird Davidson (Bird)
text:
Stopped in here on a few occasions since they opened. Long story short... multiple negative experiences here.
I checked in at 3:39. The person working at the desk told me it is a 20-30 minute wait to be seen at max, but they doubt it would be that long. Ended up waiting in the lobby just under 1 hour only to be taken into a smaller room where I waited about another hour.  There was only 1 person in the lobby waiting before myself. Spent more time waiting than getting diagnosed. I made it out the door by 5:30 and accomplished nothing on this visit. First nurse, who processed my vitals, was cold and uncaring; lacking any hint of bedside manner. The specialist who followed was very sincere and much more personable, although gone in a flash before I got to get any real answer or direct path to a solution. This is not the first time here that I left in disappointment or frustration. Doubt I will return.

name: Anonymous
text:
Don't even bother calling, they're not going to answer.
Front desk staff is completely rude.

resp.text: We are trying very hard to give good service to all of our patients. We are in a Pandemic and seeing a lot of patients at this time. There are not many clinics testing for Covid-19, like we are, so our staff is doing the very best they can. We try to answer our phone in between patients, but patients in our clinic will come first. We want to give this service,Covid-19 testing,  to our community and patients. We appreciate everyone being patient with us!

name: Jennifer Sherman
text: There people skills suck. And when leaving they said they called antibiotics in they did not took me 2 hours to beg someone to call a prescription in. I paid $150 to see a doctor for 5 seconds and beg nurses to call prescription in. Never again I'll go to hospital before I ever deal with these people again.

name: Linda Jones
text: I got there at 8 am and was out by 9. Great Doctors and Nurses. The earlier you get there the quicker you'll be seen!

name: Hope Farrow
text:
I would give a zero if I could. I have never been treated like a "customer" verses a patient in all my years. If you have a BEG plan they insist on you PAYING for your visit IN FULL prior to even  being seen.
