text: It appears this facility is only interested in collecting for an office visit, I have been in the clinic for blood work and other needs but because I did not see a doctor they say I must have an office visit every six months even if there is nothing wrong with me. Try explaining to your insurance company that you need to see a doctor for no apparent reason. All I can figure is they want to collect for an office visit

name: Barry Thomas
text: Got sick Friday night. Could not hang on till Monday.  Dr Doty gave me two shots and I'm back. Thanks the entire staff

name: Sherry VonBartheld
text: Doctor Pernick is caring and best doctor in Gadsden highly recommend he is my family doctor...

name: Jason Yancey
text: This doctor is great and has helped me with my stress and a lot of other issues. He ran blood text and confirmed what a specialist could not. I am going to have to recommend this doctor highly.

name: Dee Michelle
text: Raymond Doty is a wonderful and compassionate NP... With an awesome staff THANK YOU ALL so much for helping and trying so hard with my impossible predicament. 🤗💜💝💖❤💕

name: Bob
text: Had a deep cut and was told I had to wait my turn. Made me wait behind people with bad colds.  Terrible that there is no prioritization of medical need during urgent care visits.

name: Leevi Day
text: Great staff and doctor I always make sure doctor perneck is in before going in he is a awesome guy

name: Angie Butler
text: This review is for my husband's last visit only. He has been seeing Dr. Pernick for years and he is awesome. Today my husband had to go due to being sick. He has been sick for a while. The Dr that was there today, Dr. Akif, was very rude and of zero help. He had a terrible attitude while talking to my husband.  He told us he could treat him with some steroids to help. We get to the front desk and he faxed a prescription for cough medicine only. We don't need cough medicine. Had he taken just a minute to check his chart, he would see that he had something at home for cough. And he told him if he's not better in a couple of days, come back and see Dr. Pernick. He was there for treatment TODAY! Complete waste of time and a copay. I bet I call ahead next time to make sure he is not working. I will say that the office staff was excellent!

name: billingcl
text: I experienced a professiinal, attentive & caring staff who helped me right away with my emergency.

name: Melissa Brown
text: So this doctor writes out scripts without dping any actual exams. No urine test. Blood test. Im having an issie with my bc and get wrote a script for anxiety/depression meds. Im having to call another doctor tomorrow. So if your having female issues they will just treat you like you are crazy.  Dont bother.

name: Tori Williams
text: I wouldn't RECOMMEND my dog to go to that place!!!!

name: Rita Tolbert
text: Friendly courteous personnal, very attentive and professional,  very nice experience, so different from other medical facilities, will recommend to everyone

name: Kim Mccurdy
text: Love the doctors and staff

name: Nevergivenup 123
text:
Been using Dr Pernick at this office for the last
5 year's or more. Very satisfied with care.

name: Kirby Galimore
text: Filthy office, filthy rooms! Very unsanitary ! The only good thing to say is the people there were nice.

name: JT Huie
text: Very friendly staff, and short wait time.

name: Cameron Harris
text: The can refuse to treat you would not recommend going , poorly staffed ,

name: Jen Patton
text: Made an appt for 10am. Finally get called into a room at almost 11. Its 11:38 and I'm still here. I made an appt for a reason. I didn't want to be here all day. They seem unorganized today.

name: Phillip Swindall
text: I hope you never need to call this office for anything. Phone tree and voice mail boxes are ALL you'll get. No humans equal no customer service.

name: Drew Fowler
text: Went to get blood work NP. Doty was only concerned about the medicine I have been prescribed by my other dr.s he was rude and narrow minded did not even check for what I asked for staff was excellent would not recommend to anyone

name: Rewind 1993
text: Absolutely awful!

name: Timothy Richey
text: Front desk staff are always rude. Couldn't get 2 people out in 2 hours. Look elsewhere for medical services.

name: Julie Norris
text: Friendly staff and didn't have to spend hours waiting to be seen by doctor.

name: Dana Sutton
text: I have been to this office at least 5 times, and each time have experienced excellent customer service. Yes the wait was a little long, but compared to other offices it's similar during these trying times. The nurse practitioner that I saw was compassionate, genuine, and though. All the office staff are very kind. I have worked in the medical field, and believe me being treated in a professional manner is something you will experience here. I do wish they would hold open slots for the elderly who are not computer or cell phone users.

name: Angela Formby
text: We live 30 minutes out from the office and, after signing in on the web service, waited until the wait time dropped to 0-30 minutes before leaving our house. We sat in the empty parking lot for an hour before we started to get antsy. We received a text saying they were almost ready for us after we waited another hour. We went inside to an empty waiting room and were told it would be another hour— all the while my sick child just wanted to go home. The receptionist reluctantly “moved us up the list” (again— empty parking lot, empty office, and enough time for her to play on her phone) but at that point I’d had enough. My husband was able to get an appointment with his regular pediatrician so we left. Needless to say, if it was possible, I’d give zero stars. Never. Again.

name: Darrell Spears
text:
-edit- why didn’t I read the reviews before I came?!?....

I called at 11:30 am and asked to make an appointment. I was told that they didn’t do those and to come around 5pm when they would be less busy. I arrived at 4:45 and was told that they were “at capacity” for the day... They “close” at 8 pm and stopped taking patients   over 3 hours before they close... I drove 35 minutes each way for this nonsense. My other option was another Main Street but that will not happen lol. Steering clear of this operation in Talladega or any other city thank you very much.

Long story short: AVOID.

name: Katrina Owens
text:
I was given a 3 hour wait time... Sick as a dog sitting in my car. After 3 hours, I was told it maybe another 3!!! Total wait time from registration to receiving the text to come in... 8 hours!!! E I G H T!!!
Thankfully, I'd already left and went to my local ER. In and out in LESS than 2 hours.
8 HOURS Y'ALL!!!! And I have screenshots of the messages to prove it!

name: Miki Fuller
text:
No matter what time you show up, youll.be able to eat two meals before youre even seen. Theres a 3-6 hour wait every single time. But if they know the walk in, bet they will be seen right away.

Save time and money by going somewhere else.

name: Shane Parton
text: Hard working nurses and Dr during covid 19 pandemic

name: John W.
text: Walk in Covid???? Walk in and wait 3 hours.  Do not tell you when checking in there is a 2.5-3 hour wait till questioned many times.  2pm and to be told people in line before that have waited many hours.  To to other clinic.  Bad Bad Bad

name: C Jones
text: I went in for Covid testing and was told that I had to register online. According to the receptionist, the registration opens at 6:30 am and closes when 40 people have registered.  There were several elderly people there that were turned around because they had not registered. This is a bad process as everyone may not have access to register or may not know that it’s required.

name: Todd Alexander
text:
Maybe tell people you aren't taking patients in that long recording before they drive 30 minutes at 11AM

Edit:  And again on a Wednesday at 1:00

name: Melissa Lemaire
text: I've been to this office twice now trying to be seen early in the day and have been turned away both times being told they have a limit on how many people they see a day. I am sick and need to see a Dr. Hours of this place are open till 8pm yet they're not seeing anyone? What kind medical care is this?  No service and told to come stand in line at 6am and hope to be seen even though I'm sick?

name: Estefani Colmenero
text: I hope this place stays open and with the same people for a long time. They are the kindest people that you will ever meet, especially if you are like me, afraid of a blood test. I have had 2 bad experiences with blood tests in the past, and they totally understood. They are very kind and gentle with people,they really are great about making you laugh and not worry. Thank you urgent care, I will be here for a long time, hope you stay as long as I'm around.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind works Estefani!

name: Lizz Garrett
text: Horrible service! Felt like nothing I told them mattered. The guy at the desk was down right rude! And we left with no resolve. Wasted 4 1/2 hours of my time trying to get my 1 & 3 yo kids well.

resp.text:
Hi Liz,

Thank you for reaching out about your experience. We will certainly follow up with our staff. If you have any additional details that you can provide about your visit, please email us at info@mainstreetfamilycare.com. We always appreciate the opportunity to improve. Thank you again for bringing this to our atteniton.

name: Blaire Butler
text: I went to MainStreet for a chest cold on a Saturday around 11:30am - I was the only patient when I arrived, filled out paperwork and got called back in around 15 minutes. Very nice waiting room, clean and comfortable. The medical staff were pretty quick in assessing my symptoms...did not ask as many questions as I would have liked and were pretty quick in prescribing me meds - I guess I just expected more of an exam/conversation but I just had a baby 3 months ago so am used to more involved doctors appointments! They did take my weight, temperature and blood pressure as well as listen to my chest real quick.  I was pretty descriptive of my symptoms as well as didn’t have much of a voice so diagnosing me probably wasn’t that hard! The nurse practitioner said she had seen a lot of what I had going around and knew what I could take with breastfeeding. Overall I had a great experience and will for sure be going back!  They offer water/juice/coffee hot cocoa in the waiting room too!  They followed up with a text and email and do seem to really care about their patients!! I am so glad we have an urgent care in Talladega!!

resp.text: Thank you Blaire! We are SO very happy that you had a wonderful experience during your visit. We hope that you heal better, feel better fast! Please let us know if there's anything else we can do for you!

name: Ashley Paris
text: Great Staff! Especially Katherine Owens! I hope I get her again, if I ever have to go back! Felt much better when I left!

resp.text: Thanks for sharing Ashley!

name: Megan Cagle
text: Never thought that the best doctors' office experience would come from an urgent care clinic, but it did! Everyone went above and beyond...from the front desk person to the CRNP. Highly, highly recommend for your needs. Sure do wish this clinic could be our primary care facility! Great work

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Megan! We love our patients and try to do our best to make you Heal Better Feel Better Fast! We hope you'll continue to choose MainStreet Family Urgent Care for all your urgent care needs!

name: Kayla Taylor
text: MainStreet is a convenient place to go when your sick. Katherine Owens does a great job making patients feel welcome and making sure they get treated in a timely manner!

resp.text: Thanks so much Kayla! We appreciate you choosing MainStreet Family Care!

name: Matt Riley
text: Don't waste your time at the place nurse practitioner there is a joke. Went in for a sinus infection and she wanted to give me a bunch of medicine to cover up the symptoms instead of giving me the antibiotics I need to get rid of the infection like every other decent medical provider has done for the many, many sinus infections I've had in the past. If I wanted to try to mask the symptoms and not treat the cause I could have went to the piggly wiggly and got some nyquil. I came there to get my illness taken care of because I  got things to do and need to be well too work to provide for my family. I ain't got time to be laying in bed hoping some flonase and a steroid shot is going to get feeling well. It was a total waste of my hard earned money for nothing. Now I've got to go to a place that really cares about getting me well instead of trying to cover up my symptoms.

resp.text:
Hi Matt,

We’re sorry your experience was not satisfactory, and we appreciate you sharing with us! We will have our Chief Medical Officer review your visit to see what we might have been able to do differently!

name: W Stein
text: Wish they were my family Dr’s. Had a sinus infection and were here visiting Shocco Springs. This clinic was very professional, very clean up to date facility. My family Dr’s office is not this coordinated.

resp.text: Great news W! We now offer primary care! You can schedule your appointment online at any time!

name: Dixie Roberts
text: The medical staff was great. But Improper music was playing in the lab.

resp.text: Thanks so much for your feedback Dixie!

name: Charles Hedrick
text: In and out in 30 minutes.  Very friendly and professional staff. I will definitely be back if I need care in the future.

resp.text: Thank you for your great review Charles! We are so so happy that you had a great experience. We hope that if you ever need us that you choose MainStreet in the future!

name: Daniel Castleberry
text: Nice people but for a 50 copay I expect someone to answer the phone and someone to call me back with out having to track them down when i need a referral and not be directed to a half working so called Portal

name: Lisa Kate
text: Great service

resp.text: Thanks so much Lisa!

name: Jodi Thomas
text: Dr Steven's listened to me and helped me get better! I will use him every time I need a Dr! Wonderful and friendly staff, thank you a million for your help.

resp.text: Thank you for the excellent review, Jodi! I am happy to hear our team could help! We are here for all of your urgent care needs!

name: vicky knighten
text: We didn’t have an appointment but we were seen within 15 minutes after filling out paperwork. Everyone we came into contact with were fast and efficient. Will definitely go back if we need to.

resp.text: Hi Vicky! Thank you very much for the fantastic review! We are so glad our team was able to take great care of you! Come back and see us anytime you need us!

name: sara thomas
text: Fast friendly service. Took care of my needs. Thank you so much.

name: Ashely Stewart
text: The inside is very modern and clean. Loved the interior design. The workers were extremely nice and informative. The medical assistant that did my testing did a great job at calming my nerves before and during the test. Process went by extremely fast. Thank you for the nice experience!

name: Jennifer Hill
text: Due to COVID my medical provider will not see sick patients in the office. They would only teledoc and send you here and there for testing. I was able to call Stopwatch and schedule an appointment and actually see people face to face. I was well pleased with the quickness in which I was seen and the care given.

name: LaCresha Kennedy
text: First time in the office today. The office has a great appearance, leaves you feeling very welcoming! The facility was very very clean. The staff was very nice and friendly. The wait time was very short. I love the service I received today! It was quick and professional! I would recommend everyone to go here.

name: Amanda Young
text:
Never checked in, receptionist was very rude informed me that is was 5;00 and my appointment wasn’t until 5:30 . That I could not check in until 5:20.
All of this was said in a very rude and ugly tone.!I told her I would just cancel the appointment . If this is any indication of the service you get here. Don’t waste your time! I will drive out of town before ever going back to this location . I wish I could find a number to speak with the manager.

name: Aiesha Harris
text: Went in for the first time today and everything went so smooth. The place is very clean and neat. All three of the ladies who assisted me were very kind and helpful. Everything got done within a timely manner and I had no issues whatsoever. I love it. 10/10.

name: Shanika Wood
text: I took my sick 4 yr old here due to him being sick and his primary Dr being closed. The customer service from the receptionist and the nurse was great! But when the Dr came in I informed him on what was going on with my son and why we came in. Dr. Malavong only looked in my son mouth and chest his heartbeat then stated that he probably had a cold. He then stated that he would give my son an excuse so he can return back on Monday, he didn’t prescribe no medicine or anything. Then on top of that he wouldn’t even give me an excuse for work due to me not being seen by no Dr myself. I nor my child will never go back there and I definitely wouldn’t recommend no one taking there sick child there.

name: Hannah Grayson Lee
text: I could not have asked for more empathetic, caring, and competent staff! Instead of just sending me home with random meds and an inaccurate  diagnosis, they ran as many tests as necessary to get to the bottom of the illness and give proper medication & education. Would use again!

name: michael shiver
text: Very Nice Doctor! Not only cared medically but also offered emotional support!  Also Down to earth and Friendly Staff. Very Short waiting  time as well!

name: Dean Jeffers
text: They are so great here! They did a rapid Covid19 test for free on me bc I don’t have insurance yet, and when it came up negative the dr came in and did a check up and gave me a steroid shot for free! Not a lot of places would of done this. Amazing place and people! Wish I could give them more stars!

name: Sam Henson
text: Nice and clean facility. Doc saw me quickly and sent my prescription with no problems. Convenient location too.

name: Cathy Shimek
text: Was told the Covid test was for free and receive bills in the mail. Try to call customer service and left a message and no one ever returned the call. Please call back the people...  when asked at the clinic to speak to someone about it they said nobody can help me for billing.

name: JustPreston
text: I gave 1 star only because the receptionist was extremely great and the clinic is pretty, clean and new. However, the only thing done when called back was a rapid covid test and we were not there for covid, though a good idea to test. They did nothing else. The doctor was very short and barely gave any care towards me or my child. I explained our symptoms and he cut me off to say that “yeah, it’s PROBABLY colds going around.” I don’t go to the doctor unless it’s absolutely necessary. So if you need a doctor excuse or covid rapid test, the doctor we had is good for that. I can’t say I will ever return even if that was a unusual thing for stopwatch. The doctor on duty that day ruined it for me to ever recommend or return.

name: Lisa Twiggs
text: My first visit today I was well pleased with my experience. The staff was very prompt and friendly. I would definitely recommend Stopwatch to my friends and family.

name: Kimberly Adams
text: The staff was very friendly and it didn't take to long at all and there kindness make u feel comfortable when going in to get seen for care and yes I would absolutely go there again  what a wonderful staff

name: Bill Potts
text: Really quick. Friendly. NP Andrea was great.

name: Jay Jones
text:
Wish I could leave zero stars. I don't care how clean and modern a place looks they lie too.  Advertise that covid test is free, BUT yet the HAVE to get yoyr insurance card. The lie told is that they just put it on file. Crazy reason if you ask me, took FOREVER  abd a few calls to get results.

Today, I get a bill from them where they BILLED my insurance and a statement wanting me to pay them $31.00, they charge $305.00 to insurance. BS, I'm not paying anything.

name: Cassandra Carroll
text: Currently waiting to see a doctor. Got called back into the room about a hour ago and there were only three people in front of me and I am still waiting to be seen. I had no clue it was going to take this long. I would have went somewhere else. I definitely will not be coming back

name: Angel Parrish
text: I was in and out of their office within 30 minutes. The doctor and staff were very knowledgeable and courteous. Will go back.

name: Leigh Walker
text:
Pros: fairly fast, very clean (what you should expect from a new building)
Cons: unprofessional office atmosphere, was seen by a nurse practitioner (so I’d assume if you’re wanting a doctor go somewhere else), not sending my fiancé a hard copy of his COVID results (which he needs to get back to class!)

TLDR: don’t do it.

name: Nola Jones
text: Was able to make same day appt. In and Out with no worries or problems. Can not get this in California. Amazing.

name: John Badgley
text: They mislabeled my labs. Effectively leaving labcorp unable to process them. I would recommend another urgent care. Their error has possibly caused me, to delay a surgical procedure.

name: Alexis Jones
text: Ms Cartrena that works in the front is very nasty and very rude.. this is her second time with an attitude for no reason!!!!

name: Lisa Price
text: Very clean office and courteous staff and doctor. Wait time was minimal.

name: Debra Hooten
text: Terrible its been two weeks and still no results from my Covid-19 test.  They need to close this place.  Don't waste your time go some places else

name: Peggy Mcvay
text: Quick, efficient, polite. Thank you for your service today.

name: Anthony Todd Senn
text: Fast and quick appreciate everything they did for me

name: Kerry Coston
text: They were extremely nice and had ya boy in and  out!

name: Carla B
text: Great place. Really helped me out.

name: Alecia L
text: Great service, quick.

name: Susan Halley
text: This urgent care lies to its clients who come in to get a Covid 19 test!! Never, ever received my test results and it has been a month!! Do not trust them!!

name: Lydia Ellis
text: Nice staff!  Quick visit!

name: Amanda Stewart
text: Clean office!!! Friendly and knowledgeable staff!!!

name: JJ Sowell
text: Not real

name: Timothy Worden
text: Visiting the area from it of town.  Had an inflamed lower back and nerve in my leg causing me pain.  The staff here was very friendly, professional and timely. Extremely happy with the care that I received.

name: Amanda Geier
text: Very friendly staff...the wait is kind of long but to be expected with it being a appointment and walk-in clinic. I always feel well taken care of.

name: thais torres
text: I was not the most patient when waiting to receive my covid results, but the the employees of the clinic where always very patient with me. They are doing a wonderful job with the resources available to them and they are doing more than we could ever ask for of them. Thank you and God bless you all.

name: Austin Yarbrough
text: Wont be returning and recommend others don't waste their time there as well. Piss poor service, absolutely zero sympathy for patients and, don't trust what the website says or what the receptionist tells you, the doctor will do thing his way regardless of how it may inconvenience others. Then they billed me for a full visit despite only getting a covid test. I recommend going to one of the other urgent care facilities in the area, they're less likely to wast your time.

name: Sherri Mabrey
text: My mom and I both were there this morning and they are awesome. Everyone was so kind and caring. Treating you like a person not just trying to get you and out. I highly recommend them. Thank you for your wonderful service.

name: Belinda Barker
text: I had been seeing my primary physician for 20+ years when I decided I was no longer happy there and was looking for a change. I used several walk in clinics before trying Anniston CarePlus and decided that Dr. McVeigh would be my new primary. He is a very caring, kind, and thorough doctor and I couldn't be happier with my choice. I have seen other doctors and nurse practitioners there and have been very impressed with them too. And the entire staff is awesome! I was so happy with them that I sent my sister there and Dr. McVeigh has gone above and beyond to help her when no one else would. I can not say enough good things about him! I have never had longer than a 15 minute wait in the waiting room or exam room but you never feel like they are rushing you in and out like so many doctors offices. They actually take the time to listen and try to provide the best care possible. I could not recommend Dr. McVeigh and staff anymore highly!

name: Jeanette Pitcher
text: Every visit we have made has been excellent no matter who we were seen by.

name: Donna Hudgins
text: Don’t rush to get here was told on the phone 4:30 was cut off time to have physical.  Was ask to come back the next day, so why bother having a cut off time.

name: Sherry Byers
text:
I would not recommend this business for you or your family. I had to sit in my car and they would contact. Me. Well a nurse seen me coming to ask a question for was told n ididnt have to wait outside  so I went in. Several people has come  but we are still her so I went to put my insurance information, copay, and dr era license . So 3 people called before me another one a few minutes s. Sixth person was called that caused me to get stern with them and demanded my copay baby. The girls at the reception desk all need better attitudes especially when you work with people

I wonder how many more people is going to dislike their experiences at the office.  Once when the words and actions do.

name: Jacob Trammell
text: I’ve been sitting here for well over an hour and everyone has been called up before me.

name: Jon Cowgill
text: Today was my first visit to Anniston CarePlus and it was such a pleasant surprise. The staff is friendly. I changed this to my primary doctor and will recommend to others for sure.

name: Austin Downs
text: Spent 3 hours waiting for them to call me back but they never did. They pulled people back that had gotten there after me though. I finally just left.

name: jan king
text:
This clinic is above others in area.  Employees and staff are very pleasant.  The doctors are through
And go the extra mile     I am so happy I made that first trip, I would recommend this clinic for your health problems.

name: Shelley Auffant
text: I never got the chance to meet the dr I only dealt with the office staff and 2 NP. Most of the staff were rude and only wanted to charge me my copay for any little thing they did for me. Bradley is one of the NP, he is horrible and does not know how to talk to patients. Ms Sherry the other NP was very polite and caring. I was planning on using them as my primary but after only 1 week of being their patient I changed my mind. They are not caring and nice as a whole.

name: Mitchell Hewell
text:
I've been waiting in the examination room for over 45 minutes now. No one has even come in to update me as to when I'm going to be seen. No one has even opened the door to let me know theybhavent forgotten about me.
I've heard bad things about other facilities, so I came here. Avoid this place unless you have a lot if time to waste.

name: Erica Billings
text: I went into the office for the the very first time ever meeting the staff & especially, Dr. McVeigh. I have never met or encountered such a kind, caring physician as Dr. McVeigh. Not to mention, the remainder of the staff. I was so pleased with the care & empathy that Dr. McVeigh provided that I'm now making sure he's my PCP. I was struggling when I went in on my initial visit & everyone was SO kind & compassionate. I highly recommend Dr. McVeigh& his entire team. Thank you, so much.

name: aliceleena smith
text: Today was the first day in went into care plus. 5/ 19/ 19. Everyone was nice and took good care of me. Bradley I thank him for making me feel much better. Continue do a good job and patient will  continue support y’all faculties.

name: Kalo Fire
text: Covid test are supposed to be free it's illegal to charge for them I'm sueing this place and reporting them

name: Mark Abeyta
text: Great doctors was in and out

name: Barry n Regina Grizzard
text: My wife was out of refills on her meds.  We called up there and Bradley took care of calling it in for her even though he didn’t see her.  Thanks to all the staff there.  Great friendly folks!! We moved all of our business to them. Thanks for all you do.

name: Ed Vick
text:
I have been going to CaresPlus for several years now,  I have seen Dr. McVeigh, Bradley  Elliott, and Hala Mourtada, for everything from follow-up for long-term illness to an emergency visit for stitches in my scalp after a fall.  I have always been extremely happy with the care, the time spent with and the expertise of the doctor and nurse practitioners, also the entire staff.
I have never experienced a extremely long wait time like some other practitioners but have ALWAYS experienced practitioner that actually stopped and listened to me.
I have in the past and will continue recommending their office to both family and friends.

name: Vicki Grey
text: Amazing care providers who really take the time to explain everything thoroughly and genuinely care. Knowledgeable and super friendly staff. Super clean facility with convenient hours. Highly recommend to others and will definitely be using for my primary/urgent care needs. Thank you!

name: amanda hafley
text: I went on a Sunday morning and was in and out within an hour.  I have always used Cares but the wait times and the service is terrible.  So glad I finally decided to try somewhere new.  This is where My family and I will be going from now on.  Thank you for the swift service!

name: Will Hallman
text: I just want everyone to know how patient and amazing the staff is at Anniston CarePlus. Dr McVeigh is extremely knowledeable and caring. Go see these people for your medical needs. I'd give more than 5 stars if I could.

name: oxford local
text:
My family and I started going here as our new primary care. Well so many things have happened that we will no longer be going here.
1. Many times we have been here where the parking lot and the waiting room was nearly empty and yet still took almost 2 hours to be seen.
2. I had some lab tests done. I called back to get the results.  I was told I had to make an appointment to get the results. Which I had to pay a copay to get MY results!! It is patient rights to be able to have access to that information. We shouldn't have to pay extra money for that info. No other doctor's office has ever done that to me.
3. At the appointment to get my results I get told that I dont have an appointment and we argue back and forth on that matter.
4. If there is a girl that works there that is named Sunshine she told people I was there to be seen as a patient. Someone I know told me that someone they know (whom I have never met) was told by Sunshine that I was there. I have no idea what else she told them. I dont know Sunshine or what she looks like or what her position is. So therefore I have no idea what personal and private information she has access to and could have told people about! I feel extremely violated. I even cried because of embarrassment of the possibility of people knowing that stuff and talking about it.
We will never go back. If anyone I know asks about where to go I will definitely warn them about the horrible experiences we have had here.

name: Suzy Q Crafts
text: Could not ask for a more caring, friendly staff! Love that they are open 7 days a week too! This is our new family Dr! I can not express how pleased I am with the experiences my family has had with them so far.

text: The only thing I have a problem with is that the women who answers the phone is very rude as soon as she answers she sighs like shes having a bad day like she just dont want to talk to you and then says what can I do for you .idk kind of rude I feel like she could be more welcoming and better at answering the phone .

text: How is this place even still open? Anytime I’ve ever tried to go I’ve been told the doctor has already left for the day and I can’t be seen. Even during normal business hours.

resp.text: Monday, Wednesday, and Thursday are our short days. Tuesday and Friday are the best days to schedule your apt. Sorry for any inconvenience this may caused you.

name: Tiffany Weathington
text: This place deserves a O! I’m all about supporting small businesses, but I do NOT understand how this place is still a functioning business/Practice! Poor customer service starting from the front desk to the checkout desk... Never will return even though it’s convenient to my house.

name: maysen schur
text: This place has awful customer service....thanks to the rude lady at the front desk I now have strep AGAIN!! do not recommend at all....

name: William Bone
text: If you require medical assistance that is remotely mediocre at best, don’t go here. This urgent care center has poor performance across the board. I went to see Dr. McKitty today, because I was suffering from severe nausea, vomiting, stomach cramps, and cold sweats. I am severely afflicted by GERD, and flare-ups like these occur on a semi-regular basis. It took me over an hour to be seen by the physician, though there were only 2 people in front of me in line. All the while I was vomiting and losing precious fluids. When I finally got to see McKitty, she had a smirk on her face and a terrible attitude from the start. I patiently answered her questions, and then I told her about my history of going to urgent care centers over the years for these flare-ups. I told her that I am usually given a saline IV and a shot of Promethazine when I have these flare-ups. To which she replied, “I will not be giving you Promethazine, and you can leave and have a refund if you don’t like that.” I was appalled by the rudeness of this exchange, but more than that I was in shock that this person claims to be a doctor, yet clearly has no fidelity for the Hippocratic Oath. I spent the rest of the day fighting nausea, dehydration, and cramps all over my entire body. I was able to get Promethazine, which I am prescribed, from my family when I got home, but it took over 9 HOURS for me to stop vomiting and be able to get food down. I needed the Promethazine in shot form, which is why I go to Urgent Care centers across the USA. I’ve been to at least a couple dozen of these centers over the past 7 years for these flare-ups, and I have NEVER been turned down for wanting Promethazine in order to relive my nausea anywhere from South Carolina to California. This is hands-down the poorest example of attempted competency that I’ve ever experienced anywhere.

name: Melissa
text: When you call for appointment,  the girl on the front desk will say "Doctors are all on vacation " then she hangs up on you! If i could give this place i "0" i would!!!

name: Bubba Ex
text: This place is the worst doctors office in this country. And run so horrible. Everyone is so rude. The lady at the front got mad and hateful because we paid the copay with a $20 and she had to walk next door and get change. The lady that done my moms blood pressure and took her information was so rude because my mom can't hear well and the lady wouldn't speak up where she could be heard and she was so rude and disrespectful. We was the only ones in the doctors office and it took almost 3 hours before the doctor finally came in, just to be rude as hell to my mom and call her a liar, literally. I'm not a doctor by far but I can read this doctors charts better than she can. And not that long ago my step son came here because some issues with his shoulder and the doctor here at Alexandra had x-rays done and comes back and says nothing is wrong with his shoulder and then she sends him to do therapy. Well his pain got worse so we took him to get another opinion and the other doctor done some x-rays of his shoulder and come back in and said it's pretty clear that a bone in his shoulder was shattered and he needed surgery. This doctors office here in Alexandria is the worst in every way possible and then some. This place should not even be open for business. People come here for help. And with every person that is on this staff does not need to be in this field. I know I've said it but this is the worst place ever.

text: Wonderful staff, thorough exam, really listens to the patient. Speedy service, too.

text: This place staff was so rude. I sat in the empty waiting area for a whole hour and never talked to anyone behind the corner never completed paperwork or nothing. text: I couldn't ask for a better group of individuals, from the receptionist to the Dr. They were exceptionally nice and polite. Given the fact that I happen to appear as if I had just been released from prison they still respectfully listened and helped me. The Dr, (Bonuel) was outstanding and honestly was concerned about my well-being. I was blessed to have located this office.

resp.text: Dear Jayson, Thank you for the awesome feedback. It's great to know that we were able to provide you with the highest levels of service. We look forward to serving you many more times in the future! Hope you visit us again soon!

name: Chris Kendrick
text:
Do NOT go here. A routine visit for birth control ended in tears. The doctor had no bedside manor, and stated that she was "pushing the limits of what I can do" in doing so. Her words, not mine. She then proceeded to berate my wife on all the other various things that could be done. We paid the full $175 ( for those uninsured), to be seen with the same level of care and compassion anyone would want to experience from a medical professional. Instead, now I have a wife in tears. Instead of giving any confidence in where things are at, they filled her with anxiety, took our money, and shoved her out the door.

They use different rotating doctors between their locations, and I personally have had good doctors at this location before. They all left. Not just due to other factors, but because how they themselves, as doctors, are treated. Educate yourself, and read other experiences to make your own conclusion, but neither I nor anyone in my family will ever set foot in this building or any other AFC location again.

I can’t believe this is how you treat your patients. This place is a joke. DO NOT GO HERE!

**UPDATE** Not at all satisfied by this canned response. I would imagine you would want to seek resolution.

text: This has got to be my worst experience ever. I went in to get tested placed my name on the list at 0807. Yes it was a full sheet then she said it wold be a 4 hour wait. Finally got called in at 3 pm and sat in a room for an hour. Mind you I’m still waiting for someone to come in. As I’m looking around the floor is nasty, hair everywhere and some even waxed into the floor. This place is definitely unprofessional and I will NOT ADVISE ANYONE TO COME!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your feedback! We're glad to hear we delivered such a great experience. If there's anything further we can do for you, we are happy to help!

name: Hannah Malone
text: Came in with a friend of mine & will come when I need to be seen next time!!! Leah was SO caring!!! She is an asset to your company!!

resp.text: Hannah Malone, thank you for your kind review; we are happy to pass along your comments to the team here at American Family Care - Tuscaloosa! We are always more than happy to assist you if anything else comes up. Take care!

name: Mason Hinton
text: AFC is a wonderful dr office, they are fast, easy to find, and have a helpful friendly and devoted staff that did a wonderful job taking care of me!

resp.text: Mason, thank you for your kind review; we are happy to pass along your comments to the team here at American Family Care - Tuscaloosa! We can't wait to see you again, have a great day.

name: Sharon Milligan
text: Friendly staff! Speedy visit. They even call on the next day to check on you. Definitely recommend this clinic.

resp.text: Sharon Milligan, we're so glad that we were able to go above and beyond your expectations!

name: Eric Osborn
text: Great service. Got in and out really fast. Staff was very professional. No problems at all.

name: Linda Fields
text: The staff was very friendly and attentive to my needs. I also received a follow-up call today.

resp.text: Linda, we strive for 100% satisfaction, and it is great to see you had such a positive experience at American Family Care - Tuscaloosa. We sincerely thank you for the positive review, and look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Lee Barber
text: Very little wait time with great treatment service. Staff and doctor were excellent.

resp.text: Lee Barber, thank you so much for the positive review!

name: Alice Dombrowski
text: Rate my experience as a 5  star begin with the staff and the Doctor. Great to know I'm in great hands at American Family Care

name: Cynthia Dancy
text: My Provider and the staff were attentive, professional and friendly! It's the reason why I choose AFC for my healthcare!

name: April Rico
text: If I could give them a zero I would. I went in there on a Sat at 5 with a bad earache and mouth was broke out from another medication. Dr come in looked in ear said it's nothing and looked in my mouth said I don't see nothing. I knew he was lying bc I was in pain and I feel stuff draining out of my ear and my mouth had irritation on it. He was so rude. I had to leave there and go to another clinic and it's a funny thing another Dr sees fluid on my ear and irritation on my tongue and mouth. I was given antibiotic and something for my mouth. Never again will I go to this place and I recommend no-one else goes. I wish I didn't have to pay him anything bc it's not fair that I had to leave this Dr and go to another one. 😡

resp.text: Hi April Rico, we regret to hear that your recent experience was anything less than exceptional. We would like the opportunity to address your concerns. Please reach out to us directly at (205) 722-9500 when you have a chance. Thank you, and we look forward to hearing from you.

name: B McDonald
text: "Manager" does not get back with you, nor is she available when I call in the morning and evening. It is not a first time occurance. I have waited for weeks (several times) on a referral (different ones). I have to constantly call about issues and have a hard time reaching the right person and I do not get called back. Doctors are fine at the clininc but the service and admin personnel are either under-staffed or not doing their job.

name: Alexis Russell
text: Worst care ever. Not even worth going to. Have been sick as a dog for three weeks straight. Didn't have any steroid shots, wouldn't give antibiotics, sent our prescriptions down the street to a pharmacy they KNEW was closed and 10 mins after we left and realized the pharmacy was closed they refused to answer the phone and the on call physician wouldn't call us back. Not to mention the physician never introduced herself so we have no clue what her name was and she BURPED IN OUR FACE and did not even say excuse me. Sorry excuse for a doctor, obviously does not take her vow of patient care seriously.

name: Tennille Robinson
text: Friendly staff, fast service! What more can you ask for? Thanks AFC!!!

resp.text: Tennille, thank you for your kind words and this wonderful review! Please don't hesitate to reach out if there's anything additional we can do for you.

name: Derek Slaughter
text: I've never waited more than 20 minutes to be seen. Staff and doctors are always polite and cordial. The nearby CVS & Walgreens locations are convenient. Facilities are very nice and clean.

name: S CB
text: THE WORST DOCTORS OFFICE IN THE WORLD DO NOT EVER COME HERE HORRIBLE SERVICE RUDE AND SMART MOUTH DOCTORS AND EMPLOYEES THERE WAS A NEW DOCTOR HERE TODAY AND SHE WAS THE RUDEST DOCTOR I'VE EVERYBODY TALK WITH WILL BE REPORTING THIS FACILITY!! DCH DOES A BETTER JOB THEN THIS PLACE!!

name: Desiree' Thorpe
text: This is a great place for family care. Great service, quick service and very competent workers.

resp.text: Desiree', thank you for sharing your positive experience!

name: Dale Fleming
text: They texted me to let me know how long a wait to expect, and to let me know when I was next up. Never seen this done, but think its a great idea. :)

resp.text: Dale, we strive for 100% satisfaction, and it is great to see you had such a positive experience at American Family Care - Tuscaloosa. Thank you, and have a fantastic day!

name: Takeasha
text: The staff is amazing from the time I walked into the door until I was finished everyone was great.

name: Stephen Williams
text: Kelly was absolutely incredible as well as the rest of the staff. I have never been treated with such care and kindness!

resp.text: Stephen, we are so happy to read such a great review about American Family Care - Tuscaloosa! If you're ever in need of more help, please let us know!

name: Jennifer Brand Browning
text: You know, I've read several of the ratings on here and just to say... I work in a medical facility, and I have been here 3 times for myself and 2x for my children now today with my husband. Usually I'm in and out within an hr to and hr and a half. I've never had an issue with the physician listening to my concerns  or the staff treating me or my family in an unprofessional manner. Generally, the staff is very warm and welcoming. I would not go here for everyday care but for care management after hours I recommend this place over the Emergency room. Especially if you only have a cold or something simple. That way the ER can serve it's purpose for medical emergencies.

name: Denise Lawrence
text: Incompetence, bad attitudes. Refused to fill out paperwork for my employer causing me to get red mark. Botched narcotic prescription wrong date causing me to be put in handcuffs and driven by police car to station.  Took 2 hours in cuffs.  Almost doesn't night in jail. Stay far far away from this place.

name: Ronnie Wilburn
text: The staff was very rude and ghetto for lack of a better word. I could here the nurses making fun of me through the door of the room I was in. The doctor told me I needed to see a specialist for stitches and refused to answer any questions. Very unprofessional.

name: donielle robertson
text: After several years of a horrible experience, I decided to go back to AFC needless to say I WILL NOT ever return. I understand there is a closing time but I was there Way before closing. As soon as I was rushed for X-rays for my knee I was never given feedback and was rushed out the door with an ace bandage on basically since they only had extra large braces... Excuse me for intruding on your time and paying your wages... NEVER EVER AGAIN!!!!!

resp.text: Greetings, I am the patient advocate with American Family Care. I am truly saddened that you are dissatisfied with American Family Care, as we strive for 100% patient satisfaction. In keeping with the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act, I cannot post a response that directly addresses the concerns mentioned. I do, however, welcome the opportunity to personally address all patient concerns, and ask that the patient or authorized representative be forwarded this message as it details my contact information. I can be reached directly by telephone at (205) 403-8902 ext. 2269. The patient or authorized representative can also complete a secure patient satisfaction survey at www.americanfamilycare.com. On behalf of American Family Care, I wish you and your family good health now and in the future.

name: Toreatha Bostic
text: Best staff nice treatment and make you feel comfortable. Kelli, Ericka,Malika and Saferia. The best.

resp.text: Toreatha Bostic, we're happy to hear you had such a positive experience with our team!

name: James Luther
text: This place is awful.  Went in three days ago- told them I did not have insurance so the lady said the co-pay for me would be 155, which is higher then the majority of other clinics around town, but I decided to go ahead and see the doctor. Not sure what the doctors name is, but she was large and had curly brown hair. The lady did not care whatsoever in diagnosing me.  I had insect bites, that I was thinking are fungal infections, so I asked for a simple KOH test to make sure it isn't- she told me she doesn't have it, its at her office, so she decided to prescribe me some cream- THATS ALL. didn't ask me anything,what the symptoms were or anything. So I made her give me a steroid shot to see what exactly it is, since she didn't care.  She had no compassion or anything, and then as I walked out, I saw her on her computer playing some yahoo game. Clinic looks nice, however the doctor I had was extremely inconsiderate.  Big waste of money, I will definitely not return. if you see a big brown curly haired doctor, ask for another doctor.

name: Ellie Cochran
text: Horrible patient care and service!! None of the receptionists, nurses, or even doctors seem to care at all about their line of work. Not sure if they just have bad attitudes, or if they simply don't care about their patients. Either way, there is no excuse. I had been sick for 3 weeks and had specific symptoms that were very basic and straight forward. The receptionist and nurse were both very rude. The doctor saw me for a total of 30 seconds before sending the nurse back in to give me a steroid shot, as if that was the cure to all medical issues. Avoid at all costs.

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback, and welcome the opportunity to address all concerns. I am the patient advocate, and I can be reached at (205) 403-8902. You can also submit concerns via a secure satisfaction survey at www.americanfamilycare.com. Thank you for allowing us to learn from you. Stay well.

name: Michele Jones
text: I have been here multiple times even a month ago. I did not have my insurance card this time. So as I was pulling it up online the front desk girls put 3 people ahead of me because they said they needed my card which they already have. Perhaps this is why there is never anyone in their waiting room

resp.text: Michele Jones, thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We regret that you had a negative experience, and will use this as an opportunity to improve.

name: Amy Nix
text: Five stars is for Dr. Klaiss, she is wonderful. Dr. Howton the last time I saw her was nice and considerate.

name: Shelby Davis
text: Went in today because I have a stomach virus and I never take my insurance card with me because they have it on file. I didn't have it with me so I told the lady they should have it on file and she said yes but it's a new year so I need it. (Which is untrue bc I work at a dental office and as long as they have the number they can pull it up online themselves to see what my co-pays are.) I went on my insurance website  and couldn't find the card but could find my policy and number and she said no I need you email the card to me, I said okay can you find it since you're saying it's on here and she said no I'm not allowed?!?! The office manager takes my phone to help me look and she couldn't find the link either so she writes my policy number down, verifies my insurance and collects my copay. But the front desk lady being rude and making me cry because she wasn't being helpful and I didn't feel good was uncalled for! Usually good people and good service BUT there are those rude ones you ocasially come across.

resp.text: Greetings. We appreciate your feedback. We welcome the opportunity to address all concerns. I am the patient advocate, and I can be reached at (205) 403-8902.. Thank you for allowing us to learn from you. Stay well.

name: Steve Chambers
text:
I don't write a lot of online reviews but when I was looking up the phone number for AFC I saw how poor all the other reviews were I felt compelled to share my experience.  I visited the clinic yesterday for a suspected broken collarbone.  The staff was friendly and efficient.  (And, yes, my collarbone was broken.)  I was given some prescriptions, discharge instructions and referred to my orthopedic surgeon.  Without asking, they made a copy of my x-ray to carry to my ortho.

No trip to the dr is "fun" but this one went about as well as possible.

name: Karam Maatouk
text: Best service I ever had, definitely best place to go in Tuscaloosa

resp.text: Karam Maatouk, thank you for sharing your positive experience!

name: Linda Travis
text: The provider and staff were very helpful and attentive to my needs. I also received a follow up call today.

resp.text: Linda, we are so pleased you enjoyed your visit to American Family Care - Tuscaloosa! Please don't hesitate to reach out if there's anything additional we can do for you.

name: Donna Davis Porter
text: Don't bother to even stop here if you are sick! My dog gets better care from her vet than what these quacks know. Total waste of time and money.

name: Kristin Kernop
text: This is by far the worst experience I have ever had at a walkin clinic. I have a history of kidney stones. I have been seen at AFC twice within the past several months with kidney stone like symptoms- pain, blood in urine, vomiting. The doctor I saw a few months back at a Birmingham location was very nice. However, I have relocated and visited the clinic in Tuscaloosa. The doctor I saw today was rude and completely neglectful. She walked in and said I have been seen at the clinic before and she couldn't help me. She asked which ER I wanted to go to and she discharged me. The entire point of me going to a walkin clinic was to avoid the hassle of the hospital. I left and went to a clinic a few miles down the road. This doctor took a simple X-ray of my abdomen and spotted the stone in my ureter that is causing me so much pain and discomfort. The doctor at AFC should have and could have done the exact same thing and she would have seen the stone. She could have easily treated me. Instead she was rude and sent me on my way. In short, I paid for her to send me somewhere else bc she was too much of a judgmental witch. I WILL be contacting her supervisor tomorrow and they will reimburse me. I will NEVER go back to this awful place. Don't waste your time or money.

name: brandy mcelrath
text: The lady at the front desk lied and said it was their policy to check blood pressure she said they did check mine and my husband's these were two separate days the nurse checked our records and said o yours weren't wrote down and your husband's is 122/something and that's a lie his is always high they bluntly lied.  They never checked them

name: Anya Nowicki
text: Basically had me do an MRI then told me they couldn't do anything. Sent me to the emergency room but didn't even send over the x ray so payed for 2 copays and an xray for no reason.

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback, and welcome the opportunity to address all concerns. I am the patient advocate, and I can be reached at (205) 403-8902. You can also submit concerns via a secure satisfaction survey at www.americanfamilycare.com. Thank you for allowing us to learn from you. Stay well.

name: Micah McKinney
text: Trash trash trash people extremely rude. Went there one morning after cutting my arm open & the employees there did not want to help getting an attitude with me as if why are you hear making us do work. They literally did the worst job ever. They did not stitch my arm up but used medical glue then didn't even close the cut all they way. Then just put peroxide on it & sent me on my way.

resp.text: Greetings. We appreciate your feedback. We welcome the opportunity to address all concerns. I am the patient advocate, and I can be reached at (205) 403-8902.. Thank you for allowing us to learn from you. Stay well.

name: S Hall
text: Very good place to go if yourin need of a Dr

name: Mike Rodgers
text: Terrible service. I had to go a little late because I can't leave work until 5. Seemed like all the staff had an atitiude and were just ready to get out of there. The doctor barely looked me over. Made up her own diagnosis. Gave me some shots and got me out of there. my symptoms have got progressively worse. I have had the same exact expierence at one of the other clinics. It's worth it to wait and try to get appt with your primary doctor because this place is a joke.

name: Edroy Francis
text: Reading the reviews had me a little worried but everyone on staff that I met was considerate and friendly. I left without any negative to say about my visit.

name: Morgan Carter
text: Horrible place to go. Went there a couple months ago, and the lady said I had a bill, I know I don't have a bill due to my insurance covering it all. So she gave me the corporate number and I called them, I've had the same insurance for a while. I go today thinking that the corporate office took care of it like they said they did and nope, never took care of it. They refused to see me. The lady was extremely rude to me at the place and even over the phone. I will NEVER go back there. And I will not pay that "bill" they say I owe. Couldn't even give me a print out or anything about what the bill was related too.

resp.text: Greetings. We appreciate your feedback. We welcome the opportunity to address all concerns. I am the patient advocate, and I can be reached at (205) 403-8902.. Thank you for allowing us to learn from you. Stay well.

name: Irene King
text: This place lost my liscense and I talked to corporate and they won't pay to get my liscense.. they don't have a camera over front desk just when they walk out of the front office area.. I was there for a while ... when I called corporate the lady was rude and she hung up on me! They are rude and I will never go back!

resp.text: Hi Irene, we regret to hear that you are displeased with your recent experience with us. Thank you again for taking the time to let us know how we can improve. We hope you will consider us again in the future. Take care.

name: Briana Whitson
text: The door says 7days a week 8-6 here at 8:30 the doors are locked and no has been answering the phone. Good thing i dint have a medical emergency.

resp.text: Briana Whitson, thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We regret that you had a negative experience, and will use this as an opportunity to improve.

name: Kenny Burns
text: I came here for a pre employment tb screening and immunizations that the employer required (healthcare setting job that I did not end up accepting).  The mmr titer screen shows if you have ever had measles mumps rubella. I was immune to all but one, no big deal. And they told me that day I could get a measles shot if I wanted one. I didn't - I'm over 50 and see no need. I am not involved in direct patient contact either, business office.  A month later I got a letter saying one of my tests was abnormal - a little scary.  I called them, they said "We don't give tests results over the phone. You have to come to the office."  I went to office and they said, "you really need to see our doctor." Scary again. I said, "I just want my results and I'll see my own doctor." And they gave the print out of the measles screen. Wow... they just wanted to talk me into an immunization and used scare tactics to do that. I was thinking diabetes, or something terrible.  They do a lot of pre employment screening and are probably using this tactic for those who don't understand what this is about. Money. Rip off place - don't go here.  This is Angeline Burns

name: Cool Dud3
text: Always friendly and quick service.

resp.text: Brantley Harris, we strive for 100% satisfaction, and it is great to see you had such a positive experience at American Family Care - Tuscaloosa. Thanks again for taking the time to leave us this information about your recent visit. Take care!

name: MultiplesOfNico
text:
I really did like this clinic. They always took good care of me.
Until I need a refill on my medicine. I called it in at CVS for a week straight. Wondering what was going on, I called them. I need my medicine ASAP. Was told they needed my doctors permission to refill it. Called AFC and was told since I wasn't seen by the regular doctor, to call that lady. Called her and was told I had to make another doctors appointment to get my refill. She was very rude. Hang up on her and got one from Dr bobo, no questions asked.

I also came to ACF for an injury I had at work. The wait was longer than usual. Yet I'm in HORRIBLE pain. It was a little over 30 minutes. Yet no one was there but me. The staff wasn't even busy. They were eating, laughing and joking around.
Finally was taken in and diagnosed correctly. My medicine was supposed to be sent to CVS. I had no script. Was also told by one of the nurses that it was sent. CVS didn't have my meds. I'm in a lot of pain. I called AFC and was basically treated like I was stupid. Repeatedly being told "Is it in the paper's we gave you?", more than four times. -____-
Surely I know what a script is. After telling them "I wasn't given one", they keep putting me on hold. For two thirty minute on call waiting, I'm VERY upset and in PAIN.  I hanged up and went to DCH.

NEVER GOING BACK.

name: Nikki Yarbrough
text: Dr. Day has horrible bedside manner and staff is very rude and inconsiderate. Never expect to be seen before at least 1.5 hours wait and there will be no one in the waiting room nor will there be any cars in the parking lot. Would not recommend this clinic to anyone.

name: June Allen
text: Very courteous staff and really quick. I was in and out in about 30 minutes.

resp.text: June Allen, we are very happy we could provide you with a positive experience!

name: Patrick Hall
text: Myself, my wife and my son, all on 3 different visits were very unhappy with diagnosis and treatment.

resp.text: Hi Patrick, we regret to hear that you are displeased with your recent experience with us. Our manager would really like to speak with you more regarding this matter. Please reach out to us at (205) 722-9500. We look forward to hearing from you.

name: Christopher Wigington
text: Dr. Howton is talking to someone on the phone about what Christmas presents they want while I cough up a lung in this room waiting. I will never return to this place.

resp.text: Christopher, we regret to hear that you had this experience with us. Please reach out to us at your earliest convenience so we may further assist you in working towards a resolution. American Family Care - Tuscaloosa (205) 722-9500

name: Kristy Crews
text: Convenient and very helpful with polite staff!

resp.text: Kristy Crews, thank you for the high star rating!

name: Kristi Williams
text: Terrible experience with Dr Howton and Kelly the manager. Very unprofessional .

resp.text: We are disappointed to hear that you did not have a more positive experience with us at American Family Care - Tuscaloosa. Please reach out to us at (205) 722-9500 when you can so we can address this situation directly. Thank you and have a great day.

name: andy daffron
text: Friendly great staff

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive review! If you ever need anything else from us, please feel free to give us a call or stop by. Have an awesome day!

name: Adam Miller
text: Friendly and fast. For a clinic, they do very well.

name: Koty Turner
text: Literally no one here. No sign on the door, no notice on the website. I called corporate for them to tell me that they're just not open today.

resp.text: Koty Turner, thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We regret that you had a negative experience, and will use this as an opportunity to improve.

name: Patty Moore

resp.text: Patty Moore, thank you so much for the positive review!

name: Stephen Puciloski

name: Heather B
text: Great staff and great care!

resp.text: Noon, thank you so much for the positive review!

name: Ricky Bayes
text: Dr K is the best...Staff always polite....Never any problems....

resp.text: Ricky Bayes, thank you so much for your high rating!

text: SLOW. ...Long wait. Avoid if you can

resp.text: Greetings. We appreciate your feedback. We welcome the opportunity to address all concerns. I am the patient advocate, and I can be reached at (205) 403-8902.. Thank you for allowing us to learn from you. Stay well.

text: If there were zero stars I'd give them none very rude and inconsiderate doesn't care about there patients

resp.text: Greetings. We appreciate your feedback, and welcome the opportunity to address all concerns. I am the patient advocate, and I can be reached at (205) 403-8902.. Thank you for allowing us to learn from you. Stay well.

text: Very nice to me and kind

resp.text: Chanel Glenn, thank you for taking the time to leave us feedback.

name: Ashley G
text: Called back and could only speak to the corporate office.  They refused to let me speak to the office where my husband was seen.  They had forgotten to give him a form back that he showed them and I requested it be mailed.   They denied our request and kept repeating that he could come pick it up if it was still there.

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback, and welcome the opportunity to address all concerns. I am the patient advocate, and I can be reached at (205) 403-8902. name: Triarii Cat
text: When I cut my finger they stitched me back up in no time

name: Shaniece Morris
text: Nasty receptionist horrible attitudes.!!!  Went for a physical for a job never want to return.!!

name: Whitney Wahl
text: Clean ans efficient.

name: John Ellis
text: After several years of subpar customer service, significant waits inside the lobby, and continual shifting in and out of physicians, they have shown some signs of improvement within the last 6 months.

name: kimberly arnold
text: So thankful and impressed with the care I received today. Dr.Thompson and his staff were so sweet, attentive and caring today.  Considering my bad circumstance, the visit could not have been any better in any way.

name: Xylair Sanchez
text: Called a week in advance to make an appointment for the covid test. I was told it is a walk in first come first serve. Was the first person in the door and the first to fill out paperwork. Had seven people get called back for the test before me. The staff said they did not know how the process works. Meanwhile members of staff not wearing maks as well people were not being told to wear masks.

name: HC Forgot
text: If it's Sunday or a Holiday and there are no other options available in Dothan, get in your car and drive as far as it takes to find another medical facility rather than going to this place. Dr. Travis Thompson is a joke. An MD who has no idea how to even ATTEMPT to communicate with a sick, anxious child that has autism. He was rude and extremely condescending. Instead of answering my son's questions he berated him. Instead of addressing concerns he belittled a sick, autistic child. Go somewhere else.

name: Dee hu
text: The people in the office were super nice and helpful. However, I was charged for the same service 3 times and after 3 days of trying no one will return my calls or emails. The one person at their cooperate office I did talk to was rude and unhelpful at all. They say they put patients first, however this clearly is just a saying

name: Alexis Brown
text: The staff is really friendly, everytime I’ve come here I have been in and out! AFC Dothan is amazing and have the best staff around!

name: Tammy Casteel
text: Was told I had to pay $20 co pay for covid test even though my insurance company(bcbs)states no co pay for covid testing. I paid receptionist $20 then she asked for my debit card to put on file. I wasn’t feeling well and wasn’t thinking at the time. I will be calling my insurance company to report this place. The NP was great, but the front desk receptionist was horrible.

name: Angie T
text: Emily Ingram, CRNP is wonderful and the best NP. She truly saved my life. Your company should be honored to have her as a NP at your facility! Thank you again for everything!

name: April Smith
text: I have been waiting for a solid week for afdc to make sure i get a medication they say that only a mail order pharmacy can fill. I called them wed and fri and today and i was told it would be fixed. Hours later nothing still has been done. I call and the medical staff does not answer the phone and if they do answer they pick it up and immediately hang it up.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to give us a review. We sincerely apologize about the issues you experienced, and we hope to make this right. Please reach out to pateitnadvocate@americanfamilycare.com so we can rectify this issue. Please include your full name, DOB, and a brief description of your experience.

name: NA
text: DON'T EVER GO HERE. They won't run your insurance correctly or even run it at all and when you try and contact them, no one answers. This place is also running a scam for covid testing. Testing is free at CVS, walgreens, and walmart go there because AFC is charging patients for it.

name: Jamie Trail
text: Any time I'm sick I go there, they are so helpful.  Yes sometimes it is slow but they can only help so many people at one time.  They are so kind and have thoroughly helped me Everytime!!!  I would absolutely recommend this place.  I've never had one person in the 5 years I've been going there ever be rude or anything but helpful and kind.  Some doctors/nurses have zero bedside manner, they hardly listen and you feel judged... It's the absolute opposite with this place, I don't have a primary care doctor simply because I love going to this place.  ❤️❤️❤️❤️ So thankful for providers that take their time and make you feel comfortable!!!

name: Jessica Umbarger
text: 30 people are ahead of me. This clinic is always slow as hell, but the ER would probably be slower. Which is where I was recommended to go when I told them I was in pain and my stuff would probably take very little time. I’m probably the only one in that waiting room in pain and to be honest I know what I probably have and just need a test and some medication. In other states you could just take this same test at home and get medicine from the local pharmacy. Really don’t even need to see the doctor. Just need medicine and to get home. I hate this place.

resp.text: We regret to hear that your recent experience was anything less than exceptional.Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will use your comments to refine our efforts to ensure this issue does not happen again.

name: Jonathan L.
text: Waited about 5 hours, upon going inside to check my wait they said something like "We wrote your number down wrong". I know this is a lie because 1. the lady who wrote it down verbally verified she wrote it down correctly 2. I could see my number on the list written correctly. Of course they refuse to correct this mistake by putting me where I should be in line or moving me up the queue. Stupidity and incompotenency rule here, will avoid in the future.

name: Laura Wright
text: I waited an appalling amount of time to be seen by a doctor, close to 5 hours. When they first called me back in to retrieve my Id and insurance card after an hour they told me there were 6 more people in front of me, after originally telling me there were 20 ahead of me. And then after another hours time I went in to see how much longer and they said there were 9 people ahead of me. I was extremely ill, unlike most of the people there who I presume were getting rapid covid tests, and was extremely disheartened to hear this. The girl at the front didn’t care and chalked it up to a mistake being made earlier, wasn’t apologetic or anything. I hated them in that moment. The nurses and doctor were actually very nice and got the job done, but the wait is unacceptable. I DO NOT recommend this place.

resp.text: We regret to hear that your recent experience was anything less than exceptional. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will use your comments to refine our efforts to ensure this issue does not happen again.

name: Peace Bomba
text: COMPLETE NEGLIGENCE!! I was treated very poorly at this urgent care. I went in feeling very ill (Fever, Sore throat, cough, nausea, stuffy nose) and wanted to get tested for Covid. The wait was over 45 minutes, then once I finally got inside the room, my vitals were taken I was swabbed for covid (inaccurately, I may add). After being swabbed, I waited about 30-45 minutes for my results which the nurse stated was negative. I was provided with some papers, one of which had random prescriptions. When I asked about them, the nurse gave odd explanations as to why it would still work. I noticed that the vitals and my symptoms were also documented incorrectly as I had a fever that was over 100 degrees. When I mentioned my concerns, I was completely dismissed and disregarded. Once I got to the pharmacy, I realized that I was provided a completely different patient’s paperwork. THIS IS COMPLETELY UNACCEPTABLE and a major HIPPA violation. I went back to this urgent care to get things situated, and the staff gave me nasty attitudes and not one person cared or provided an apology for this negligence. The staff is irresponsible and I don’t recommend this place at all. I will also be suing.

name: Aline Roberts

text: INSURANCE FRAUD: we are covered by Cigna insurance company. American Family Care has a contract with them @ they do accept our insurance. Our insurance requires my husband @ I to have a yearly physical, no out of pocket cost. On August 2019 I had this same physical done at this facility @ no charge. Today July 22, 2020 they are demanding $50 per patient for a the same physical what a rip off. My insurance agent has stated that this is against their contract @ will be reported. If u find that u are having the same problem u can go 2 All South Urgent Care here in Dothan @ u wont have 2 come out of pocket. What a shame I've used AFC for years. But I'm  taking my health care needs to the above mentioned facility.

text: Came in for a simple sports physical for my daughter at 11:40. Everything progressed normally and they didn't seem busy with just two other parties in the waiting room. She said she would find out and be back, but didn't come back. A little before 2pm we gave up and went to the front desk to get our money back and our physical form back. They did refund us and apologize for the wait but this should have been addressed long before a patient walks out.

name: Brian Smith
text:
TOTALLY DISAPPOINTED!
I went into American Family Care  on June 29th for a Covid19 test.  Got there early and was out by 8:45 am.  I was told it would take 3-5 days to get the results.  After 5 days I had received no results nor calls from them.  On the 8th day, July 6th, I called and got the "I guess they're backed up at the lab" story.  Then the girl told me "I'll give you the number to the lab and you can call them and find out what the problem is".   It would seem to me that's THEIR job not mine.  I finally got my results today July 9th at 5:15 pm. I was the one that called them! It was nine days after I'd taken the test.  The person there had the gall to tell me they tried to call me today.  I've had my phone with me all day and have no record of them calling on my recent calls log.  A simple phone call explaining the delay would have eased a lot of my stress.
Pretty bad...

text: Don't waste your time at this joke of a clinic. I came in for a sinus infection and a cough. I waited to be seen for two hours. Once I got to the back they drew my blood for labs. However, I figured they knew more than I did so I went to hospital. After spending an entire night in the ER waiting room...the hospital said I was completely fine besides having the sinus infection and acute bronchitis. Let me rewind and say that the Nurse Practitioner that I seen at AFC didn't even treat my symptoms that I came in for, the ER doctor had to write me a prescription for antibiotics. I called the next day and spoke with the office manager and all they did was offer me a refund on my $20 copay. GO ANYWHERE ELSE BUT HERE!!!

11-18-2020

name: Tammy Pfalzgraff
text: Staff was great. Felt that visit was thorough. Never felt my shot..she was amazing! Dr. was very nice and I didn't feel rushed. Spent time talking and didn't seem to be in a hurry....had time to listen.

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your positive review!  We strive to provide excellent care to each one of our patients.  Please come back and see us again for your health care needs.
Cindy Dumas - Director

name: Desiree Kelly
text: Everyone in the clinic was very nice. It did take a while to get back to be seen, but I will definitely return if I need a quick visit.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive review! If you ever need anything else from us, please feel free to give us a call or stop by. Have an awesome day!

name: K Sanders
text: Great doctors understand responsibility better than privilege and practice accountability better than business. The staff and physician(s) at AFC-Dothan understand this principle and provide quality professional care to their patients. This is the best walk-in healthcare facility that I have ever had a need to visit.

resp.text: Hi K Sanders, we are very happy to have provided you with such a positive experience! We look forward to your next visit! Take care!

name: Jordan Jay
text: Dr. Thompson is phenomenal. Great service and willing to listen. I didn't even mind the wait. Which by the way is shorter than any ER wait! The staff was warm and friendly too! They made my not so good day alot better!

resp.text: Jordan Jay, we strive for 100% satisfaction, and it is great to see you had such a positive experience at American Family Care - Dothan. Please don't hesitate to reach out to us if there's anything more we can do!

text: Staff, and Physician was great! Only complaint was wait time, which understandably couldn’t be helped due to patient volume.

text:
Your staff listened, offered help and even checked on me. I'm so appreciate as the dr's in my hometown are not always. I hope to move here, and if I should and I'm ever in need of help again, I would chose you first!! Thank you!!
Paula Creed

text: Dont go to this place for ingrown toe nails wont try to take it out just will tell you it's an infection and give you antibiotics your better off looking at it and tell it to go away

name: Rebecca Hughes

text:
Clinic visit today and was very pleased.   Dr Thompson was very professional, compassionate and attentive.
This clinic is 2.5 miles from my home.   I’m so glad to know I can receive thorough but fast care when I need it.

name: kasideys funnworld
text: My family hasn't had a bad experience yet. Front desk was great each time. Quick service. Helpful. Listened. And did great care.

resp.text: Kasideys Funnworld, thank you for your kind review; we are We hope to be of service to you again in the future.  Best wishes,  American Family Care - Dothan happy to pass along your comments to the team here at American Family Care - Dothan!

name: Reginald Sumler
text: Everyone  very professional and Nice
