text: If you are on vacation and need medical help, stop by Southern Rapid Care. The nurse practioner and nurses are wonderful, the healthcare is fantastic, and they had me in and out quickly.  I would highly recommend them.

resp.text:
Michael,

Glad we could be of assistance to you in a time of need and even more excited that we executed the way we pride ourselves on. Thank you for entrusting your healthcare with us while on vacation and thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review so others can make choices based on the experiences of folks like yourself. We hope you are enjoying the rest of your vacation and please let us know if you need anything else while you are in town. Safe travels home!

name: Tony Rodriguez
text: Outstanding care! Treated underlying problem as well as symptoms!  Staff and facility were great!

resp.text: Hey Tony! Thanks for leaving us a review. It was truly a pleasure to take care of your health needs and we hope its a long time before you need any more medical attention. If you ever have questions about anything, please don't hesitate to give us a call so we can address those concerns. We appreciate your business and hope you call on us should you need any medical attention in the future. Take care!

name: Cameron Workman
text: beautiful little costal clinic with a true OBA feel to it, but more importantly a 5 star medical staff that provides caring, thorough service

resp.text:
Cameron,

We appreciate your recognition of the style and authentic beach feel that we have strived to achieve for the experience of our patients. It brings us great joy and pride to know that you were pleased with your experience here and hope that you will continue to use us when you need to do so. Thank you kindly for taking a moment to give us a review of your experience with us and we hope to always provide the same quality of care each and every time you visit. Thanks again!

name: Tammie Glover
text: This clinic I highly recommended they were super fast and caring!!!

resp.text:
Tammie,

Thank you for sharing. We hope you feel better quickly. Please don't hesitate to reach out if you any questions or concerns regarding your recent visit. We're ecstatic that you chose us for your healthcare needs!

name: Deanna Johnston
text: Outstanding service and really a good team.  Will use them again!  Dr.  Bautista went over and above.

resp.text:
Deanna,

Come back and see us any time! We are honored and proud to serve the great people of the surrounding areas of Baldwin and Escambia counties such as yourself. Thank you for entrusting us with your healthcare needs.

name: Bill Lehman
text: Fast friendly service. I highly recommend.

resp.text: Thanks for sharing your experiences at Southern Rapid Care with the world, Bill! We truly appreciate you taking the time to review us. We hope everything is going great for you and please do not hesitate to let us know if there is anything else we can do for you.

name: Brian Fowler
text: Very fast, friendly and helpful

resp.text:
Brian,

Thank you for the wonderful review! Hope you're feeling much better, good sir.

name: Justin Reinhart
text: Thank you Dr. Beazley.

resp.text:
Justin,

Thank you so much for taking a moment to review the services you received in our clinic. Dr. Beazley was honored to help you out and gives his best wishes. Please let us know if you need anything from us in the future. It was our pleasure to serve your health care needs. Thank you for choosing us to attend to such an important aspect of your physical health.

name: Tim Gee
text: Knowledgeable friendly staff.  Great Healthcare provider.

name: Bill Wolfe
text: Excellent fast care from an extremely professional staff

name: Tina Barnett
text: Not recommended

name: Anabel Celis
text:
(Translated by Google) It is a good clinic

(Original)
Es una buena  clínica

name: marie hill
text: Always prompt and excellent medical care. This practice runs like a machine, but with caring, kind , very smart medical people who make it perfect.I’m so glad to be a patient here!

name: Virginia
text: I feel like the staff and nurses are really listening. They are thorough, caring and respectful. I definitely recommend this practice!

name: Jaenelle G
text: “New Patient Openings Available with Referral”.  Instead of having a sign up list, allowing equal access to care for all, they have opted to have a referral process. Not only must you get a referral from a current patient, but must have one of the two insurances specified on the website. I personally feel as though this is a discriminatory process. It is sad to see that this is the future of healthcare.

resp.text: Jaenelle, thank you for your feedback, we recently removed our universal signup list. Last month when we took the sign-up down we had received 600 applications over the prior 3 months. We believed it was misleading to have a signup list on our website when we did not anticipate being able to add that many patients anytime in the next year and there are many other clinics in town accepting new patients. Meanwhile, our existing patients periodically get married or have children and ask for their new family member(s) to be a part of the practice, we allow them to be referred in through the process you read about. Regarding insurances, there are many insurances that we are not credentialed with or "in-network" for and we cannot accept those insurances. We have specified two insurances that we are confident we will continue to be able to accept, Medicare, which is available to all American's over age 65 and Blue Cross of Alabama, the largest insurer in our state. Please let us know if you have suggestions on how we can communicate this situation better.

name: Amelia Hooper
text: Kelley Rogers (CRNP) and Dr. Uptagrafft are wonderful. They take the time to address every concern of mine, and they listen to everything I have to say. They're the best primary care I've ever experienced. The Innova staff are all friendly and helpful, and the online portal system is super convenient! 11/10

name: Stephanie Monteleone
text: Innova has a very kind and caring staff. I have (thankfully) never needed a sick visit but am very happy with the care I have received during annual well visits. My primary care giver listens, follows up on past concerns, and offers helpful advice. The recent changes in service fees were communicated well with multiple forms of communication, including a newsletter and one-on-one phone calls, which was greatly appreciated. Innova embraces technology and communicates changes well.

name: Brenda Eddy
text:
Innova Ptimary Care is  EXCELLENT and I highly recommend it!  The physician that I see is Dr. Diaz.  She is caring and genuine.  She listens, provides feedback and never rushes me in out of the office.  The staff is pleasant and efficient;  Innova's office and facilities are clean.  If needed, same day appointments are available.   In fact, they have several physician assistants that handle ONLY same day patients and their health issues.
This office runs smoothly and I've never had any problems.   "Try it.  You'll like it!"

name: Kyla Sullivan
text: Everyone is so kind and professional. The best PCP experience I’ve had in north AL!

name: Bonnie Jarvis
text: Everyone is very friendly and polite.I am properly informed of my health and care.I never have to wait more than a few minutes for a scheduled apt. I’m very happy with this practice.

name: Peg & Nate C
text: So thankful for Innova Primary Care team!! All the Doctors, and team work seamlessly together!!    They deserve 10 plus stars!!  Thank you 😊

name: Michael Maleski
text: From welcome staff to nurses to doctors, this Innova Primary Care location cares about their patients total well being and it shows through the time they spend with you to answer all of your questions.

name: Heather Hall
text: Absolutely one of the best experiences I have ever had in a doctors office.  From the moment I walked in to the reception area to the time I walked out the front doors, every person I came in contact with was kind.  I have seen two doctors and one of the nurse practitioners.  They listen to you and don’t seem rushed.  Love this office.

resp.text: Heather, your kind words are so encouraging to our team, thank you! We appreciate your trust in partnering with our team for your health and thank you for sharing your 5-star review with others.

name: Rita Walker
text: Easy check in on your phone for visit. Very nice & courteous staff.

name: Chelsea McCool
text: Searched Huntsville over for years for a good primary doctor. I could not have asked for a more genuine caring practice than Innova. They really do serve their patients at an above and beyond standard. Very knowledgeable, very caring- no matter who you see-!

resp.text: We strive to serve with consistency and excellence and are thankful for your kind words and partnership with Innova for your health. Thank you, Chelsea, for taking the time to leave your review and for choosing our team to care for you.

name: Danielle
text: Innova does a great job at being thorough and timely. They some how manage to pay attention and listen to whatever your concerns are while still respecting your time. They also have a great system where you can do everything you need through their app. The only downside is there are quite a few fees associated with tasks such as refills outside of an appt. etc. I decided it was worth it to have an attentive staff.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave your 5 star review Danielle and for your encouraging words for our team here at Innova! As you mentioned, we do charge fees for services not covered by insurance, we are glad you believe it is worth it for the service we provide. As part of our core value to increase transparency and trusted relationships in healthcare, these non-covered fees are listed on our website. While the charges are small for one patient, the thousands of requests we receive outside of appointments every month do add up. For example, we have received and responded to over 2,400 portal messages from patients in the last month and over 20,000 so far year to date, and that doesn't even include phone calls. The fees we charge allow us to hire the additional skilled professionals on our team that are necessary to provide the level of responsiveness and service we strive to provide and that our patients have come to expect. We thank you for the opportunity to serve you and for partnering with our team for your health.

name: Matthew Dennis
text: Great doctors and staff. Great care and they actually listen to you

name: Lindsay Grissom
text: I just started at Innova Primary Care and I love it so far. The process is seamless and they are very on top of all the paperwork and forms needed before your first visit. Everyone I have spoke with has been very friendly and professional. The monthly fee mentioned in some comments below is just a few dollars a month for unlimited services that most practices would bill you per service for. It is a great deal. My first appointment was with Kelly. She spent a lot of time with me for an initial visit and asked all the right questions. The tele-visit options are very convenient. I highly recommend Innova Primary Care!

resp.text: Thank you Lindsay for your kind words and for taking the time to leave your review for our team at Innova! We are here to care for you, thank you for partnering with us for your health.

name: Carol O
text: The Innova Primary Care facility is clean, the check in portal is user friendly, and I have never had a long wait when I have an appointment. The entire staff is caring, friendly, and professional. There are proactive safety precautions in place to keep everyone safe during this COVID-19 Pandemic. Dr. Kelly Diaz is the best! She shows genuine interest in my health. She is kind, patient, explains things, and answers all of my questions. I never feel rushed during my appointments. I highly recommend Innova Primary Care.

resp.text: Thank you for your encouraging words Carol, our team very much appreciates your support and taking the time to leave your review! Thank you for partnering with us for your care.

name: Bryan Baker
text: Great practice that is very well run. The check-in process is easy, the lobby and rooms clean, and all of the practitioners are awesome!  Not only are they knowledgeable but they are also super nice. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you Bryan! We strive for efficiency and respecting the value of our patients time when they are here at Innova. Thank you for taking the time to leave your supportive words and for partnering with our team here at Innova for your health.

name: Danae Riley
text: Always very caring! The whole staff is always there to answer my questions and take care of me. I use the patient portal and it doesn't take long for them to answer me. I recommend them completely!!

resp.text: Hi Danae, we appreciate you and are glad you have partnered with our team at Innova for your health!  Thank you for embracing our patient portal, we strive to respond promptly and it is so much more efficient than phone-tag that often happens with physician offices. If you haven't already downloaded it, please check out the healow app for your phone so that you have even more convenient access to telehealth and communication with us. Thank you for your encouraging words and for your 5-star feedback.

name: Holly Morris
text: Exceptional practice full of caring and thorough staff. They are doing excellent to manage COVID concerns with sanitation and cleanliness protocols. I always feel safe going. I never feel rushed to share my health concerns. They are hyper organized which is much appreciated for a working mom with not hours left to be spent at the doctor. On a particular taxing and scary medical day, they showed me great compassion and kindness. Bedside manner is the best I’ve seen in doctors and nurses in all of Huntsville!

resp.text: Holly, thank you so much for your kind words and for allowing our team to care for you as a guest here at Innova! Like you, all of our Providers here are working Moms, and we strive to be organized and efficient out of respect for our patients' time. We appreciate your partnership for health and your encouragement, thank you.

name: Whitney Lee
text: Dr. Kelly Diaz is a very kind, thorough and knowledgeable physician. She is my PCP and I would highly recommend her. I have not met the other providers yet but I have heard good things about them from other patients in the community. Innova primary care staff was also very accommodating and helpful. Can not recommend enough.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave your encouraging review Whitney and for partnering with our team for your health!

name: Amanda O'Brien
text: Best experience I have ever had at a Dr. Office. They made sure to address every concern. They were polite and just top notch to deal with!

resp.text: You made our day Amanda, your review was read to the whole Innova staff in our afternoon team huddle today! Thank you for your kind words and for partnering with us for your health.

name: rebecca calloway
text:
Amazing staff

Each and every one of the staff at this facility are so attentive and caring. Our whole family changed to this practice and it has been the best decision we have made. We have a child with special needs and they are on top of all his tests and even found a thyroid issues that no other dr had in his 16 years of living (the other drs didn’t even test him).

I would definitely recommend this office.

resp.text: Rebecca, you made our day! Your kind words have been shared with our whole team at Innova, thanks for taking the time to leave your review and for partnering with our team at Innova for the health of you and your family.

name: Alexandra McIntyre
text: Love Innova from the physicians to the facility.  Never had a doctor who appreciates your time.  They are always on time, attentive, and courteous!  Love the patient portal and various things they offer!

resp.text: Alexandra, your comments are uplifting and encouraging, thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience with our team and others. We are thankful for your partnership with Innova and for the opportunity to serve you.

name: Mel Ebeling
text: All of the staff at Innova are great. Facility is outstanding and wait times are minimal. 10/10 highly recommend my physician, Dr. Diaz, who is AWESOME! In the next textbook on patient-centered care and interviewing, they should really just put her on the front cover-- she's probably the best physician I've ever had.

resp.text: Mel, you made our day! We are here to serve you and greatly appreciate your kind words, these will be shared with the entire team. Thank you for partnering with Innova for your health and for taking the time to leave your encouraging review!

name: Jonathon Whitehead
text: I'm a new patient, but so far Innova has been terrific. The NP talked with me for nearly an hour, and she was kind enough to ignore my fussy baby throughout the visit. Also, the telehealth option is so convenient.

resp.text: Hi Jonathon, we appreciate you and are glad you have partnered with our team at Innova for your health!  We love fussy babies and are quite used to them in our own homes, thank you for taking the time to leave your comments and for your 5-star feedback.

name: Bret Coulter
text: First visit today with Dr. Diaz and she and everyone in the office are top notch. Looking forward to my next visit!!!

name: Ed Culpepper
text: Innova Primary Care offers competent, compassionate, congenial primary medical care for patients in a wide spectrum of life stages. Medical staff are clinically up-to-date and thorough in diagnosis, treatment, and follow-up. The practice incorporates the best of new technologies and processes, including efficient use of patient portal and Tele-med appointments. Everyone on the medical team provides medical care that fosters confidence and security that the patient's health needs are well cared for.

resp.text: Thank you, Ed, for taking the time to leave your feedback and for partnering with Innova for your health.

name: Emily Adams
text: I’ve been lucky to see a lot of great primary care doctors in my life, but this practice is by far the best. Love the care and attention to detail.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words Emily, we are thankful to be able to care for you, Happy New Year!

name: Dianne Ferrans
text: Innovacare is a great doctors office.  They listen and spend time with you.  Also Saturday hours.  Great GP and very high tech with a portal you can email questions to and get prompt answers from, check labs and appointments and prescriptions on your phone.   5/5.

resp.text: Thank you Dianne! We do embrace new technology here at Innova and it's always great to hear from our guests that appreciate the conveniences that brings. Thank you for partnering with our Innova team for your health.

name: Tamara Hornsby (Nana)
text: I am new to this practice but, I am very pleased so far. I appreciate being accepted as a patient.

resp.text: Hi Tamara, thank you for your review and for taking the time to leave your feedback. We are glad you have partnered with our team at Innova for your health!

name: Lauren Schifano
text: The experience from signing up to be a new patient to walking out the door of my first appointment was easily the best I have had. They have an app that makes it easy to fill out any documents before you go in and request prescriptions and appointments. They also have 24/7 on-call and same day sick call appointments. The staff members were very friendly and knowledgeable. Very impressed!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave your thorough review, we strive to provide a positive and connected experience for our guests and appreciate your enthusiastic use of the technology we use to make that possible!

name: Broussard Floyd
text:
This is my ninth year as a patient at Innova. I was seen as recently as yesterday, at my request, on very short notice. All of the Innova ancillary staff I have dealt with, have been competent, courteous and easy to deal with.
At various times, I have been seen by Dr. Uptagrafft, Amy and Allison. I am very appreciative for the professional, compassionate and superb care all three provide me. I especially appreciate the  extra time all three take, to listen and take into consideration, my concerns and opinions, regarding any health issues I have. I always feel valued as a patient and as a person.
Thank you Dr. Uptagrafft, Amy, Allison and the Innova staff, for the excellent care you all have provided me over the last nine years.

resp.text: Floyd, your kind and thorough review uplifts our entire team here at Innova. We have shared your encouraging comments with all the staff. We are thankful to be able to care for you and for your partnership with our team for your health.

name: Katie Bowers
text: It’s always a wonderful experience at Innova Care. All of the staff is welcoming, professional and well educated. The office is always very clean. Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thank you, thank you, Katie! We are honored to care for you and our whole team appreciates you taking the time to leave your kind words.

name: Diana Garcia
text: I have been with Innova Primary Care for over two years now. The doctors, nurses and staff work as a team helping you achieve your best health. They are very compassionate and knowledgeable in what they do at Innova and because of this, I wouldn't go anywhere else.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind and supportive words Diana! We are here for you and are thankful for you.

name: Shane Goodwin
text:
Innova Primary Care used to be fantastic, but unfortunately, as several others have noted, they have updated their business practices to a less patient-centric formula that requires a membership fee be paid just to have appointments or access to the same services that were always offered simply by being a patient.

Honestly, it's not the monthly fee that even is the worst part, it's that after having been a member of this practice for many years that they deleted my account and lab records without any warning, and removed me as a patient from the practice. The notification that my provider had left the group did not say that I would lose access to my medical records or wouldn't just be assigned to someone new, even though the new provider I saw after the letter had been sent said not to worry about it, because they weren't going to remove me as a patient if I was actively seeing them.

So, now I get to start again somewhere else. It's a shame, this was one of the best doctor offices I've ever been to.

resp.text:
Dear Shane,
We have been honored to have you at Innova and have enjoyed getting to know you. We regret you feel we are less patient-centric now based on our recently implemented additional charges for non-covered services. We did not charge patients for these non-covered services for years out of hopes that the fee-for-service insurance model in our state would change to incorporate coverage of these services for their members. Unfortunately, this has not yet happened and we are no longer able to provide these non-covered services at no charge. We regret the communications we sent to you were not clear that with no further action from you your account would be inactivated. You can always request your medical records from us by completing the form on our website and we will be happy to get all of your records to you. We will miss you.

name: Kevin Dupre
text: Dr. Kelly Diaz is very knowledgeable, listens carefully and asks important questions about condition helping a patient better understand it, weighs treatment options openly and conscientiously, and she and staff communicate that they care about you and about helping you get better. She’s phenomenal and so is the staff as well as facilities at INNOVA Primary Care.

resp.text: Kevin, we are honored that you've chosen us to care for you, thank you for partnering with our team and for taking the time to leave your encouraging words!

name: Christy Nelson
text: Fantastic staff and facility. Everyone makes you feel welcome and you can tell the nurses and doctor care about their patients. I have always been very pleased with Nurse Kelly.

resp.text: Christy, thank you so much for leaving your feedback and for your encouraging comments. There can be so many obstacles in our healthcare system, we are so pleased to hear that our care for you still shines through! Thank you for your partnership with Innova for your health and for taking time out of your day to encourage our healthcare team.

name: Alex McCool
text: Best primary care doctor I've ever been to. I'll never go anywhere else! They genuinely care about your health, listen to you, and even get you in quickly.

resp.text: Alex, thank you for taking the time to leave your uplifting review and for partnering with our team for your health!

name: Kathy Stampley
text: Innova provides exceptional care in an environment that is positive and very professional. I’ve never had to wait a long time for my appointment. Their attention to detail and quick response times have given me great confidence and assurance as I have weathered some difficult health issues. Dr Uptagraft and the Innova team consistently exceed my expectations in the quality of care and patient support they offer.  Thank you, Innova Team!

resp.text: Thank you thank you! We strive to be attentive to the details and go above and beyond, it is our pleasure to care for you and we appreciate you taking the time to leave such kind comments about our service.

name: Ricky Patel
text: Great atmosphere and the staff was very friendly!

name: David DeMaioribus
text:
Best Doctor’s office in town. Dr Uptagrafft and Dr Diaz and all of the Nurse Practitioners are amazing. I never feel rushed by any of them to get to the next person.

The staff are friendly and extremely vigilant with their sanitizing efforts during this pandemic (they are constantly cleaning surfaces in the lobby and exam rooms). Love it here. Would never switch doctors.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your review and your kind words David! Your encouraging comments have been shared with the entire team and we are grateful for you and for your partnership with us for your health.

name: Judy Crawford
text: I am very grateful for the compassionate care and understanding hearts of these professionals.  They have taken great care of me and my family for years now!

resp.text: Thank you so much Judy for taking the time to leave your five star review and for your kind words. Our team reads these and we are thankful for you and your family partnering with us for your health!

name: Jess Griner
text: Dr. Diaz is so nice, caring, and thorough. This place is nice and clean and everyone is very nice.

resp.text: Thank you, Jess, for taking the time to leave your encouraging words! We are thankful for you and to be able to care for you.

name: Amanda Freeman
text: I have been a patient of Innova Primary Care for over 5 years. The entire staff is professional and caring from the moment you walk in, until the moment you walk out. They are 100% COVID compliant, and the facility ALWAYS looks Immaculate. They have always treated me like family and I never feel rushed when I’m there, which is important, especially during these difficult times.

resp.text: Amanda, thank you very much for taking the time to write your kind words and for your comments around our COVID-19 protection measures. We are thankful to be able to serve you and appreciate your encouragement.

name: C C
text: Love the office. Friendly and attentive staff. However, all of a sudden I'm expected to pay monthly just to be a patient, or else pay an exuberant amount of money for basic services like refills and lab notifications. Absolutely astounding. I'm furious at this development. How many times do I come see the office? I'm going to pay more for this monthly fee than I will my one or two copays for the whole year, and gain no benefit from it. I finally find an office that will take care of me and now I can't afford it. It's not like I can make a sacrifice like dropping a monthly  Netflix or Starbucks habit, I have nothing to drop to cover this fee. I'm beyond disappointed in you, Innova; it's wildly inappropriate for a patient to have to pay to keep their place in the online system, regardless of whether the patient portal system charges the office per customer or not. That should all be done behind the scenes.

resp.text:
Dear CC,
Thank you for your feedback regarding our recently implemented additional charges for non-covered services. We understand that can be a difficult transition since we have not charged patients for these non-covered services previously. Unfortunately, we are no longer able to provide these non-covered services at no charge and regret it has created such distress for you. It sounds like you do not value these services and we wish you all the best as you establish with a new primary care home. If ever in the future, you feel the services we provide are worth that value to you, we’d be happy to have you back. We are currently updating our website with this information so you can check there for any future changes.

name: Cindi Salvo
text: Innova Primary Care is an exceptional family practice. Dr. Brooke and her entire team go above and beyond to care for their patients, not just physically but mentally too. The office is extremely clean, wait times are almost nonexistent, they have an on site lab for bloodwork, and the latest technology that makes checking in and paying so simple. Not only do they work Monday through Friday, but also on Saturday mornings. The patient portal makes it easy to access your records, send a message, schedule an appointment, request a refill, or make a payment on your account. If you need a wonderful doctor who truly cares about their patients’ well-being, Innova Primary Care is for you.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your thorough review! Our team enjoys caring for you and reads these comments and is uplifted by your words.

name: Ed Waddington
text: Competent care, professional attitude, skillful medical personnel and concern for all their patients. Modern facility, easy to get to, and great parking all contribute to a beneficial medical care experience. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you for trusting our team with your care and for taking the time to post your uplifting review!

name: Cindi Salvo
text: Innova Primary Care is an exceptional family practice. Dr. Brooke and her entire team go above and beyond to care for their patients, not just physically but mentally too. The office is extremely clean, wait times are almost nonexistent, they have an on site lab for bloodwork, and the latest technology that makes checking in and paying so simple. Not only do they work Monday through Friday, but also on Saturday mornings. The patient portal makes it easy to access your records, send a message, schedule an appointment, request a refill, or make a payment on your account. If you need a wonderful doctor who truly cares about their patients’ well-being, Innova Primary Care is for you.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your thorough review! Our team enjoys caring for you and reads these comments and is uplifted by your words.

name: Jennifer Oliver
text: The facility is always super clean, and every single staff member has always kind, helpful, and knowledgeable at each of my visits. Best doctor’s office experience I’ve ever had. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave your encouraging comments and for entrusting our team to care for you! We strive to deliver the experience you described and our team appreciates you.

name: L H
text: Love this primary care practice! I see Angie Hart NP and she is always thorough, professional and kind. I would recommend this practice wholeheartedly!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and taking the time to leave your feedback. Thank you for partnering with our team for your health.

name: Mi Li
text: Extremely friendly, professional, and knowledgeable.

name: Patricia Woolfork
text:
Very caring, professional, and thorough.  They answer your questions and make sure you understand your treatment plan.  They do not stop until they find your problem, or they send you to a specialist for further exploration.

I am ecstatic for having found Dr. Uptagrafft and her amazing team.💖

resp.text: Thank you thank you for your kind words and for entrusting your care to our team at Innova. Our goal is to go above and beyond while providing responsive healthcare to our guests, we are happy to hear you are 'ecstatic' with your experience!

name: Beth Wood
text: Can’t say enough good about the nurse practitioners/physician assistants. They are all terrific. The business practices are horrible and my husband and I left the practice because of them. For example, they wanted us to pay a monthly fee to just for the privilege of have them as our doctor. Sixty dollars a year for each of us isn’t for us. Neither is the billing. Neither of us could ever get a receipt (after we would beg) that matched any of our insurance bills. That may be because they listed us as missing appointments (we have never missed an appointment) or as not even having them!  I had a list of my past two years of appointments and they didn’t have but two of them on their books. Also, one cannot get a response on their portal in five or six days, sometimes not at all. You can’t get them by phone at all so you have to go through the portal for all things. Not a problem unless the staff is as non-responsive as they seem to be. Again, the health care is great but I just can’t deal with billing and business practices. Good luck if you use them.

resp.text:
Ms. Beth,  We will miss you. Love, The Innova Clinical Team.

Ms. Beth, We have sunset some of the free services that we used to provide like refills outside of appointments and direct portal messaging with your physician. These non-covered services may now be handled by paying a small annual charge or individually each time they are incurred (such as refill requests outside of appointments). We regret you experienced frustration with our business office, we hope you find another clinic where you have a better experience. Sincerely, The Innova Administrative Team

name: Pam Edwards
text: Everyone at Innova Primary Care is a pleasure to work with! Happy, smiling and very helpful staff. They go above and beyond normal doctor visits, and treat us like family. We recommend them to all if our friends. Love them all!

resp.text: Thanks Pam!

name: Gene Uhl
text: Very pleasant experience.  Everyone was super nice. Extremely clean, efficient and welcoming office. I love they give you the option to do everything through the app. So convenient. I get the feeling they really want to manage my health and do what’s best for me. Dr. Diaz was wonderful.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave your review and for partnering with Innova for your health! Happy New Year!

name: Keith Bedsole
text: The Dr’s, nurses and administrative staff are all kind and caring. Excellent health care professionals!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words and taking the time to leave a positive review. Thank you for partnering with Innova for your health!

name: April Langley
text: I believe I have seen every provider at Innova, including Dr. Uptagrafft.  Sometimes, it’s tricky going through the patient portal and having the nurses phone you in order to coordinate same day appointments.  However, I have always been seen quickly on same day appointments.  Kelley is my primary care and Alison is usually my back up.  Both of these women always ask how I’m doing personally before they even get to the main reason why I’m being seen.  I appreciate that both ladies work on getting to know me and it makes a difference because I don’t feel rushed, so they can go to the next person.  Thanks Innova for being a fantastic practice for me.

resp.text: We really appreciate your time and kind words leaving such positive feedback! It is our pleasure to serve you. We have made some improvements to online scheduling during the pandemic to simplify the experience for booking sameday appointments. As you mentioned, sometimes with online booking we do call to make adjustments to keep our patient wait times as short as possible, thank you for your understanding when that has been necessary!

name: Tara Vaughan
text: Innova Primary Care got me in only 3 days after trying to make my first appointment. They are extremely responsive and easy to work with. I also love that everything is on your app for you to access at anytime. They make health care easy. They didn't accept my healthcare which was disappointing because I found them through my healthcare portal, however their fees are adorable even as a cash patient and, in my opinion, very worth it to have a team of doctors that are accommodating and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us feedback Tara and for allowing us to serve you as a patient. Sorry for the inconvenience you experienced with your insurance website, we do have a few insurances we are still working with to ensure the information being displayed is accurate, we hope to have this resolved soon.

name: Yvette Wisener
text: Dr Brooke and her team are awesome.  Love using the portal, response times are great.  Had a video Telehealth visit today with my nurse practitioner Kelley and it was perfect.  Thank you Innova Primary Care!!!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave your comments and for embracing the new video telehealth technology with us! It is our pleasure to care for you.

name: Sandra Lyons
text: Very impressed with Innova and Dr. Diaz. I am very thankful that they accepted me as a patient.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review Sandra!

name: Zach Jensen
text: They are definitely concerned about maximizing the dollars they can make off each patient.

resp.text: Hi Zach, we are sorry to hear that you had a negative experience with our billing team at Innova. If you have been billed beyond what your health insurance company indicated, please contact our billing department and we will be happy to refund any credit you may have. If there's nothing we can do to assist you, we hope it helped you feel better to share your frustrations here on Google.

name: Rachael Andree
text:
Always professional staff, very caring and understanding, always willing to spend extra time and not hurry you through.
Dr. Diaz is an amazing Doctor.

resp.text: Thank you, Rachael, for taking the time to leave your feedback, our team is encouraged by your kind words! Thank you also for partnering with Innova for your health.

name: Pat Thorn
text: The staff was extremely kind and patient. They made me feel very special. Dr. Diaz spent time getting to know me. She listened to my concerns and answered my questions. She worked with me! She encouraged me to share my thoughts. Best doctor visit ever!

resp.text: Pat, thank you for partnering with Innova for your health and for taking the time to share your feedback, you are an encouragement to our whole team!

name: Stanley Stafford
text: All the nurses and doctors are always 100 per cent  professional.  I  believe that they are the best in Huntsville. They are super nice and courteous.

resp.text: Our goal is to be the best! Thank you for the privilege of serving you and for taking the time to leave your review.

name: Jenny Jesup
text: In my short time being a patient here, the staff at Innova has gone above and beyond to make sure my questions are answered and that I am properly assisted. I am so thankful for such a kind, dedicated team that who will always help me quickly and effectively the first time. I highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much Jenny, we appreciate you!

name: Mike Mruz
text: Professional, knowledgeable and caring healthcare providers.  Efficient and accommodative.

resp.text: Thank you so much Mike for taking the time to leave a review and for your encouraging words and support during this challenging year! We appreciate you and your partnership with us in caring for your health.

name: atburniston
text: The review system requires a rating - the 1 star does NOT reflect the Dr's quality of service, etc. I cannot rate the service of the practice, Innova Primary Care, is not accepting new patients. In fact, many Huntsville, AL practice are not accepting new patients - or - you are required to fill out new patient forms for the doctor to review (which I'm told is a 2 week process) to be accepted by the doctor/practice, and then you can schedule an appointment. The response that this process is established so "we can ensure our current patients are given the time and care needed" is horrific and reprehensible. So if you're from out of state, injured and told by the ER to follow with a GP - good luck.

resp.text: Dear sir or madam, we regret that you have been experiencing difficulty finding a primary care doctor that is accepting patients. Our doctors can only effectively serve a certain number of patients, and we are currently at full capacity. If you have not found a clinic yet, you may wish to consult the county physician directory to find practices listed as currently accepting. There are also billboards on Memorial Parkway advertising practices currently accepting patients. I hope this helps. https://www.madisoncountydoctors.org/physician-finder

name: Hillary Cross
text: This is the best experience I have ever had at any doctor’s office! They were super friendly, thorough, and up to date!

resp.text: We love your review, thank you so much for taking the time to encourage the team here and for entrusting your care to us!

name: atburniston
text: The review system requires a rating - the 1 star does NOT reflect the Dr's quality of service, etc. I cannot rate the service of the practice, Innova Primary Care, is not accepting new patients. In fact, many Huntsville, AL practice are not accepting new patients - or - you are required to fill out new patient forms for the doctor to review (which I'm told is a 2 week process) to be accepted by the doctor/practice, and then you can schedule an appointment. The response that this process is established so "we can ensure our current patients are given the time and care needed" is horrific and reprehensible. So if you're from out of state, injured and told by the ER to follow with a GP - good luck.

resp.text: Dear sir or madam, we regret that you have been experiencing difficulty finding a primary care doctor that is accepting patients. Our doctors can only effectively serve a certain number of patients, and we are currently at full capacity. If you have not found a clinic yet, you may wish to consult the county physician directory to find practices listed as currently accepting. There are also billboards on Memorial Parkway advertising practices currently accepting patients. I hope this helps. https://www.madisoncountydoctors.org/physician-finder

name: Roy Holifield
text: Everyone is so nice and attentive! Makes going to the doctor not so bad! I wish I would have started coming here a long time ago!

resp.text: Thank you very much Roy! We are glad to be caring for you, thank you for your review.

name: Regina League
text: Everyone was extremely friendly and caring. Especially Terri who helped me check in while I was  limping. I waited less than 5 minutes in the lobby and patient room. I was referred to a neighboring facility for an X-ray, and received the results within a couple hours via text message that included instructions for my treatment.  The staff and facility far exceeded my expectations.

resp.text: Regina, thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience online. We especially appreciate your comments with respect to Terry, who has recently taken over coordinating our guest experiences in the reception area.  We will share your feedback with the team in our team meeting today, thank you for partnering with Innova for your health, we hope you are feeling better and that you have a wonderful Thanksgiving!

name: karen doran
text: I Always get in on time for appointments and they are great at getting me in if I need an appointment on the fly. I feel like I’ve been listened to and trust Dr Uptagraft and her staff!

resp.text: That is wonderful to hear, we strive to serve our patients in trusted relationships responsively and efficiently. Thank you for entrusting your care to us and taking the time to share your kind words.

name: Sandy Moore
text: This was my first visit, for a Medicare annual physical. I interacted with four different medical personnel, each of whom was friendly, courteous and efficient. My physician, Dr Diaz, explained the purpose if my visit, and listened patiently as I described what I needed from the visit.  I received complete results of my visit on the patient portal, within two days, including Dr Diaz's recommendations for me, and along with her invitation to me to make the final decisions. I felt respected and that Innova personnel were partners with me in my  care.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with our team at Innova Sandy! We are honored to be in partnership with you in caring for your health and we strive to treat our guests as we would want to be treated.

name: Anna Perry
text: I am so happy to have found Innova primary care, everyone is very professional and kind!

resp.text: We are happy you found us! It is our goal to go above and beyond, thank you for entrusting your care to our team and for taking the time to leave your encouraging words.

name: Barbara Hitt
text: I have only had one appointment at Innova Primary Care. My doctor retired so I have been reading reviews and talking with friends about finding a new doctor. I had my New Patient visit this morning, and I couldn’t be more pleased with Dr. Kelly Diaz and the facility. We had a nice discussion of my medical history, current needs, expectations, etc.; and I think she will be excellent to work with. I told her that she is exactly what I was hoping to find in a new doctor - a bright young woman.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback Barbara and for entrusting your care to our team at Innova!

name: Michelle Ashmore
text: Allison is amazing! She really listens to your concerns and takes them into consideration as she moves forward with her decisions on your treatment options. She is very knowledgeable and is eager to help you in any way she can. Not only am I patient, but I also work in the medical field and I know how valuable that is to find!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave your comments Michelle and for allowing us to care for you! We are thankful to have Allison as a part of our team here at Innova.

name: Lee Burkett
text: Very professional and caring

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback and for entrusting your care to our team!

name: Yamilet Ayala
text: Everyone there is incredibly patient, understanding, kind, and accommodating to circumstances. They will thoroughly explain anything and everything to you. Dr. Uptagraft specifically is a very loving and concerned doctor as well as person. The new patient process is pleasantly quick and once at the office, you will promptly be called to the room. You will receive excellent care!

resp.text: Thank you Yamilet for your 5 star review and for taking your time to leave your comments!

name: Michelle Ashmore
text: Allison is amazing! She really listens to your concerns and takes them into consideration as she moves forward with her decisions on your treatment options. She is very knowledgeable and is eager to help you in any way she can. Not only am I patient, but I also work in the medical field and I know how valuable that is to find!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave your comments Michelle and for allowing us to care for you! We are thankful to have Allison as a part of our team here at Innova.

name: Rachel Stone
text: All of the staff members are friendly and professional. I’ve never had to wait too long to see the doctor. The space is modern and clean. My favorite thing is that I can communicate with the office over text or in my patient portal. It makes everything so much easier. Highly recommend!

resp.text: The whole Innova team appreciates your comments, thank you so much for leaving your feedback Rachel!

name: Cassie Taylor
text:
Today was my first visit as a new patient with Dr. Uptagrafft and Allison, the nurse practitioner. I rarely leave reviews, but I was impressed with the entire group.

Allison was thorough and thoughtful. I felt like she was truly listening to my concerns to help decide together which course of action is best for me and my health.

I’ll definitely be returning and recommending. Everyone was extremely friendly, which is a plus because doctor’s offices can be scary for some.

resp.text: Cassie, thank you allowing us to care for you and for taking the time to leave your positive feedback! Our team loves to hear reviews like yours!

name: Dian Huff
text: First time I walkEd into Innova I felt very comfortable. Staff is very nice and professional. Looking forward to a great relationship with the Innova group for years to come.

resp.text: Thank you for the review and for partnering with us for your health!

name: Kira Broadwater
text: Very helpful. A little heavy on the tech usage; I personally prefer checking in one on one with a person rather than a computer. The receptionist was very friendly and helpful though. For those who love technology, this is definitely top notch. The PA was amazing, very friendly, down to earth, and a good listener.

resp.text: Thanks for leaving your feedback Kira and for allowing our team at Innova to care for you. We do utilize technology extensively to improve patient privacy and efficiency in the clinic. While we generally have a receptionist to assist guests with check-in at reception, this is not always the case when we are running with a minimal staff or sick team members. We would welcome any feedback you have if there is something you would suggest we do differently during the new patient application process to help our new guests be more comfortable with our check-in and electronic communication processes.

name: David Combs
text: After being a very happy patient for 2 years of them seeming to be a caring group that didn't want you to go to a doc in the box and was concerned enough to be open on Saturdays now they announce they will require a monthly fee to be a patient. Too many good doctors in Huntsville.

resp.text:
Mr. Combs,

We are sorry that you had a negative experience during the process to continue as a patient at Innova after your provider retired as a primary care giver.

As you mentioned, we do have a service that provides our patients the ability to message their providers and access their medical records online through the portal app for their phone. Many people feel that this convenience and ease of communication with their Primary Care Clinic is valuable, but we also understand that we are not a good fit for everyone.

We wish you well in finding a primary care clinic that you can form a trusted relationship with.

name: Art Davis
text: My first trip as a new patient, but very impressed. The staff was extremely friendly but focused on getting my medical history information correct. Seemed to be a very efficient operation with everyone knowing their job and doing it without any loose motion. I was called back ten minutes ahead of my appointment time. So far, so good!

resp.text:
Thank you for taking the time to leave a review, we especially appreciate your comments on efficiency! While patients' introduce challenges that an engine manufacturing plant never will, we strive to incorporate the most efficient methods to give our patients' the best experience possible at Innova. When we designed our facility and operational processes, we utilized the UAH LEAN OOE design team to assist our management team. UAH has great depth of experience in assisting NASA, Toyota, Polaris, etc - those best practices from our hi-tech city are brought to bear for the good of our patient guests at Innova!

You can read more about our work with UAH OOE here:

https://www.uah.edu/ooe/news/12158-uah-ooe-celebrates-innova-primary-care-s-ribbon-cutting

name: Lynn Rudow
text: I've been a patient for about 15 years, when Dr. Uptagrafft came to Huntsville.   She has continually worked to be the best doctor she can be.  She, and now her staff, actually listen And allow you to be a part of your treatment.  Her new practice it wonderful!  I love being able to get the medical attention quickly, sometimes the same day.  Friendly staff,  love how they share pictures in the exam room of family, and fantastic wall decor!

resp.text: Thank you Lynn, we believe trusted relationships are critical to being able to care for our guests and we appreciate you taking the time to leave your feedback.

name: Lacey Gilliam
text: What a great experience! Each staff member was friendly and positive. The facility was beautiful and I love the easy to access patient portal. If you’re looking for top quality, this is it!

resp.text: Thank you Lacey for allowing our team to care for you and for your positive feedback!

name: Hope Davis
text: Absolutely loved everything about this practice! The cleanliness of the office and the care and attention to detail from everyone I spoke with was impressive. It was so easy to complete all the necessary forms online and the check in process was very quick and easy. My wait time was short and I feel the nurse (Allison) and Dr. Uptagrafft really listened to my symptoms and questions and concerns. Everyone was very friendly and thorough!

resp.text: Thank you Hope & welcome to Innova, thank you for partnering with us for your health!

name: Christina Nichole
text: Allison really listened and cared about what I had to say. Their office is all super kind and professional and everything runs seamlessly. Amazing.

resp.text: Thank you Christina, we strive to be exceptional and our team is greatly encouraged by partnerships with patients like you that recognize our emphasis on caring for our guests and continual improvement! Thank you for allowing us to serve you.

name: Victoria Aycock
text: My husband and I both use Innova Primary Care and NP Kelly and could not be happier with the quality of care we have received. They are unbelively efficient. They schedule appointments quickly and we never have to wait. Also Kelly is super kind and thorough. She is very good at her job. Dr. Brooke goes out of her way to meet all the patients which is really nice.

resp.text: Thank you Victoria! We read your feedback in our lunch huddle yesterday and the entire team appreciated it, thank you for allowing us to serve your family.

name: K Hudlin
text: I had an absolutely wonderful experience at Innova Primary Care! Mrs. Amy Pittman was outstanding, she answered all of my questions and concerns in regards to the Hospitals in the area, different OBGYNs, and the different care services that Innova Primary Care provides. She made me feel so welcome and comfortable with her. I am too excited to have her as someone I can talk to and receive medical care from. The whole staff was amazing, even though I had to bring my two babies to my appointment, due to my daycare closing for a holiday. Everyone I came in contact with spoke very kindly and warmly to my children and I! No one made me feel bad or uncomfortable for having a 1 and 2 year old with me. I can't say enough how happy I am. If you're looking for great medical care and genuine people, this has to be your first choice!

resp.text: We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. Thank you for allowing us to serve you!

name: Becky Marshall
text: Very warm welcome as a new patient! The professionalism of all staff was awesome.

resp.text: Becky, thank you for taking the time to share your experience online. We strive to be warm and welcoming while also utilizing technology effectively to care for our guests. We will share your comments with the team in our team meeting today! We hope you have a wonderful Thanksgiving.

name: Sunny Booher
text: The staff at Innova is great! They are all very knowledgeable, always super friendly & very eager to help! I moved to the area a few months ago, and I'm grateful to have found such a well informed & well rounded Primary Care facility.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback, and welcome to Huntsville!

name: Susan Nymeyer
text: Kelly is amazing. She was careful to not over-prescribe and she listened to me with regard to what I have come to know about my own body. She had some non-pharmaceutical suggestions to try, but also prescribed for a different issue. I came away with a very positive feeling.

resp.text: Thank you Susan, we are all happy Kelly is a part of the Innova team. We also appreciate guests like you that realize that pills are not necessarily the best fix for their problems! Thank you for allowing us to care for you.

name: Tess McKaig
text: Innova Primary Care is not only the top in Primary Care treatment. They are also up to date in all the latest technology. Their staff is friendly and helpful. My medical treatment by my Nurse Practitioners is like none other. I feel right at ease with my provider. I know she has my best interest in my healthcare.  I would recommend Innova Primary Care to all my friends and family. Thank you for making me feel special.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your positive experience with us!  We have a wonderful team of healthcare providers and are pleased to hear about the exceptional care you have received from our nurse practitioners!  We look forward to continuing to serve you in the future!

name: Amy Stephens
text: My husband referred me to Innova. In fact, he all but insisted he is so happy there. I saw Angie. Everything was great. It's clean and everyone is very friendly and efficient! I'm an Infection Control nurse. Before anyone knew that, everyone washed their hands before and after seeing me. You may think this happens everywhere, but I can tell you it doesn't. Angie was kind and smart. I feel very good about my decision to change doctors. Thank you for having such high standards!

resp.text: Thank you so much Amy! We read your review Monday in our team huddle and our clinical manager really appreciates you recognizing and encouraging her staff. We stress proper hand hygiene, you may have noticed the clean hands campaign signs in our guest rooms. Thank you for your work in infection control to address this ongoing challenge in healthcare.

name: A B
text: Just had my new patient visit with Innova, and my first impression of the office atmosphere, the staff, & the doctor is that they are very organized, helpful, and friendly.  The doctor that I saw today was very pleasant, and the first thing she did was introduce herself and give me her background experience information.  I feel like the staff at Innova will be a good fit for any future medical needs that I may have.

resp.text: Welcome to Innova! Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback and for allowing us to care for you.

name: Shauna Traylor (Smile_Shauna)
text: I had left a positive review previously but am now retracting. When I first came to this office this process of actually getting in was slightly ridiculous. You can not simply call and speak with a human being to make an appointment. You are required to download an app and “apply” for an appointment. I had to schedule a yearly physical 4 months out from my original appointment to be able to get in on a (their) specific time/day/doctor schedule. Then I received a phone call that I was required to move my appointment ANOTHER 4 months out to, again, be able to get in at a time pretty much convenient for them. I’m also not crazy about that fact that when you finally get an appointment, it’s with whatever doctor is available. I prefer to have the same doctor every time.  I really wanted to like coming here because Brooke Uptagraft is a very sweet person and I would have loved to have her as my primary doctor.  However it is not worth all of the hoops required to jump through. I will be choosing another office.

resp.text: Hi Shauna, we are sorry you have had trouble with our appointment scheduling system. Our team would have been happy to work with you to find a time that worked better for you and we apologize for the inconvenience in rescheduling for you. It works great for our patients to communicate to us through the patient portal any specific scheduling needs and we do our best to accommodate them. Send us a portal message if you'd like us to provide you appointment options, otherwise we wish you the best with your new physician.

name: Mikey P
text: I was looking to get established with a new primary care physician when I made an appointment at Innova Primary Care.  It couldn't have been easier to set everything up.  I went online and submitted everything electronically via their web site (I ALWAYS forget to bring forms with me to these things).  I am amazed at how quick and easy it was!  The web site is super fast and easy to use, which is rare nowadays when it comes to anything medical.  I was able to get an appointment with Kelley Rogers.  She was very polite, professional, and easy to talk to about my medical history and goals.  It is clear that this isn't an office that pushes/forces you to do anything you aren't comfortable with (i.e. setting unrealistic goals, ordering needless tests, etc).  I got a Saturday appointment, which is great for my schedule!  When I got to the office for the first time, I walked in the door, sat down, and less than 1 minute later I was already in a room.  Oh and that wait time in the room for Kelley?  Less than 5 minutes!  I mean, my appointment was at 10:45AM on a Saturday and I was already in a room and being seen at 10:40 (I got there at about 10:35)!!  Since the web site was super easy to use, they didn't ask me a bunch of redundant questions and it really streamlined the check-in process and made everything stress-free!!  I highly recommend Innova to anyone looking for a new practice!!

resp.text: Mikey, thank you for your review and for taking the time to share your experience. We are happy to be caring for you!

name: Eric St. John
text: I first met Dr. Brooke and her husband David outside of their office. I was very impressed with their forward thinking, modern views of the medical industry and their drive to be adaptable to the continuous changes we see in this industry. After experiencing a patient visit at Innova Primary Care, I am pleased to say my experience with the rest of the staff was just as good. No question as to why they received the award for medical practice of the year in Huntsville through the Chamber of Commerce. Congrats to the whole team on this. I highly recommend them for your primary care needs.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words, Eric!  We appreciate your feedback and for taking the time to share about your experience at Innova!

name: Matthew McSavaney
text: BEWARE: onboarding process for new patients is a nightmare, the onboarding agent was rude and condescending when I asked why I was being charged with hidden and unnecessary fees. Whenever I asked questions about hidden fees and long wait times to get in the system (3 months), she just kept saying “we understand we’re not best suited for everyone” and wouldn’t give me a straight answer.  So frustrating, I may as well have been talking to a robot. You have to pay $60 dollars a year for an online service (that you don’t have to use, because you can still just call if you prefer) and if you opt out of the unnecessary online service then they charge you $10 for every piece of mail they would send you. Ridiculous and unnecessary. I suspect they have too many clients because they don’t do a good job of making new clients feel welcome and taken care of. The CRNP I saw was good, but there are too many layers of unnecessary headache between the client and her. I chose this place because it came highly recommended to me by family, but apparently that was years ago before the new onboarding and client management process, and when I asked why this new process was so terrible, she said it didn’t use to be that way. I was told that my family member was probably “grandfathered” in to the old system. If the new client management system was truly better, easier, more intuitive, and actually added value for older customers, then why would they not institute it with all their clients? This suggests to me that they care more about squeezing money out of clients rather than adding value for them. New clients should avoid.

resp.text: Matt, we will miss you at Innova.  We apologize that you did not feel welcomed and taken care of as that is certainly not our intention.  Part of what makes us what we are at Innova is our embracing of new technology and providing responsive care to guests with whom we can partner together for health through trusted relationships.  We regret we were unable to develop that relationship with you.  Although our on-boarding process involves multiple steps, we find it helps us clearly inform our patients up front of who we are, what services we provide and ensure that matches with the type of primary care home they are looking for.  We have learned we are unable to partner with our guests who do not value the services we are providing which results in them not receiving the healthcare they deserve. We wish you all the best as you establish with a new primary care home.

name: Kerry Goens
text:
Angie Hart is phenomenal!
Kind, caring & professional - exactly what you want in your doctor's office.
I am very thankful for her, Dr. Brooke & Innova!
Merry Christmas & Happy 2019

resp.text: Thank you for your review! Our team is encouraged by your warm wishes and we wish the same for you in 2019!

name: Sissy Spence
text: Always a kind, friendly and caring staff.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review and for the entrusting our team with the privilege of caring for you!

name: Karyn Spicer
text: The office is very nice and welcoming. The nurse at the front desk was helpful and quick, but NOT pushy.  She made an effort to engage in conversation with each person coming in. I sat down for maybe 5 minutes, after completing my check-in, before I was called back.  The nurses that took initial information were very nice and personable.  Then the Dr came right in.  He was great! He came in, did what he needed to, asked the questions he needed to and then we were finished.  That's just how I like it.  I was in and out in less than an hour from the time I stepped in the door.  It was wonderful.  The office has great hours, even on Saturday! Hopefully I continue to be healthy, but in case I don't- I'm very happy to know this office has my back.

resp.text: Thank you for your 5 star review Karyn, our team appreciates your positive words. We strive to treat our guests as we would want to be treated.

name: Nathan Olson
text: Innova Primary Care is incredibly helpful and accessible. When I have had questions about my medications or appointments they are always willing to accommodate and explain what needs to be done. They are also very friendly.

resp.text: Thank you very much Nathan, we strive to serve as we would want to be served.

name: Todd Aycock
text: Very well organized, clean, good doctors and nurse practitioners!  Regularly see Kelley and Dr. Brooke and they are both awesome!

resp.text: Thank you, Todd, for the 5 star review and for your comments!

name: Katie Bowers
text: The practice seems large however you would never know it. It runs very efficiently. Wait time has never been an issue and they have a "sick" and "well" waiting rooms.  That meant a lot this winter when I needed a well visit but the flu was everywhere. Kelly, the NP I see, knows my healthy history before coming in the room. She always spends as much time with me as needed but I have never had to wait long to see her. She is very professional and has wonderful bedside manner.  I haven't been a patient long however I wish I had made the change earlier! Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thank you for your review Katie! As you mentioned, during the winter flu/sick season we maintain separate lobby wings for the benefit of our guests. With flu season winding down, you may find on your next visit a group health class or other activities occurring in the South wing. Our receptionist diligently monitors and sanitizes the lobby and kiosks year round, so we hope our sick area won't be missed during the Summer. Thank you again for your comments and for allowing us to care for you.

name: Jennifer McCain
text: I love the easy atmosphere of this practice!! Clean, caring, efficient, calm...always a pleasant experience whether a sick visit or a well visit.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback!

name: Andrew Morris
text: The level of service and professionalism with Innova is beyond anything I have experienced in the medical field before.

resp.text: Thank you for allowing our team to care for you and for taking the time to leave a review! You made our day!

name: Kelley Jensen
text: This place only cares about money. Not their patients.

resp.text: Hi Kelley, we are sorry to hear you feel that way. If you have been billed beyond what your health insurance company indicated, please contact our billing department and we will be happy to refund any credit you may have or straighten it out for you. If there's nothing we can do to assist you, we hope it helped you in some way to leave a one star review on Google for our team here at Innova.

name: Lisa Bates
text: I have been dreading having to find a new doctor. I found Innova on line and like the approach they take. Everyone was super nice. Kelley Rogers was very professional and caring. Took time to get to know me. Not just rush in and out like so many doctors do. I think I found a good fit for my healthcare needs.

resp.text: Thank you for your review Lisa and for letting us serve you here at Innova.

name: Cynthia G.
text: Great clinic with wonderful doctors and certified nurse practitioners. Would highly recommend this medical practice to anyone.  Rarely wait longer than 5 min for them to call you back to a room. Staff is very efficient and cordial as well. Just realized they also have hours available on Saturday also.  And an app to make appts and refills in medicine very handy. 5 stars!

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review!  We are pleased to hear about your postive experience with our office as well as our patient portal!

name: Melissa Hutchens
text: Today was our first time here (Me & My Husband Robert) We both really liked it  So Glad we chose  the Innova Primary Care ... they are the Sweetest.. I feel like they really care for there patience...  and want to do what ever it takes to fix the problem...

resp.text: Thank you Melissa! We do care about you and we strive to do our best for our guests, welcome to Innova.

name: Elise Stokes
text: Super friendly and caring staff! I always feel like my time is important and that I’m being listened to. Check in process is very easy, always a short wait time, and the lobby is very nice and inviting.

resp.text: Thank you Elise, that is exactly what we are striving for! Occasionally, when a clinic day is behind schedule, it is likely because someone very ill has come to us for care, please know that we still respect and value you. Thank you for allowing us to care for you!

name: Gina Meeks
text: The wait time was minimal.  The facility is beautiful.  The staff is very friendly!  The nurse practitioner was great!  She was very knowledgable, caring and accommodating!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words Gina!

name: Barry Fisher
text: I had my first experience as a new patient at Innova and I was very impressed. NP Kelly and her intern were both great. The staff is very friendly and the entire process was very efficient.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback! Kelley does a great job caring for our guests and training new providers.

name: Jessica Perez
text: I recently had a physical there and it was my first time in the new building. I just love how big the rooms are and how modern everything is. The staff is wonderful and will take their time with you. I do not feel rushed. We do not need to go to a walk in clinic if someone is sick on a Saturday because they are open!! I love that! I also love that I can login to my patient portal to request a refill and schedule an appointment along with viewing records of my visits. This is a great medical practice!!

resp.text: Thanks for your feedback Jessica, we always like to hear from our guests that appreciate the convenience of technology! Thank you for allowing us to serve you.

name: David Weich
text:
This was my first to Innova Primary Care. Before I get to the visit, Cindy Phillips, assisted me with registration on the telephone to ensure that I made it through all of the “wickets” so that I could get my initial appointment with a doctor. Cindy was professional, courteous, and patient as I stumbled through the internet process.
When I arrived at the office I checked in at the kiosk on an iPad. It was fairly easy. I had some trouble centering up my photograph when taking my own picture and a young woman working in the front office who was watching me came out and assisted me right away.
In just a few moments I was taken back to the exam room for the preliminary  vital signs. After just a few more minutes Dr. Diaz came in. Dr. Diaz had plenty of time for me and was not rushed at all. I thought this was very nice because I was meeting her for the first time. She addressed all of my concerns and had a concise plan for each.  I felt like Dr. Diaz listened to what I was saying and looked at me rather than looking at a computer screen and typing like many doctors do.
My overall experience at Innova Primary Care was excellent! Everyone I encountered was professional, friendly, and efficient. I feel lucky to have found them.

resp.text: David, your words mean so much to the hard working team here, thank you for taking the time to share your comments and leave a review.

name: Humble Beginnings
text: I love everything about this facility. The receptionist is very sweet & helpful. The waiting area has a modern look but still has a warm welcoming feel to it. Angelia Hart is my doctor and I honestly made a great choice when I decided to stick with her as my doctor.

resp.text: Thank you! We are glad to be caring for you.

name: Adam Haines
text: This place is not about patient care.  After spending $300 for someone to check my weight, take my temperature and order blood work, I go back to find out they don't take Cigna insurance (New job, I can't control their insurance)   Yes, it's on Cinga's website they are "in Network", but according to the woman in glass box upfront, it's only for certain patients.  Apparently, I'm not important enough to be one of those patients.  Again this place is obviously not about patient care only about money.    They took my cash very quick but not my insurance card.

resp.text: Hi Adam, we regret your negative experience at Innova and thank you for your time in discussing further with us by email. We have requested that Cigna have us removed as accepting new patients from their website and we apologize that they are providing incorrect information about our clinic. On our website, in the new patient registration section, we do maintain an up to date list of the insurances we are currently accepting. We have also refunded the payment amount you requested following our email exchange. Please let us know if we can do anything further to resolve your complaint.

name: Carly Fennell
text: Knowledgeable and friendly staff who truly go out of their way to help their clients!

resp.text: Thank you Carly!

name: Julia Olson
text: I hate going to the dr.  I hate that you sit forever because they are never on schedule.  I also really dislike that many dr offices still fax.  Guess what?  Innova has it going on.  I walked in, signed in on a tablet (hello technology), and was immediately called.  In the room, I waited 4 minutes for the dr.  She had a conversation with me and we agreed on a plan.  Everything I needed in terms of lab work can be done right there.  And I really love the tv screen in each room with pictures of the dr I was going to see in a slideshow format.  Innova has brought excellence in primary care into a very clean, professional tone and I am happy to recommend!!!

resp.text: Julia, your review made our day! We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience and we will share your review with the whole team today during our staff meeting. We are always working for continual improvement at Innova and it is encouraging to hear that you share our frustration with the widespread dependence on unreliable communication methods like fax machines and telephone calls to transfer critical patient information between medical facilities in our community. We strive to avoid paper orders and utilizing faxes, but because so few clinics and hospital facilities locally utilize modern communication methods, we are still forced to send 86% of our communications with other clinics by "electronic fax." This just means that we don't use paper to send the fax, but it's still a picture of a document sent over a phone line as opposed to electronic communication with structured data in a standardized format that increases accuracy and safety. Thank you for being an advocate for improving patient safety and spreading awareness in the Rocket City that the state of Healthcare IT is embarrassingly behind. Thank you also for partnering with the team at Innova for your health, we are thankful for you and wish you a wonderful Thanksgiving.

name: Carl Higgins
text:
I am a relatively new patient here. I have to say, they make everything easy. The have automated a lot of their administrative processes and use technology to their advantage (e.g. having a patient web portal where you can communicate with them, see test results, schedule appointments, etc). The result is that it frees the providers up to focus on the patient rather than paperwork. And their appointment times run like clockwork. Like a 9am appointment is really 9am, and if they are 10 minutes late, they are apologizing profusely.

Every provider I have dealt with at Innova also gets an "A" for bedside manner. Sometimes medical issues aren't easy to discuss, even with medical professionals. However, Innova providers really have a warm interpersonal, friendly demeanor that takes that edge off.

They also focus on general wellness and health as much as medicine, that is they don't just throw pills at you. They actually have a full time dietician/nutritionist and a wellness program you can enroll in. So if you are looking to lose weight or just not be a generally average unhealthy Alabamian, it's better to do it under medical supervision from people who know what they are doing.

Also, they take my insurance (Aetna), and their rates/discounts are reasonable, so that's nice too. And they are like a half mile from my house. A+!
