name: Sharon Ward
text: I had a cyst removed by Dr. Adams last week.  It was the best experience I have ever had. He was most caring and explained each step. The best part it was less than 20". I highly recommend Stopwatch Urgent Care😊

name: Russell McLachlan
text:
Super quick check in and super friendly!  Short wait out front and in the back.

Super friendly and thorough medical professionals in back. Really interested in getting you back up to speed!

name: pebblesrock90
text: Stopwatch Urgent Care was quick and efficient with my needs. I went in around 7:45pm and was out by 8:15pm. The staff was impeccable and it really saved me a trip to the ER.

name: Melissa Davis
text: Courteous staff and quick service! Everyone I interacted with was kind, polite, and was conscious of the time. I would definitely recommend and would return in the future.

name: Pam Tilson Rodgers
text:
Always fast & staff are very polite.
When you go in feeling really bad it's nice to get taken care of quickly & not have to sit and wait. I appreciate that a lot.

name: Landry
text: Fantastic service. So quick and always has the best staff around!!! They genuinely care about their patients and do their job better than any other urgent care around. Only go here!

name: Alexis Cureton
text: Went in expecting to be seen about a knee pain. I was told that TWO years ago they ran a test not covered by my insurance and I owe $300 when I normally only pay $35. I didn’t know anything about it until today. Refused to see me because of their mess up. Wouldn’t give me an excuse for work since I drove all the way out and wouldn’t be seen. This is the only place open besides a hospital. Do better.

name: LeeAnne Pinkard
text: The nurse was wonderful, efficient and full of common sense. They were fast but still competent.energy level was high.  Caring without being gooy.  Seemed very knowledgeable.

name: Tiffany Leonard
text: Today I was referred by my team members to this Urgent care. I've never been to this location and upon my arrival I asked where to sign in. The younger lady asked if I've ever been there before. I stated no, she handed me the forms to fill out,very short not friendly whatsoever. Skip go to the back,lady ask me height/weight,  I'm trying to get my cards put up, I asked if she was waiting on me, she said yes. I apologized so she could do her job obviously I was holding her up.  A lady goes by,greets with a smile, what? Call the police. Someone actually being nice.I then get escorted to a room, doctor walks in, very nice, after his visit he brings the lady back who I really want to ask if she's having a bad day, because her attitude was so bad.  Highlight fast service, downside bad attitude from everyone I came in contact with besides the dark headed lady and doctor! Thanks for your smiles

name: Tabitha Anglin
text:
I can't say enough abut what a great experience we had. We were welcomed with a caring and attentive receptionist. As soon as we walked in the door, the process to check us in started. There was no wasted time! We were called back quickly, and triaged in and placed into a room with concerned staff. The physician's assistant was caring and eager to listen to the patients symptoms, as well as the parents concerns, examine him and start treatment. We were very impressed that we could have his prescriptions filled at such a late hour, across the street at the EAMC Apothecary. From the receptionist, nurse and PA, we are overall very impressed with such a high standard of care and with a very professional staff.
As a Mother of a sick child, when you have a experience like this, you can't help but feel at ease when you can see the genuine care within all the staff. You know you have brought your child to the right place. Thank you, Thank you!
Such a blessing to have such a wonderful experience!!

name: Jaret Bottoms
text: Extremely fast and the nurse was nice and the doctor had a great bedside manner and makes you feel better when you don’t. I came in and was very quickly told I had the flu and was prescribed some medicine and was out the door fast. Very quick and a nice waiting room and facility.

name: Nakia Dorsey
text: I was welcomed the first moment I walked in the door. It was a friendly and calm atmosphere. The doctors was well knowledge and knew how to solve my problem. I rate Stopwatch at perfect 5. Thanks.

name: Shannon Bourg
text: Quick, clean, knowledgeable and friendly staff. I was in and out in under an hour, and when u feel awful that matters. Thanks stopwatch!

name: Steven Rush
text: I hate giving bad reviews, but compared to the other Urgent Care facilities available in the Auburn Opelika area, Stopwatch urgent care across from the hospital is the one to AVOID AT ALL COSTS. After an insurance glitch it was clear to me that this corporation is only set up to separate you from your money. Medical care and patient comfort are a very low priority for this facility. According to the statements given to me by the front desk, they have a different physician assistant or nurse practitioner every. single. day! Also, records of our previous visits are incorrect or missing!  It's horrifying and disappointing to me that businesses like this are allowed to exist. If a basic blood test (basic = worthless) and random scrip are what you need, you may get lucky here. My sincere advice is DO NOT RISK IT!  Your health should be the top priority... at Stopwatch it simply is not. Very disappointing.

name: Charles' AC
text:
Got in quickly.
Great staff front and back.
Adams AMAZING
Great bedside, great care-
Literally TOP TO BOTTOM MEDICAL CARE

THE BEST!!!

name: Caitie Love
text:
Superb service. I was in and out in less than 15 minutes honestly. They were very helpful and answered any questions I had.

Update: it has been an entire week, and I am still sick. I have taken all the pills they gave me. I am more than disappointed in this business, and I will not be returning. Make sure you’re comfortable going to the doctor twice if you go here.

name: Brandon Sanders
text: The staff were so nice to my daughter and we were in and out in less than 20 minutes.  Cannot say enough good stuff about the staff we dealt with.  Thank you folks so much.

name: Heather Higgs
text:
If I could leave a 0 I would, waiting well over 2 hours for a 10 second mandatory test? I’m here still waiting.
“We’re super busy”
Girl I’ve been in this office over two hours and seen TWO people walk in. It’s sad really, get it together. If I could leave and go back to work without the test I would.

name: Georgia Beaty
text: Quickly was seen. Professionally treated. Thoroughly checked. Friendly staff

name: Robbie Thomas
text: I enjoyed my visit. I was in and out in a timely manner. They were thorough, patient and  friendly from the time I entered until my departure. Thanks to all who assisted you all were AWESOME!!!

name: Ashley Ray
text: Dont bother with this place. They do NOT answer the phones, and they do NOT call you back. Call them right now and see😂

name: K O (JWsGirl)
text:
I was sent here by my insurance due to not having a primary doctor yet and I was very pleased. Everyone there was so kind and courteous. They had me in and out within 20 minutes! This will be my go to for minor emergency issues. Too bad I couldn't use the doctor that I seen as my primary 😔 sure would make life so much easier.
Thank you Stopwatch Urgent Care.

name: Tippy Toe
text: Rude physicians will never be back.

name: Allyson Shore
text: The nurses were really friendly and courteous. They helped me with whatever I needed and were genuinely concerned about my condition. The doctor on the other hand was very rude and short with me. He even rolled his eyes at one point when I asked him a question. I found this incredibly unprofessional behavior from a doctor.

name: Mike Morehouse
text: Had a very good experience at Stopwatch Urgent Care Opelika. Very efficient and friendly staff. I was seen quickly and the medical staff was caring and communicative. Took care of me in fine fashion .I am very pleased with the service and care I received there

name: Jerry Jackson
text: Everyone (front counter, dr, Med assistant all treated me like I was only one there. They came to the waiting room to assist me and make me comfortable until I could be seen, which was only 3 minutes. We did paperwork after being seen, which the urgency of my condition required.

name: Lindsey Woodall
text: I was seen very quickly. I love that this location is open until 11PM. Everyone was very nice and helpful! Would recommend!

name: Rachel Johnson
text: In and out supper quick, certainly cheaper than a go at the ER. When you're sick you don't feel like sitting around waiting to be seen, that was not the case here. Super happy with my experience and the staff was very friendly and helpful.

name: Mary Wynne Kling
text:
On Saturday night my daughter was bouncing on the bed, fell and needed stitches near he eyebrow.
Wanting to avoid taking a five year old to the emergency room, we went to Twilight Urgent Care. Dr. Cunningham and the staff did an EXCELLENT job caring for my daughter. They were quick and efficient, we spent so little time in the waiting room we couldn't even get the admission paperwork finished before they called us back. They were very patient and understanding with my daughter, but also worked to get her taken care of as quickly as possible.
I couldn't be happier with the care we received, and are so happy to know we have someone great to go see when Moore's Mill (our daytime urgent care of choice) isn't open.

name: Mary Jewell
text: Awesome experience!! Everyone one was super nice and concerned!! Very clean facility. Also didn’t have to wait long to be called back or see doctor.

name: Carrie Berkstresser
text: They were really quick and kind to me. The only problem I had was that they called my medicine in to a different pharmacy because mine was closed, but they didn't tell me. They were really helpful at getting everything straightened out the next day when I was confused away CVS.

name: Lisa Brooks
text: Stopwatch Urgent Care is a great place for urgent medical needs.  The staff are knowledgeable and friendly.  The physicians are thorough and respond appropriately to your concerns.

name: weenona schassler
text:
I don't feel that the PA took the time to truly assess my complaints. "It could be a staph infection, it could be cellulites. You might have strep, you might have pharentitus (not sure if spelling). I'll give you an antibiotic that will treat it regardless." I didn't come in for a two minute consult. No strep test was done. He just glanced at my leg. I have a knot the size of a lemon on my leg that is inflamed and hot to the touch. It is painful and itches. I'm very uncomfortable.
Not happy at all.

name: Jon Benson
text: Dr. Washington was very dismissive of my report of past history. He declared I was suffering from allergies before he had even examined me. Even after the x-rays showed signs of bronchitis he prescribed me allergy medication. I feel highly offended and wish to lodge a complaint. I am currently struggling to breathe properly and he showed no sympathy and would not help. Additionally he had multiple pieces of incorrect information in my report which he said he would change.

name: Larissa Kay
text: We were visiting from out of town and my almost 3 year old ended up with a UTI over the weekend. This clinic was very easy to work with and professional. We were in and out within an hour.

name: Paula King
text: Everyone was quick and caring today! Dr. H was excellent! Listened and answered my questions about my being sickly so close to my trip overseas. Gave me several options of things she does when traveling. Thanks again StopWatch Urgent Care!

name: Angela Mcminn
text: Service was good til they made me go to ER for a catscan and still charger my card and didn't even do anything to me ... I will be reporting to the BBB on this and 4 weeks later my card still has not been refunded...

name: Deidra Mcgill
text:
Great experience for my first visit
Everyone was very nice.  Got in and out and picked up my RX next door within a short time.

name: Kacie Tyson
text: Just went here today to get tested for the flu. I went about 9:30 and there was zero wait time. They got me in and out in less than 30 min. Staff and doctor were great! Understanding and took care of my needs. Will definitely see them for future illnesses!

name: Jerry Mays
text: Initially, I was favorably impressed with the facility and staff. I was there because of an acute pain in my back, which has begun early in the week. My visit was on Saturday morning. After a discussion with the doctor and an examination, he determined that I may have a kidney stone. He said he would request a CT scan at Bridgeway Diagnostic and that they would call me “tomorrow”. I did not get a call Sunday and, checking their website, I learned that Bridgeway is closed on the weekend. Today, Monday, I called Bridgeway and learned that Stopwatch Urgent Care never sent the CT scan request.

name: Kenya Mann
text: This was my first time visiting Stopwatch. It was actually a pleasant experience.  The staff is very professional, prompt and friendly.  I will definitely return for future visits.

name: Skip Courtney
text: New patient process was wuick and easy. 5 minute wait. Dr was very knowledgeable and also very personable. Provided immediate relief

name: Jaimie Spencer
text:
Always fast prompt service. They don’t leave you in the patients room for long before coming in!
Friendly staff. Always my first choice to go when I’m feeling ill

name: Lisa Beasley
text: Everyone was so friendly. That helps when you’re not feeling well. They took very good care of me.

name: Nicole_222
text: Very good service! I was only there about 30 minutes and I feel better already! This is the best place to go for fast but wonderful care!

name: Morgan Riley
text:
The take my insurance(BCBSAL) just not my specific plan without getting a referral... for Urgent care... at 10:30pm. $140 to see if this pain is a serious problem or something to heal own it's own.
Everything so rushed I didn't even have time to think of all of the details to tell the Dr. He looks and touches a little but doesn't see clear evidence of anything... give it another week and if it's still hurting call us back.
🧡PAIN🧡

name: Larissa Kay
text: We were visiting from out of town and my almost 3 year old ended up with a UTI over the weekend. This clinic was very easy to work with and professional. We were in and out within an hour.

name: Diane Corbin
text: Excellent service.   Will recommend to all my friends.  The Dr was very thorough and kind.

name: weenona schassler
text:
I don't feel that the PA took the time to truly assess my complaints. "It could be a staph infection, it could be cellulites. You might have strep, you might have pharentitus (not sure if spelling). I'll give you an antibiotic that will treat it regardless." I didn't come in for a two minute consult. No strep test was done. He just glanced at my leg. I have a knot the size of a lemon on my leg that is inflamed and hot to the touch. It is painful and itches. I'm very uncomfortable.
Not happy at all.

name: Morgan Riley
text:
The take my insurance(BCBSAL) just not my specific plan without getting a referral... for Urgent care... at 10:30pm. $140 to see if this pain is a serious problem or something to heal own it's own.
Everything so rushed I didn't even have time to think of all of the details to tell the Dr. He looks and touches a little but doesn't see clear evidence of anything... give it another week and if it's still hurting call us back.
🧡PAIN🧡

name: Kimberly Key (A Southern Mama)
text: Every visit I have encountered has been great. 90% of the time I'm so nervous and forget what all I wanted to ask so I'll even ask sometimes for the doc to come back in. They are always prompt and caring. I've never had issues with any staff members. Each member does their job accordingly. This isn't an ER or hospital setting .. Therefore they are limited. Some people sadly fail to realize that. I have called several times to have meds changed or even added.. Or maybe even a recheck. They are always prompt and kind. I do not have a primary care physician. I use them when needed and hope to continue. Don't judge every place based off someone else's experience. Go and see for yourself.

name: Teresa peppers
text: The staff was pleasant and friendly. I appreciate the after business hours, that's the reason I chose coming to your location. My wait time was a couple of hours too long. If I had known, I was going to be seen by a Nurse Practitioner and not a doctor, I probably wouldn't have waited that long and gone somewhere else the next day. I requested cough syrup to ease my cough and that would help me sleep; I received a prescription for cough medicine with anti-nausea medicine in it. Nausea isn't one of my problems. I just wanted to stop coughing and finally get some sleep. What happened the cough medicine with pain medicine?

name: Norma Cusanek
text: I arrived back in the US with what I thought was a nasty cold but knew something wasn't right...so I looked up StopWatch (I've used them before) but the one in my area was closed.  I scrolled down to discover that the one in Opelika was open.  So I drove there straight away.  They got me in and diagnosed with 20 minutes of my arrival.  Staff are courteous, compassionate and professional.  I'd choose them again if I need urgent care    Thank you Opelika Stop Watch Urgent Care!

name: Annette Screws
text: I was very pleased with the care that was shown to me while I was there the staff was awesome!

name: Elizabeth Millette
text: I would recommend this Urgent Care to anyone in the Auburn/Opelika area. I particularly like the Opelika location. It is open late (11 pm). I went on a Saturday at 6:30. There were about 4 people ahead of me and I was seen in less than an hour. What I like most about the Opelika location is the Dr. (I really wish I remembered his name)! He is great! Very friendly, takes time to explain everything and answer questions. I would definitely choose them again if I need urgent care.

name: Jerry Mays
text: Initially, I was favorably impressed with the facility and staff. I was there because of an acute pain in my back, which has begun early in the week. My visit was on Saturday morning. After a discussion with the doctor and an examination, he determined that I may have a kidney stone. He said he would request a CT scan at Bridgeway Diagnostic and that they would call me “tomorrow”. I did not get a call Sunday and, checking their website, I learned that Bridgeway is closed on the weekend. Today, Monday, I called Bridgeway and learned that Stopwatch Urgent Care never sent the CT scan request.

name: Shari Bartlow
text: Very friendly, efficient, fast!  No complaints and would definitely use them again!

name: David Corry
text: The staff and facilities are superb. Every one was very professional and kind.  I would recommend this medical facility to anyone.

name: Virginia Crawford
text: Staff is great. Docs and PA always thorough.

name: Teresa peppers
text: The staff was pleasant and friendly. I appreciate the after business hours, that's the reason I chose coming to your location. My wait time was a couple of hours too long. If I had known, I was going to be seen by a Nurse Practitioner and not a doctor, I probably wouldn't have waited that long and gone somewhere else the next day. I requested cough syrup to ease my cough and that would help me sleep; I received a prescription for cough medicine with anti-nausea medicine in it. Nausea isn't one of my problems. I just wanted to stop coughing and finally get some sleep. What happened the cough medicine with pain medicine?

name: Leah Kelly
text: Great customer service. Staff was friendly and professional. Facility was very clean. There were several people in the waiting room when I got there but I was in and out in 30 mins!!

name: Meghan Cochrane
text: The staff was professional and courteous. I was seen quickly. The facility was able to preform the test needed to diagnose my problem. I was ask to come back the following day for a follow-up.  I would recommend Stopwatch Urgent Care as an alternative to the emergency room.

name: Melinda Hands
text: Reception great ..... Staff great......very pleased with my experience! Especially since I'm not local! No hoops to jump thru to be seen

name: Christi Gibson
text: Honestly, I utilize Stopwatch urgent for their services more than my primary doctor due to their hours of operation & knowledgeable office & medical staff.  They are generally prompt & i am blessed they are nearby.

name: Tracy King
text: This is the best urgent care! They are efficent and fit right in to your day because you are in and out so fast!

name: Kimberly Key (A Southern Mama)
text: Every visit I have encountered has been great. 90% of the time I'm so nervous and forget what all I wanted to ask so I'll even ask sometimes for the doc to come back in. They are always prompt and caring. I've never had issues with any staff members. Each member does their job accordingly. This isn't an ER or hospital setting .. Therefore they are limited. Some people sadly fail to realize that. I have called several times to have meds changed or even added.. Or maybe even a recheck. They are always prompt and kind. I do not have a primary care physician. I use them when needed and hope to continue. Don't judge every place based off someone else's experience. Go and see for yourself.

name: Melissa Chisum
text: Got in and out quick, the dr we saw was very nice and helpful, but the price of the office visit was ridiculous.

name: Lydia Blanton
text: All staff was super super nice and very efficient. I was in and out with a diagnosis and good direction in 40 minutes.

name: Alnita Edwards
text: The attendant didn't check his vitals.  A stethoscope was not used.   Blood pressure was not checked.  Strep test, pulse and  temperature were taken. Lympnodes were felt eyes and ears were checked.  That was it. This morning he says his chest hurts when he breathes.  Getting his prescription transferred was not a problem since CVS didn't have it.

name: Brittany S. Deyerle
text: Staff is professional and very friendly. I was in and out in less than 40 minutes total! I appreciated the quick diagnosis and treatment, especially when you're not feeling well!

name: Michael Tolbert
text: It was fast i still do not understand my copay being as much as it was but over all everything seem to be fine

name: Kristen King
text: Everyone is amazing! From the front desk to the clinic staff! Thanks for all you do! 😊

name: Latonya Hicks
text: I went to Stopwatch this morning with two different issues, I was told that since it was an urgent care that I can only been seen for one issue. I was stunned about this because I have been to  urgent care facilities and have been seen and treated for multiple issues. I was also told to take my pick of which issue was worst and if I chose to do both issues that my insurance was only going to pay for the cheapest one and I was going to receive a bill for the other. This is not right because the two issues was at the same pain rate that I was experiencing. I haven't ever been told to choose one out of multiple issues to be seen for. I couldn't get an appointment with my regular doctor so that was the reason for the visit. Never again I would ever let someone tell me what I can't do especially when I'm in pain. Sad how people who work in healthcare facilities don't care about someone's health.They are just there to get a check and I have a degree in Health care and can't even get a job in that field. I see why because they hire people like those at Stopwatch who don't care. Yet, I'm still in pain with my other issue and probably have to visit another urgent care for that problem.Unnecessary money being spent for no reason at all.

name: John Waldrip
text: This Urgent care is the best. I like going to Urgent Care because when I am sick, I can’t get an appointment for a couple of weeks. I can’t wait a couple of weeks. I either be well or dead by then.

name: David Chapman
text: There were 15 people ahead of me when I arrived. My total time spent was 2 hours. No too bad.

name: Bubba Harrison
text:
My first visit at Stopwatch was in January of this year. There was no wait time and was seen immediately! The nurse practitioner, I’m sorry I can’t remember her name but she was very smart and beautiful, diagnosed my problem, she administered the meds I needed and I had a complete recovery!

This second visit was just as remarkable! Again, no wait time and was seen immediately! This time I was given a card with the receptionist name, Halie, medical assistant, Luisa, x-ray tech, Lisa and doctor, Adams! They were all awesome! Once I told the doctor what was going on, again, he immediately diagnosed my problem, administered the meds I needed and I had a complete recovery!

I can’t  comment on the negative reviews of this office cause I wasn’t there but my two experiences were totally awesome and will continue to visit them every time I have a health problem! Much easier to be seen immediately here than my person physician! Please give them a try!

name: Phyllis Wilder
text: Great service! Friendly, courteous, prompt service. Excellent physician! Highly recommend.

name: Tracy King
text: This is the best urgent care! They are efficent and fit right in to your day because you are in and out so fast!

name: Latonya Hicks

name: Christina Bladek
text: Horrible bedside manner. Staff rushed you out. Didn't apply splint correctly, had to go back the next day. Didn't have crutches for a broken foot, told us to get them "at a thrift shop". Nurses didn't know what or why they were doing what they were doing. No paper work. No explanation of anything, not even medications they were injecting into you. Just showed you to the nearest exit. Semi fast service but horrible quality.

name: C Fisher
text: Very Knowledgeable Dr. He Explained Everything To Me..Didn't  Leave Puzzled..I Was Confident In His Decisions...No Long Wait...I Would Definitely Recommend Stop Watch To Anyone...Love My Experiences Here..

name: John Waldrip
text: This Urgent care is the best. I like going to Urgent Care because when I am sick, I can’t get an appointment for a couple of weeks. I can’t wait a couple of weeks. I either be well or dead by then.

name: David Chapman
text: There were 15 people ahead of me when I arrived. My total time spent was 2 hours. No too bad.

name: JR McCall
text: In and out fast, cured immediately after dr walked in! Very nice staph.

name: JR McCall
text: In and out fast, cured immediately after dr walked in! Very nice staph.

name: Phyllis Wilder
text: Great service! Friendly, courteous, prompt service. Excellent physician! Highly recommend.

name: Wanda Ponder
text: I love this place! Everyone is so nice and caring and you avoid the long wait at your Dr’s office!

name: Dr. Nettie Echols
text: Thank you for your professional services and prompt attention for my health care needs.

name: Jessica Battle
text: I was in and out quickly! The staff and doctor were very professional.

name: Vivian DuPriest
text: So Thankful for Stopwatch Urgent Care! After sitting in the ER for 3 hours and not being seen for Kidney Stones. At Stopwatch Urgent Care they took care of me in no time at all!! Truly appreciated!

name: Christina Bladek
text: Horrible bedside manner. Staff rushed you out. Didn't apply splint correctly, had to go back the next day. Didn't have crutches for a broken foot, told us to get them "at a thrift shop". Semi fast service but horrible quality.

name: Sage Hatcher
text: I went in for stitches & they were very nice, professional, caring, and FAST. I barely had to wait at all 10/10 would recommend :)

name: Charles J King
text: The staff and the doctor at this establishment was very courteous and professional. And the physician that I saw today ordered me the right medicine to stop the pain that I was having

name: Kelly Sprayberry
text: Sweetest staff & very tentative to patients needs.

name: tamica woods
text: Very pleasant atmosphere. Thankful for the friendliness and promptness of the staff😊

name: Carol Nolan
text: Walked in and was taken immediately.  Staff was friendly,  attentive and professional.  I will definitely use this service again.

name: Candy Lanier
text: I was seen quickly and the staff was very friendly.

name: Me Me
text: This clinic is AWESOME. They are really the best clinic in this area!

name: Holli Thomas
text: I've been going here since they opened... Today's visit was horrible! The waiting room floor is filthy the bathroom is filthy there's no toilet paper in the bathroom... And nobody actually wants to draw your blood and check your blood for nothing no more, oh well your covid is negative! What about what's wrong with me? Double ear infection but yet you said I can go back to work tomorrow when I can't even halfway function. And I'm not even going to go into what happened 5 days previous to this at the same place!

name: lkbraswell
text: Quickly taken back and concerns addressed.  Very helpful, polite and kind care!

name: Elizabeth Pratt
text: Super fast and Dr was very attentive.  He made sure to address all of my concerns and didn't rush me out to get to the next patient

name: Caroline May
text: K.Nessler, the PA that treated me was wonderful. She was very direct and kind and made me feel cared for.

name: S E
text: Went at a good time, no waiting.  Receptionist, nurse and doctor were all top notch.

name: linda forbus
text: Fastest urgent care service I've ever had! Friendly, and had an actual doctor on staff.

name: Antonio Tarver
text: I prefer stopwatch over any emergency room or doctor office.

name: Shirley Garner
text: Great! We were sitting in the ER, which had a 3 hour wait and I posted on Facebook that I was in the ER. 2 people said 'Why are you there. Go to Stopwatch across the street.' name: samantha sperduto
text: The worst experience I have ever had. In March, I fell down the stairs and badly injured my ankle. It was to the point that I actually had to cut my sandal off because of the swelling. Since it was after hours, and I did not want to wait hours in the emergency room, I decided to go to the Urgent Care Twilight on Opelika Rd. Upon checking into the location, the receptionist and staff were very short to answer any questions I was having. On top of that, their bedside manner was terrible. I could not even walk on my own because of the swelling and pain, to the point where I was leaning on a friend. Seeing us struggling, they did not have the decency to offer to help my friend who was trying to support me. They actually made me stand at the counter and fill out paperwork, instead of letting me sit down to finish filling everything out in the EMPTY waiting room. The staff did not offer any wheelchairs/crutches/anything to steady myself, forcing me to walk from the check in, to triage, then to a room.  Once I was FINALLY sitting on an exam table, they had taken X-rays and arrived back shortly saying it was "just a sprain" and it "should be fine in two weeks." Then they wrapped my ankle in an ACE bandage, charged me $150 (w insurance), and STILL did not offer any assistance in my mobility. On top of all of that? Months later, it is still swollen and I am still having difficulty with my ankle. I went to go see another doctor, and turns out, my ankle was fractured, not sprained. Definitely do NOT recommend wasting your time or money just to have your well being jepordized by an unfriendly staff that seemed to be there just to make a paycheck.

name: zmthornton
text:
This office told my wife that they were a Blue Cross Blue Shield provider, but then called her back to see an RN that wasn't fully certified by BCBS. Because of their error, I was billed $200 extra. After long waits on the phone with BCBS, I found out the story above.

At 9:30 am today I called Stopwatch to ask about how we could have been charged if we confirmed at the front desk that we were covered. They told me they would contact billing and return my call. When I didn't hear back from them in 30 min, I stopped by the office to ask in person about the error. After waiting for 20 minutes in the waiting room, I ended up calling the billing office myself and actually having to pass my phone to the receptionist to get their error fixed. After all that, they admitted fault and adjusted my bill.

My kid was sick when I went in to talk about billing, so I thought I might as well have him seen now that the billing issue was worked out.

We waited a reasonable 20 min, they did a flu test, and released us with an RX called in to CVS.

I had to call twice, but they finally said they were resenting my RX. I assumed it'd be ready in an hour.

Wrong again. After trusting them to call in my prescription twice now, I went to Walgreens around 12:30, only to have them tell me that it hadn't been called in. So I had to call the office a FOURTH time now, and get them to actually call my prescription in.

Stopwatch forgot to cancel the RX at CVS, so I had to call CVS for them and ask them to cancel that prescription so that my finally called in RX could be filled at Walgreens. I got my kid's medicine at 1:30, after sitting in Walgreens for an hour for a prescription that was supposed to be called in and picked up. My sick kid fell asleep sitting up because of how long we had to wait.

Dragging my sick kid all over town and having to wait multiple hours because of Stopwatch's errors makes me positive that I'll never use this Urgent Care again. They have serious communication issues.

resp.text: Our doors are open at our Highway 280 location until 10 pm on weekdays for situations just like this! We are honored to provide care to the children of this community all 365 days of the year. Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children, Angie!

name: Stewart Richards
text: We took our son for a COVID-19 test and the doctor and staff were wonderful! We made an appointment in advance and the entire process was quick and easy. Our doctor was so patient, kind, and thorough. Could not have had a better experience under the circumstances. Highly recommend!

resp.text: We are grateful for the opportunity to care for families like yours during the COVID-19 pandemic and all 365 days of the year, Stewart. Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children with the care of your kiddo!

name: Della Kemp
text: Only draw back was I was called back 40 min after my scheduled time. Put us in a small time crunch. But the doctor was amazing. And my little toddler princess put her through the test.

resp.text:
Della,

We apologize for your wait and want to thank you for your patience. It is our greatest honor to serve families like yours across the state of Alabama and beyond. We hope your little one is feeling better!

name: Steve Hutto
text: I took my kids for covid tests Aug 2020. The children were covered by medicaid which pays for covid tests. The urgent care submitted the billing incorrectly as Blue Cross. My ex wife called months ago and they said they would correct the issue. 7 months later I am still getting statements for $390 for each child.

resp.text:
Steve,

We will be happy to resolve this billing problem for you. Please send your claim to billing@childrensurgent.com and a member of our billing team will reach out to you within the next 24-48 hours. Thank you for your patience!

name: Angie Cleland
text: Staff was incredibly accommodating and could not have been nicer. We needed last minute rapid covid tests and had an an entire volleyball team show up after 9pm for testing. They were efficient, and kind. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Our doors are open at our Highway 280 location until 10 pm on weekdays for situations just like this! We are honored to provide care to the children of this community all 365 days of the year. Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children, Angie!

name: Elise Vincent
text: Super nice and quick. Doctor was very personable and caring.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children, Elise!

name: latasha henley
text: Highly highly highly recommended, the doctor didn't mind answering any questions that I asked, and explain everything very thorough. Very nice, clean facility, and quick.

resp.text: Receiving the recommendation of excellent moms like you is the best award we could receive, Latasha! Our team of pediatricians are committed to providing quality care with less waiting all 365 days of the year and ensuring that all of your questions are answered before heading out of the door. Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children.

name: Johnna Stafford
text: Very simple registration process & was able to wait in our car.  The app shows your number in line which is great!  Short wait time & very sweet nurses & doctor!  They calmed my fears and gave us e cells that care!  Highly recommend!

resp.text: We are honored to have your seal of approval and recommendation, Johnna! Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children with the care of your kiddo.

name: DaRay Moss
text:
The care specialist on duty were kind and supportive from beginning to end... The customer service and attention to detail was great: Each person made me and my child feel important.

Thank You

resp.text: At Urgent Care for Children, your kiddo is our top priority and our team works diligently to ensure that both you and your child feel that. From the free snacks and cartoons in our lobby to the specialized care provided by our providers, we are honored to provide care to families like yours all 365 days of the year. Thank you for choosing and trusting UC4C, DaRay!

name: lawranger30
text: Awful experience for curb side testing.  Got a bill in the mail for an office visit for over $300  FIVE MONTHS LATER.  Not for testing. Office visit, which never happened.  We never got out of the car.  No disclosure of massive visit fee, which was denied by insurance.  Would not recommend.

resp.text:
Lawranger30,

We are extremely sorry to hear that you were not pleased with your experience. We encourage you to email us at billing@childrensurgent.com so that our team can verify that this bill is correct and no error was made in distributing it. Thank you for taking the time to notify us about your situation. We hope to hear from you soon.

name: Freedom Whitworth
text:
This was the simplest process down from scheduling an appointment through the app & even canceling and rescheduling it was as easy as a quick tap of a button.WOW!
The staff were incredibly helpful & friendly and I was in an out and no more than 10 minutes. I highly recommend this facility and I’ve already done so for anyone looking for somewhere to be tested for Covid or if you need the center for your children.

resp.text:
Freedom,

We are so happy to hear you had a seamless experience with us. By utilizing an online booking platform, we are able to take an extra step of precaution in keeping our families safe when they come to visit us. We are grateful to serve families like yours all 365 days of the year. Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

name: Dora Daccardi
text: Very fast!! The nurse was very nice as well as the doctor! will definitely be going here again if needed

resp.text: Quality care with less waiting is what we strive for all 365 days of the year! Thank you for trusting Urgent Care for Children, Dora.

name: Lindsey Flynn
text: Great experience! Appreciate them helping us out and avoiding a trip to the ER. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Keeping kiddos out of the ER and giving them access to quality pediatric after-hours care is our mission all 365 days of the year. Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children with the care of your loved one, Lindsey!

name: Emily Gilmore
text: It was super easy to make an appointment online and upload all of our information. Minimal wait times, and we were brought right back to room and quickly seen. Very pleased! Would choose them again!

resp.text: We are glad to hear your had a great experience with our online booking platform and overall at our Highway 280 location. It's an honor to have the recommendation of wonderful moms like you. Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children, Emily!

name: Oren Azrad
text:
Horrible!
Daughter was misdiagnosed. Pathetic! They missed 2 fractures in her foot. She never saw the Dr, only the nurse. Shame. This place is a scam.

resp.text:
Oren,

On behalf of everyone at Urgent Care for Children, I would like to sincerely apologize for your recent experience at our Highway 280 location. We take all complaints very seriously and have already begun investigating what went wrong during your visit at UC4C. This reflection allows us to ensure that similar mistakes are not made in the future. Please feel free to reach out to us with more details at contact@childrensurgent.com. Again, we are deeply sorry for your experience and hope to serve you better next time!

name: Steven Coggin
text: There was no wait time and was taken right back. We were out under an hour. Thank you for taking good care of my child.

resp.text: Quality care with less waiting is what we strive for all 365 days of the year! Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children with the care of your kiddo, Steven.

name: Dana Payne
text: I was given conflicting information outside from a potential patient while scheduling my appointment in my car. I am glad that I called instead because the receptionist informed me the total opposite. We had an excellent experience! The doctor on duty helped make a tough situation better by giving my daughter stickers and candy so that the nurse could proceed with the COVID testing. I have already told all my friends and family about this place. Outstanding service!

resp.text:
Dana,

Receiving the approval from parents  like you is the best compliment in our book! We consider it an honor to serve families like yours all 365 days of the year. We sincerely apologize for the mishap in relaying information. We hope your daughter is feeling much better. Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children!

name: Amy Albers
text: Was able to get a quick appointment online for drive up testing. The medical assistant came out quickly and performed the testing. Very friendly, quick, and efficient. I was able to go home and wait for results where I was definitely more comfortable!

resp.text: Our promise to provide convenient and contactless COVID-19 testing to our patients is one we take seriously. We are always thrilled to hear from satisfied patients like you. Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children, Amy!

name: Casey Scroggins
text: They are so patient with our son who has Autism. Also, saving a spot in line and walking right in was awesome

resp.text:
Casey,

We are proud to be the nation's very first sensory inclusive urgent care facility. This means that all of our team is trained on how to make visits more comfortable for our patients who might be on the spectrum or have sensory sensitivities. We even offer free accommodations like noise reducing headphones and weighted lap pads. Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children with the care of your son.

name: Adrienne Nichols
text: The service here is always friendly professional and timely. I have had to visit this location three times during the pandemic for Covid testing and I have had a great experience each time. I would highly recommend this facility due to the ease of booking appointments, setting up the online patient portal and the convenient hours.

resp.text:
Adrienne,

We consider it an honor to expand our services to adults like you during the COVID-19 pandemic. We want to thank you for trusting our team with your care and choosing Urgent Care for Children three times. It means a lot to have your seal of approval!

name: Haley Bunio
text: The nurses and nurse practitioner were so sweet and were so good with comforting my nervous 2 year old. Great experience!

resp.text: At Urgent Care for Children, we know that the doctor's office is the last place a kiddo wants to be. That's why we work to create a welcoming and kid-friendly environment from start to finish. We hope your little one gets to feeling better soon. Thank you for choosing UC4C, Haley!

name: Zaria Burton
text: Highly recommend, I got tested with the rapid test and the nurse was so helpful keeping me calm.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us and for choosing Urgent Care for Children, Zaria!

name: Brad Hall
text: Everyone we have spoken with and interacted with have been extremely kind and very thorough. They made me feel like my children were the priority which is huge coming from a provider myself. Everything had a quick turn around, results were explained and all my “mama questions” were answered. I highly recommend the 280 location.

resp.text: It always makes us smile when we hear of great visits to one of our clinics and this was no different. We count it as our honor to provide quality care with less waiting to families like yours all 365 days of the year. We want to thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children, Brad!

name: Matt Hall
text: Urgent care provided quick & great care for my son when he broke his arm. The staff was polite & attentive.

resp.text: We are so happy to hear you had a great visit to our Highway 280 location with your son, Matt! We hope he heals quickly and is already starting to feel better. Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children.

name: Patrick Johns
text: Urgent care for children what a joke I have a six week old daughter that I was told by the pediatrician to take care set up an appointment was scheduled for 8:00 a.m. next morning I was asking confirm my appointment after confirming my appointment I was told that they don't see children under 3 months old what the hell does that mean either you're a child care specialist or you're not I wouldn't take my child here if I was you just to waste of time people are very rude and it's all in what they want to do I suggest you just take your child to the emergency room as I was told to do

resp.text:
Patrick,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. For some chief complaints, like a fever in a 6 week old, there is a high possibility that your child will need ER evaluation due to the need for certain tests that can only be done there. Hence, we have to comply with some basic triage of patients depending on their age and reason for the visit. This is in the best interest of the patient and the family. We are happy to have a team member reach out to explain further over a phone call with you if needed. We hope your daughter is feeling much better!

name: Stefana Laing
text: Contactless forms to fill, painless Check-in process, lovely and helpful office manager. Friendly staff, helpful and knowledgeable. I have brought my kids here many times. It’s a great place and great group of medical professionals.

resp.text: We are so happy to hear you had a great experience at our Highway 280 location. We are truly honored to provide care to families like yours today and all 365 days of the year. Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children, Stefana!

name: Nichole Worley
text: I’ve made several trips to this urgent care clinic with my 3 daughters over the past couple of years & I will have to say that each time has been a good experience. We haven’t waited more than 15mins to be seen. I felt that our issues and concerns were addressed with professionalism and genuine concern for my children’s well-being. I would recommend this clinic to any person needing pediatric urgent care.

resp.text: Receiving the seal of approval from wonderful moms like you is the best award we could ever receive, Nichole. Thank you for trusting us through the years to provide care to your daughters!

name: Maegan Walden
text: Wonderful experience! Fast, easy, and very professional and kind staff!!

resp.text: We're so glad to hear you had a great visit to our Highway 280 location, Maegan! Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children.

name: Amanda Schultz
text: Awesome and friendly staff.  Very efficient and well ran. Went for a rapid Covid test for my son and we were helped immediately. I loved how we were able to stay in the car, and make an appointment as well. Would definitely recommend.

resp.text: We are proud to offer contactless, convenient, and curbside COVID-19 testing to families like yours during the pandemic. text: Was in and out via outside service!  Liked we didn’t have to leave the car.  Diagnostic was fast and as painless as it could be!  Would definitely return back if needed to!

name: Shea Bailey
text: Had a great experience here. Staff was prompt and friendly and we were in and out. I love that you can make an appointment and aren’t sitting there for hours waiting. Will definitely be coming here again!

resp.text: Quality care with less waiting isn't just our motto, it's what we strive for every day at all UC4C locations. We want to thank you for trusting Urgent Care for Children with the care of your kiddo, SBailey318!

text: Very disappointed with the attitude of the staff. When we questioned a procedure, we were told the conversation was over. Kathy has poor customer service and very little empathy. We will not return or recommend.

First and foremost, we want to deeply apologize for your recent experience at our Highway 280 location. At Urgent Care for Children, we deeply value customer service and believe that all families who visit us should walk away with a great understanding of the care their child received. We clearly missed that mark in your case and we are sorry. A member of our team will be reaching out to you in the coming days to speak further about your experience. text: The lady at the front desk was so sweet and helpful! We were in and out very quickly!  The doctor was thorough and personable!

resp.text:
Jennifer,

On behalf of everyone at Urgent Care for Children, I would like to sincerely apologize for your recent experience at our Highway 280 location. We strive to provide quality care with less waiting all 365 days of the year, and when we miss that mark, we work diligently to identify what went wrong. We have already begun this process in your case and want to thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us.  Once again, we are truly sorry.

name: Meagan Findlay
text: The Doctor was great and spend time with us. I didn't feel rushed.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children, Meagan!

name: pedro martinez
text:
Very thankful for them. Only complaint was this last time, they were slow, not because they were packed, we were the only ones in the waiting room. The office manager lady became cognizant of the situation, went back there and got them moving. She had loving words that comforted my boy. Yes, the little things matter.
Gave us a follow up call to check on him and informed us they refunded our copay! (Because of the circumstances/situation). Top notch move and loyalty earned. Customer service might not be dead yet. Someone besides Chick fil a still believes in it.

resp.text:
Pedro,

We are grateful to serve families like yours all 365 days of the year. We want to apologize for your wait and sincerely thank you for your patience and understanding. Our team is committed to ensuring a positive patient experience for all. Earning your loyalty means a lot to us! Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children.

name: Karen McDonald
text: Last minute appointment at the end of their day but they were still so nice and accommodating to give this mom peace of mind!! I appreciated them not making me feel bad for scheduling at the end of their day!!

resp.text: At Urgent Care for Children, we know that no price tag can be put on a parent's peace of mind. That's why we are happy to serve families like yours all 365 days of the year. Thank you for choosing and trusting UC4C, Karen!

text: The nurses I dealt with were very kind, cordial, patient. They were caring and professional at the same time. I felt completely at ease and was sure I was being cared for properly. I appreciate all these front line workers are doing for us.

name: Kathy McMurtry
text:
We were headed to Florida, for fall break, when We noticed our daughter leg looked like it had a spider bite.
We made an apt here, as we were passing though. They were friendly, quick and the MD was very knowledgeable. They even had the meds, we needed on site.
We were done and back on the road, in no time.  Thank you!

resp.text: Bug bites are never any fun, especially when you're headed on vacation! We are happy to hear that we were able to provide your daughter with quality and convenient care so that you could get back on the road quickly. Thank you for trusting us with the care of your kiddo, Kathy!

name: Ashley Ruffin
text: They were fast and friendly. My children were afraid of the COVID test and the staff did a great job at comforting my children.

text: Quick and easy covid testing! The nurse that administered my test was so friendly and efficient!!

resp.text: Quality care with less waiting is what we strive for all 365 days of the year! Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children, Mary.

name: Leslie Grace Schmidt
text: We had a great experience! Very fast to get in after opening. Very caring staff too.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children, Leslie!

name: Shane Herring
text: Extremely professional, efficient, empathetic and incredibly sweet with my little boy. Very pleased with our experience.

name: Lisa Miller

text: My family was Covid tested here. Testing was quick, easy, and they were great with my kids.

resp.text: It's an honor to serve families like yours during the COVID-19 pandemic and all 365 days of the year, Gloria. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us!

name: Brooke Hughes
text: Our wait was quick and we did not have to wait forever for my daughter to be seen! I would highly recommend.

resp.text: Quality care with less waiting is what we strive for all 365 days of the year. Thank you so much for choosing UC4C and giving us your seal of approval, Brooke!

name: Sheila Magnusson
text: Very quick service, friendly staff, clean. Glad they are here!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children, Sheila!

name: LoveLi LoveLi
text: The doctor and nurse were amazing! Really sweet and knowledgeable. I would definitely recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your feedback with us and for choosing Urgent Care for Children, LoveLi!

name: Akashya Smith
text: Everyone was so nice & helpful. My 2 year old is usually terrified of nurses or doctors. Even with all the PPE on she was laughing with them & jabbering. Of course when the swab came out she lost it, but for only a few seconds. If it wasn’t an hour drive we would continue to use them. Thank y’all for making the process easy from the beginning booking online, all the text updates, notification & even submitting the paper work online. AAA+

resp.text:
Akashya,

We are so happy to hear that despite the swab, you child felt at home with our team during your visit to Urgent Care for Children. Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children and for sharing your experience with us! We will be sure to pass your kind words along to our Team.

name: justiceplaz yt
text: The staff and care providers were super friendly and thorough. I will definitely recommend them to friends and family.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your feedback and trusting our team to provide care to your family!

name: Gabriela Sisco
text: Super recommended. I like the hours and services they provide!

resp.text: We are honored to have your recommendation, Gabriela! Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children.

name: Angela Meetze
text: It was a very easy in and out.  Very clean!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children, Angela!

name: Dana Duell
text: My daughter was sick and running a fever.  I tried our primary care provider first who didn’t have any openings that afternoon and upon their referral I called Urgent Care for Children on 280.  I was informed I could be a walk in our schedule an appointment time online so I opted to schedule a time because general that means you don’t have to wait as long.  I arrived for my daughter’s appointment early to complete any necessary paperwork since we’d not been there before.  I signed in told reception we had an appointment he looked and confirmed but then said this: “I know you have an appointment but....”. Wait what?  Why would you say that to a mom, who took the time to fill the forms in online and make an appointment?  “I know you have an appointment but” there is a walk in, 🤔 yes there is but I made an appointment for which I showed up on time.  So NO, it is not acceptable to say this to a mom and who has a kid with fever in your waiting room with who know what the others in the waiting room have.  We are in the middle of flu season and multiple other viruses and I made an appointment and those with an appointment come first especially when I walked in at the same time as said “walk-ins”.  Needless to say he was not apologetic for dismissing the fact I called ahead and made an appointment and came at that time.  And for that I would give 1 ⭐️, the nurse and Nurse practitioner were what drove the rating up.  They were pleasant and helpful, my daughter thankfully only had a virus so we didn’t end up with meds and thankfully nothing else she may have been exposed to by not being taken back when she should have been.  But that’s my rating for all it’s worth.  I really don’t like to give bad ones, but bottom line we won’t go back.

resp.text:
Dana,

Thank you for taking the time to share this feedback with us. On behalf of everyone at Urgent Care for Children, I want to sincerely apologize for your experience. We are taking all corrective measures to ensure that this does not happen again. A member of our team will be reaching out to you in the coming days to further discuss your experience. Once again, thank you for your time.

name: Fatima Castillo
text: Staff is very friendly, they made me feel at ease.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children, Fatima!

name: MaKeUp JuNkIe
text: Awesome staff and awesome experience!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children, Makeup Junkie!

name: Corrie Spigner
text: I dreaded going but the experience wasn’t as bad as I thought it would be! The young lady who tested me was nice & didn’t make me feel she was disgusted! Overall nice & quick visit!!!

resp.text: Our goal is to always make you feel comfortable and at home during your visit with us. Thank you for trusting Urgent Care for Children, Corrie!

name: Nunyo Biznass
text: Fast covid testing service. Real kind folks.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children, Nunyo!

name: Kristi Rudd
text: No problem making appointment online that morning. Clean waiting room and exam rooms. Waited only 5 minutes before we were brought into exam room. MUCH better than sitting for 2 to 3 hours in an urgent care. Doctor was knowledgeable and staff were all pleasant. Will definitely use again if need arises.

resp.text:
Kristi,

We are glad to hear that you experienced both less waiting and quality care during your recent visit with us. While we hope that your child doesn't fall ill anytime soon, we are always here in case you need us. Our doors are open 365 days a year, including weekends and holidays. Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review!

name: Jennifer Holloman
text: Our baby was having an allergic reaction. We fluctuated between going to Children’s Hospital and going here. We decided to go here because he wasn’t having any trouble breathing. But we were really scared and nervous. The only reason I didn’t give five stars was because when I initially came in the receptionist was on the phone and didn’t acknowledge me. I waited several minutes before I finally interrupted her and asked if they could help us.  She was perfectly nice and eventually helpful,  but I was already anxious and that didn’t help. After that though, everything was great. We were in and out in less than an hour. The doctor was super knowledgeable and attentive. I feel like he was very thorough. He had a good bedside manner. I have no complaints about the doctor.  The place seemed pretty clean. We left very pleased with our experience. We would go back if we needed to.

resp.text:
Hi Jennifer,

Your feedback is invaluable to us here at Urgent Care for Children. It is always great to hear that families were satisfied with their visit with our pediatricians. I do apologize for your initial encounter with our front desk staff. We are taking immediate steps to address this and ensure that all families are properly greeted once stepping foot in our doors. Thank you for choosing UC4C!

name: Katie Gomez
text: Great staff, very caring nurses take time with you and your child. The doctor was very nice and very thorough when checking my child out!! We were in and out so quick, remember you can reserve your spot online!! Great experience

resp.text:
Katie,

Our team is dedicated to providing quality care with less waiting to families like yours in the after-hours and weekends. And we are always happy to hear when others take advantage of our "Save Your Spot Online" feature. We will be sure to share your kind words with our team. Thank you for trusting Urgent Care for Children!

name: Monica McShan
text: The visit was quick and efficient. I highly recommend.

resp.text: That's great news! Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children, Monica.

text: We are very happy to have access to the Urgent Care for Children clinics for weekend and after clinic hours care. From the time of scheduling an appointment to check out,  thoroughness and efficiency are maintained and appreciated, especially with young children that are not feeling well. resp.text:

At Urgent Care for Children, we consider it our honor to provide care to kiddos 365 days a year, including the after-hours, holidays, and weekends. text: That went great and was very efficient only gave 4 stars waiting to see how quick I get results.

text: Nice clean facility. All of the staff was friendly, courteous, and caring. The doctor and nurse practitioner did a great job of listening to me and my concerns and explaining things to me. Would recommend this place for sure
